GE09ram_02su:1: kasyacit tv atha kālasya rājā daśarathaḥ sutam /
GE09ram_02su:4: tvāṃ netum āgato vīra yudhājin mātulas tava // RamS_2,1.2 //
GE09ram_02su:8: mātḥṃś cāpi naraśreṣṭhaḥ śatrughnasahito yayau // RamS_2,1.4 //
GE09ram_02su:10: svapuraṃ prāviśad vīraḥ pitā tasya tutoṣa ha // RamS_2,1.5 //
GE09ram_02su:11: sa tatra nyavasad bhrātrā saha satkārasatkṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:13: tatrāpi nivasantau tau tarpyamāṇau ca kāmataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:14: bhrātarau smaratāṃ vīrau vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // RamS_2,1.7 //
GE09ram_02su:15: rājāpi tau mahātejāḥ sasmāra proṣitau sutau /
GE09ram_02su:17: sarva eva tu tasyeṣṭāś catvāraḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:18: svaśarīrād vinirvṛttāś catvāra iva bāhavaḥ // RamS_2,1.9 //
GE09ram_02su:19: teṣām api mahātejā rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:20: svayambhūr iva bhūtānāṃ babhūva guṇavattaraḥ // RamS_2,1.10 //
GE09ram_02su:21: gate ca bharate rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:24: cakāra rāmo dharmātmā priyāṇi ca hitāni ca // RamS_2,1.12 //
GE09ram_02su:27: evaṃ daśarathaḥ prīto brāhmaṇā naigamās tathā /
GE09ram_02su:29: sa hi nityaṃ praśāntātmā mṛdupūrvaṃ ca bhāṣate /
GE09ram_02su:32: na smaraty apakārāṇāṃ śatam apy ātmavattayā // RamS_2,1.16 //
GE09ram_02su:34: kathayann āsta vai nityam astrayogyāntareṣv api // RamS_2,1.17 //
GE09ram_02su:36: vṛddhair abhivinītaś ca dvijair dharmārthadarśibhiḥ // RamS_2,1.18 //
GE09ram_02su:42: śraiṣṭhyaṃ śāstrasamūheṣu prāpto vyāmiśrakeṣv api // RamS_2,1.21 //
GE09ram_02su:43: arthadharmau ca saṃgṛhya sukhatantro na cālasaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:48: apradhṛṣyaś ca saṃgrāme kruddhair api surāsuraiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:49: anasūyo jitakrodho na dṛpto na ca matsarī /
GE09ram_02su:50: na cāvamantā bhūtānāṃ na ca kālavaśānugaḥ // RamS_2,1.24 //*
GE09ram_02su:51: evaṃ śreṣṭhair guṇair yuktaḥ prajānāṃ pārthivātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:53: buddhyā bṛhaspates tulyo vīryeṇāpi śacīpateḥ // RamS_2,1.25 //
GE09ram_02su:55: guṇair viruruce rāmo dīptaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ // RamS_2,1.26 //
GE09ram_02su:58: etais tu bahubhir yuktaṃ guṇair anupamaiḥ sutam /
GE09ram_02su:59: dṛṣṭvā daśaratho rājā cakre cintāṃ paraṃtapaḥ // RamS_2,1.28 //
GE09ram_02su:60: eṣā hy asya parā prītir hṛdi samparivartate /
GE09ram_02su:61: kadā nāma sutaṃ drakṣyāmy abhiṣiktam ahaṃ priyam // RamS_2,1.29 //
GE09ram_02su:63: mattaḥ priyataro loke parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān // RamS_2,1.30 //
GE09ram_02su:65: mahīdharasamo dhṛtyāṃ mattaś ca guṇavattaraḥ // RamS_2,1.31 //
GE09ram_02su:66: mahīm aham imāṃ kṛtsnām adhitiṣṭhantam ātmajam /
GE09ram_02su:67: anena vayasā dṛṣṭvā yathā svargam avāpnuyām // RamS_2,1.32 //
GE09ram_02su:68: taṃ samīkṣya mahārājo yuktaṃ samuditair guṇaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:69: niścitya sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ yuvarājam amanyata // RamS_2,1.33 //
GE09ram_02su:73: rājānam evābhimukhā niṣedur niyatā nṛpāḥ // RamS_2,1.35 //
GE09ram_02su:74: sa labdhamānair vinayānvitair nṛpaiḥ purālayair jānapadaiś ca mānavaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:75: upopaviṣṭair nṛpatir vṛto babhau sahasracakṣur bhagavān ivāmaraiḥ // RamS_2,1.36 //
GE09ram_02su:79: hitam uddharṣaṇaṃ cedam uvācāpratimaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,2.1 //
GE09ram_02su:81: svareṇa mahatā rājā jīmūta iva nādayan // RamS_2,2.2 //
GE09ram_02su:83: śreyasā yoktukāmo 'smi sukhārham akhilaṃ jagat // RamS_2,2.3 //
GE09ram_02su:85: prajā nityam atandreṇa yathāśakty abhirakṣatā // RamS_2,2.4 //
GE09ram_02su:86: idaṃ śarīraṃ kṛtsnasya lokasya caratā hitam /
GE09ram_02su:87: pāṇḍur asyātapatrasya chāyāyāṃ jaritaṃ mayā // RamS_2,2.5 //
GE09ram_02su:91: pariśrānto 'smi lokasya gurvīṃ dharmadhuraṃ vahan // RamS_2,2.7 //
GE09ram_02su:92: so 'haṃ viśramam icchāmi putraṃ kṛtvā prajāhite /
GE09ram_02su:93: saṃnikṛṣṭān imān sarvān anumānya dvijarṣabhān // RamS_2,2.8 //
GE09ram_02su:94: anujāto hi me sarvair guṇair jyeṣṭho mamātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:96: taṃ candram iva puṣyeṇa yuktaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam /
GE09ram_02su:98: anurūpaḥ sa vo nātho lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:99: trailokyam api nāthena yena syān nāthavattaram // RamS_2,2.11 //
GE09ram_02su:100: anena śreyasā sadyaḥ saṃyojyāham imāṃ mahīm /
GE09ram_02su:101: gatakleśo bhaviṣyāmi sute tasmin niveśya vai // RamS_2,2.12 //
GE09ram_02su:102: iti bruvantaṃ muditāḥ pratyanandan nṛpā nṛpam /
GE09ram_02su:103: vṛṣṭimantaṃ mahāmeghaṃ nardantam iva barhiṇaḥ // RamS_2,2.13 //
GE09ram_02su:105: ūcuś ca manasā jñātvā vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // RamS_2,2.14 //
GE09ram_02su:107: sa rāmaṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣiñcasva pārthivam // RamS_2,2.15 //
GE09ram_02su:108: iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā teṣāṃ manaḥpriyam /
GE09ram_02su:109: ajānann iva jijñāsur idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,2.16 //
GE09ram_02su:110: kathaṃ nu mayi dharmeṇa pṛthivīm anuśāsati /
GE09ram_02su:111: bhavanto draṣṭum icchanti yuvarājaṃ mamātmajam // RamS_2,2.17 //
GE09ram_02su:112: te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadaiḥ saha /
GE09ram_02su:113: bahavo nṛpa kalyāṇā guṇāḥ putrasya santi te // RamS_2,2.18 //
GE09ram_02su:115: ikṣvākubhyo hi sarvebhyo 'py atirakto viśāmpate // RamS_2,2.19 //
GE09ram_02su:117: dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca śīlavān anasūyakaḥ // RamS_2,2.20 //
GE09ram_02su:119: mṛduś ca sthiracittaś ca sadā bhavyo 'nasūyakaḥ // RamS_2,2.21 //
GE09ram_02su:120: priyavādī ca bhūtānāṃ satyavādī ca rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:122: tenāsyehātulā kīrtir yaśas tejaś ca vardhate /
GE09ram_02su:124: yadā vrajati saṃgrāmaṃ grāmārthe nagarasya vā /
GE09ram_02su:126: saṃgrāmāt punar āgamya kuñjareṇa rathena vā /
GE09ram_02su:127: paurān svajanavan nityaṃ kuśalaṃ paripṛcchati // RamS_2,2.25 //
GE09ram_02su:129: nikhilenānupūrvyā ca pitā putrān ivaurasān // RamS_2,2.26 //
GE09ram_02su:130: śuśrūṣante ca vaḥ śiṣyāḥ kaccit karmasu daṃśitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:131: iti naḥ puruṣavyāghraḥ sadā rāmo 'bhibhāṣate // RamS_2,2.27 //
GE09ram_02su:133: utsaveṣu ca sarveṣu piteva parituṣyati // RamS_2,2.28 //
GE09ram_02su:135: vatsaḥ śreyasi jātas te diṣṭyāsau tava rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:136: diṣṭyā putraguṇair yukto mārīca iva kaśyapaḥ // RamS_2,2.29 //
GE09ram_02su:137: balam ārogyam āyuś ca rāmasya viditātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:138: āśaṃsate janaḥ sarvo rāṣṭre puravare tathā // RamS_2,2.30 //
GE09ram_02su:139: abhyantaraś ca bāhyaś ca paurajānapado janaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:140: striyo vṛddhās taruṇyaś ca sāyamprātaḥ samāhitāḥ // RamS_2,2.31 //
GE09ram_02su:142: teṣām āyācitaṃ deva tvatprasādāt samṛdhyatām // RamS_2,2.32 //
GE09ram_02su:145: taṃ devadevopamam ātmajaṃ te sarvasya lokasya hite niviṣṭam /
GE09ram_02su:146: hitāya naḥ kṣipram udārajuṣṭaṃ mudābhiṣektuṃ varada tvam arhasi // RamS_2,2.34 //
GE09ram_02su:150: pratigṛhyābravīd rājā tebhyaḥ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,3.1 //
GE09ram_02su:152: yan me jyeṣṭhaṃ priyaṃ putraṃ yauvarājyastham icchatha // RamS_2,3.2 //
GE09ram_02su:153: iti pratyarcya tān rājā brāhmaṇān idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:154: vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca teṣām evopaśṛṇvatām // RamS_2,3.3 //
GE09ram_02su:155: caitraḥ śrīmān ayaṃ māsaḥ puṇyaḥ puṣpitakānanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:157: kṛtam ity eva cābrūtām abhigamya jagatpatim /
GE09ram_02su:159: tataḥ sumantraṃ dyutimān rājā vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:160: rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bhavatā śīghram ānīyatām iti // RamS_2,3.6 //
GE09ram_02su:162: rāmaṃ tatrānayāṃcakre rathena rathināṃ varam // RamS_2,3.7 //
GE09ram_02su:163: atha tatra samāsīnās tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam /
GE09ram_02su:164: prācyodīcyāḥ pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca bhūmipāḥ // RamS_2,3.8 //
GE09ram_02su:165: mlecchāś cāryāś ca ye cānye vanaśailāntavāsinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:166: upāsāṃcakrire sarve taṃ devā iva vāsavam // RamS_2,3.9 //
GE09ram_02su:167: teṣāṃ madhye sa rājarṣir marutām iva vāsavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:174: na tatarpa samāyāntaṃ paśyamāno narādhipaḥ // RamS_2,3.13 //
GE09ram_02su:176: pituḥ samīpaṃ gacchantaṃ prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt // RamS_2,3.14 //
GE09ram_02su:178: āruroha nṛpaṃ draṣṭuṃ saha sūtena rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,3.15 //
GE09ram_02su:179: sa prāñjalir abhipretya praṇataḥ pitur antike /
GE09ram_02su:180: nāma svaṃ śrāvayan rāmo vavande caraṇau pituḥ // RamS_2,3.16 //
GE09ram_02su:181: taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ pārśve kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:182: gṛhyāñjalau samākṛṣya sasvaje priyam ātmajam // RamS_2,3.17 //
GE09ram_02su:184: dideśa rājā ruciraṃ rāmāya paramāsanam // RamS_2,3.18 //
GE09ram_02su:186: svayeva prabhayā merum udaye vimalo raviḥ // RamS_2,3.19 //
GE09ram_02su:189: taṃ paśyamāno nṛpatis tutoṣa priyam ātmajam /
GE09ram_02su:191: sa taṃ sasmitam ābhāṣya putraṃ putravatāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:192: uvācedaṃ vaco rājā devendram iva kaśyapaḥ // RamS_2,3.22 //
GE09ram_02su:193: jyeṣṭhāyām asi me patnyāṃ sadṛśyāṃ sadṛśaḥ sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:194: utpannas tvaṃ guṇaśreṣṭho mama rāmātmajaḥ priyaḥ // RamS_2,3.23 //
GE09ram_02su:195: tvayā yataḥ prajāś cemāḥ svaguṇair anurañjitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:196: tasmāt tvaṃ puṣyayogena yauvarājyam avāpnuhi // RamS_2,3.24 //
GE09ram_02su:197: kāmatas tvaṃ prakṛtyaiva vinīto guṇavān asi /
GE09ram_02su:198: guṇavaty api tu snehāt putra vakṣyāmi te hitam // RamS_2,3.25 //
GE09ram_02su:199: bhūyo vinayam āsthāya bhava nityaṃ jitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:205: tasmāt putra tvam ātmānaṃ niyamyaiva samācara // RamS_2,3.28 //
GE09ram_02su:206: tac chrutvā suhṛdas tasya rāmasya priyakāriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:207: tvaritāḥ śīghram abhyetya kausalyāyai nyavedayan // RamS_2,3.29 //
GE09ram_02su:208: sā hiraṇyaṃ ca gāś caiva ratnāni vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:211: yayau svaṃ dyutimad veśma janaughaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ // RamS_2,3.31 //
GE09ram_02su:212: te cāpi paurā nṛpater vacas tacchrutvā tadā lābham iveṣṭam āpya /
GE09ram_02su:213: narendram āmantrya gṛhāṇi gatvā devān samānarcur atīva hṛṣṭāḥ // RamS_2,3.32 //
GE09ram_02su:216: gateṣv atha nṛpo bhūyaḥ paureṣu saha mantribhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:217: mantrayitvā tataś cakre niścayajñaḥ sa niścayam // RamS_2,4.1 //
GE09ram_02su:218: śva eva puṣyo bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣecyas tu me sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:219: rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo yauvarājya iti prabhuḥ // RamS_2,4.2 //
GE09ram_02su:221: sūtam ājñāpayāmāsa rāmaṃ punar ihānaya // RamS_2,4.3 //
GE09ram_02su:222: pratigṛhya sa tadvākyaṃ sūtaḥ punar upāyayau /
GE09ram_02su:223: rāmasya bhavanaṃ śīghraṃ rāmam ānayituṃ punaḥ // RamS_2,4.4 //
GE09ram_02su:225: śrutvaiva cāpi rāmas taṃ prāptaṃ śaṅkānvito 'bhavat // RamS_2,4.5 //
GE09ram_02su:226: praveśya cainaṃ tvaritaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:227: yad āgamanakṛtyaṃ te bhūyas tad brūhy aśeṣataḥ // RamS_2,4.6 //
GE09ram_02su:228: tam uvāca tataḥ sūto rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati /
GE09ram_02su:229: śrutvā pramāṇam atra tvaṃ gamanāyetarāya vā // RamS_2,4.7 //
GE09ram_02su:231: prayayau rājabhavanaṃ punar draṣṭuṃ nareśvaram // RamS_2,4.8 //
GE09ram_02su:232: taṃ śrutvā samanuprāptaṃ rāmaṃ daśaratho nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:233: praveśayāmāsa gṛhaṃ vivikṣuḥ priyam uttamam // RamS_2,4.9 //
GE09ram_02su:234: praviśann eva ca śrīmān rāghavo bhavanaṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:235: dadarśa pitaraṃ dūrāt praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ // RamS_2,4.10 //
GE09ram_02su:237: pradiśya cāsmai ruciram āsanaṃ punar abravīt // RamS_2,4.11 //
GE09ram_02su:238: rāma vṛddho 'smi dīrghāyur bhuktā bhogā mayepsitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:240: jātam iṣṭam apatyaṃ me tvam adyānupamaṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02su:241: dattam iṣṭam adhītaṃ ca mayā puruṣasattama // RamS_2,4.13 //
GE09ram_02su:242: anubhūtāni ceṣṭāni mayā vīra sukhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:245: ato yat tvām ahaṃ brūyāṃ tan me tvaṃ kartum arhasi // RamS_2,4.15 //
GE09ram_02su:246: adya prakṛtayaḥ sarvās tvām icchanti narādhipam /
GE09ram_02su:247: atas tvāṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣekṣyāmi putraka // RamS_2,4.16 //
GE09ram_02su:248: api cādyāśubhān rāma svapnān paśyāmi dāruṇān /
GE09ram_02su:249: sanirghātā maholkāś ca patantīha mahāsvanāḥ // RamS_2,4.17 //
GE09ram_02su:250: avaṣṭabdhaṃ ca me rāma nakṣatraṃ dāruṇair grahaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:253: rājā vā mṛtyum āpnoti ghorāṃ vāpadam ṛcchati // RamS_2,4.19 //
GE09ram_02su:254: tad yāvad eva me ceto na vimuhyati rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:255: tāvad evābhiṣiñcasva calā hi prāṇināṃ matiḥ // RamS_2,4.20 //
GE09ram_02su:256: adya candro 'bhyupagataḥ puṣyāt pūrvaṃ punar vasum /
GE09ram_02su:257: śvaḥ puṣyayogaṃ niyataṃ vakṣyante daivacintakāḥ // RamS_2,4.21 //
GE09ram_02su:259: śvas tvāham abhiṣekṣyāmi yauvarājye paraṃtapa // RamS_2,4.22 //
GE09ram_02su:262: suhṛdaś cāpramattās tvāṃ rakṣantv adya samantataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:263: bhavanti bahuvighnāni kāryāṇy evaṃvidhāni hi // RamS_2,4.24 //
GE09ram_02su:264: viproṣitaś ca bharato yāvad eva purād itaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:265: tāvad evābhiṣekas te prāptakālo mato mama // RamS_2,4.25 //
GE09ram_02su:266: kāmaṃ khalu satāṃ vṛtte bhrātā te bharataḥ sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:268: kiṃ tu cittaṃ manuṣyāṇām anityam iti me matiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:269: satāṃ ca dharmanityānāṃ kṛtaśobhi ca rāghava // RamS_2,4.27 //
GE09ram_02su:271: vrajeti rāmaḥ pitaram abhivādyābhyayād gṛham // RamS_2,4.28 //
GE09ram_02su:273: tasmin kṣaṇe vinirgatya mātur antaḥpuraṃ yayau // RamS_2,4.29 //
GE09ram_02su:274: tatra tāṃ pravaṇām eva mātaraṃ kṣaumavāsinīm /
GE09ram_02su:275: vāgyatāṃ devatāgāre dadarśa yācatīṃ śriyam // RamS_2,4.30 //
GE09ram_02su:276: prāg eva cāgatā tatra sumitrā lakṣmaṇas tathā /
GE09ram_02su:277: sītā cānāyitā śrutvā priyaṃ rāmābhiṣecanam // RamS_2,4.31 //
GE09ram_02su:278: tasmin kāle hi kausalyā tasthāv āmīlitekṣaṇā /
GE09ram_02su:283: uvāca vacanaṃ rāmo harṣayaṃs tām idaṃ tadā // RamS_2,4.34 //
GE09ram_02su:285: bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣeko me yathā me śāsanaṃ pituḥ // RamS_2,4.35 //
GE09ram_02su:287: evam ṛtvigupādhyāyaiḥ saha mām uktavān pitā // RamS_2,4.36 //
GE09ram_02su:288: yāni yāny atra yogyāni śvobhāviny abhiṣecane /
GE09ram_02su:289: tāni me maṅgalāny adya vaidehyāś caiva kāraya // RamS_2,4.37 //
GE09ram_02su:291: harṣabāṣpakalaṃ vākyam idaṃ rāmam abhāṣata // RamS_2,4.38 //
GE09ram_02su:292: vatsa rāma ciraṃ jīva hatās te paripanthinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:293: jñātīn me tvaṃ śriyā yuktaḥ sumitrāyāś ca nandaya // RamS_2,4.39 //
GE09ram_02su:294: kalyāṇe bata nakṣatre mayi jāto 'si putraka /
GE09ram_02su:295: yena tvayā daśaratho guṇair ārādhitaḥ pitā // RamS_2,4.40 //
GE09ram_02su:296: amoghaṃ bata me kṣāntaṃ puruṣe puṣkarekṣaṇe /
GE09ram_02su:297: yeyam ikṣvākurājyaśrīḥ putra tvāṃ saṃśrayiṣyati // RamS_2,4.41 //
GE09ram_02su:298: ity evam ukto mātredaṃ rāmo bhrātaram abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:299: prāñjaliṃ prahvam āsīnam abhivīkṣya smayann iva // RamS_2,4.42 //
GE09ram_02su:300: lakṣmaṇemāṃ mayā sārdhaṃ praśādhi tvaṃ vasuṃdharām /
GE09ram_02su:301: dvitīyaṃ me 'ntarātmānaṃ tvām iyaṃ śrīr upasthitā // RamS_2,4.43 //
GE09ram_02su:302: saumitre bhuṅkṣva bhogāṃs tvam iṣṭān rājyaphalāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:303: jīvitaṃ ca hi rājyaṃ ca tvadartham abhikāmaye // RamS_2,4.44 //
GE09ram_02su:304: ity uktvā lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mātarāv abhivādya ca /
GE09ram_02su:305: abhyanujñāpya sītāṃ ca jagāma svaṃ niveśanam // RamS_2,4.45 //
GE09ram_02su:309: purohitaṃ samāhūya vasiṣṭham idam abravīt // RamS_2,5.1 //
GE09ram_02su:312: tatheti ca sa rājānam uktvā vedavidāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:313: svayaṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavān yayau rāmaniveśanam // RamS_2,5.3 //
GE09ram_02su:315: tisraḥ kakṣyā rathenaiva viveśa munisattamaḥ // RamS_2,5.4 //
GE09ram_02su:316: tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ rāmas tvarann iva sasaṃbhramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:317: mānayiṣyan sa mānārhaṃ niścakrāma niveśanāt // RamS_2,5.5 //
GE09ram_02su:320: sa cainaṃ praśritaṃ dṛṣṭvā sambhāṣyābhiprasādya ca /
GE09ram_02su:321: priyārhaṃ harṣayan rāmam ity uvāca purohitaḥ // RamS_2,5.7 //
GE09ram_02su:322: prasannas te pitā rāma yauvarājyam avāpsyasi /
GE09ram_02su:323: upavāsaṃ bhavān adya karotu saha sītayā // RamS_2,5.8 //
GE09ram_02su:324: prātas tvām abhiṣektā hi yauvarājye narādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:325: pitā daśarathaḥ prītyā yayātiṃ nahuṣo yathā // RamS_2,5.9 //
GE09ram_02su:326: ity uktvā sa tadā rāmam upavāsaṃ yatavratam /
GE09ram_02su:327: mantravat kārayāmāsa vaidehyā sahitaṃ muniḥ // RamS_2,5.10 //
GE09ram_02su:328: tato yathāvad rāmeṇa sa rājño gurur arcitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:330: suhṛdbhis tatra rāmo 'pi tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:331: sabhājito viveśātha tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ // RamS_2,5.12 //
GE09ram_02su:335: nirgatya dadṛśe mārgaṃ vasiṣṭho janasaṃvṛtam // RamS_2,5.14 //
GE09ram_02su:343: rāmābhiṣekam ākāṅkṣann ākāṅkṣann udayaṃ raveḥ // RamS_2,5.18 //
GE09ram_02su:345: utsuko 'bhūj jano draṣṭuṃ tam ayodhyāmahotsavam // RamS_2,5.19 //
GE09ram_02su:347: vyūhann iva janaughaṃ taṃ śanai rājakulaṃ yayau // RamS_2,5.20 //
GE09ram_02su:350: tam āgatam abhiprekṣya hitvā rājāsanaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:351: papraccha sa ca tasmai tat kṛtam ity abhyavedayat // RamS_2,5.22 //
GE09ram_02su:352: guruṇā tv abhyanujñāto manujaughaṃ visṛjya tam /
GE09ram_02su:353: viveśāntaḥpuraṃ rājā siṃho giriguhām iva // RamS_2,5.23 //
GE09ram_02su:355: vidīpayaṃś cāru viveśa pārthivaḥ śaśīva tārāgaṇasaṃkulaṃ nabhaḥ // RamS_2,5.24 //
GE09ram_02su:359: saha patnyā viśālākṣyā nārāyaṇam upāgamat // RamS_2,6.1 //
GE09ram_02su:360: pragṛhya śirasā pātrīṃ haviṣo vidhivat tadā /
GE09ram_02su:362: śeṣaṃ ca haviṣas tasya prāśyāśāsyātmanaḥ priyam /
GE09ram_02su:363: dhyāyan nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ svāstīrṇe kuśasaṃstare // RamS_2,6.3 //
GE09ram_02su:365: śrīmaty āyatane viṣṇoḥ śiśye naravarātmajaḥ // RamS_2,6.4 //
GE09ram_02su:369: pūrvāṃ saṃdhyām upāsīno jajāpa yatamānasaḥ // RamS_2,6.6 //
GE09ram_02su:374: kṛtopavāsaṃ tu tadā vaidehyā saha rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:375: ayodhyānilayaḥ śrutvā sarvaḥ pramudito janaḥ // RamS_2,6.9 //
GE09ram_02su:377: prabhātāṃ rajanīṃ dṛṣṭvā cakre śobhāṃ parāṃ punaḥ // RamS_2,6.10 //
GE09ram_02su:379: catuṣpatheṣu rathyāsu caityeṣv aṭṭālakeṣu ca // RamS_2,6.11 //
GE09ram_02su:381: kuṭumbināṃ samṛddheṣu śrīmatsu bhavaneṣu ca // RamS_2,6.12 //
GE09ram_02su:382: sabhāsu caiva sarvāsu vṛkṣeṣv ālakṣiteṣu ca /
GE09ram_02su:383: dhvajāḥ samucchritāś citrāḥ patākāś cābhavaṃs tadā // RamS_2,6.13 //
GE09ram_02su:385: manaḥkarṇasukhā vācaḥ śuśruvuś ca tatas tataḥ // RamS_2,6.14 //
GE09ram_02su:386: rāmābhiṣekayuktāś ca kathāś cakrur mitho janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:387: rāmābhiṣeke samprāpte catvareṣu gṛheṣu ca // RamS_2,6.15 //
GE09ram_02su:389: rāmābhiṣekasaṃyuktāś cakrur eva mithaḥ kathāḥ // RamS_2,6.16 //
GE09ram_02su:391: rājamārgaḥ kṛtaḥ śrīmān paurai rāmābhiṣecane // RamS_2,6.17 //
GE09ram_02su:393: dīpavṛkṣāṃs tathā cakrur anu rathyāsu sarvaśaḥ // RamS_2,6.18 //
GE09ram_02su:396: sametya saṃghaśaḥ sarve catvareṣu sabhāsu ca /
GE09ram_02su:397: kathayanto mithas tatra praśaśaṃsur janādhipam // RamS_2,6.20 //
GE09ram_02su:399: jñātvā yo vṛddham ātmānaṃ rāmaṃ rājye 'hbiṣekṣyati // RamS_2,6.21 //
GE09ram_02su:400: sarve hy anugṛhītāḥ sma yan no rāmo mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:403: yathā ca bhrātṛṣu snigdhas tathāsmāsv api rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,6.23 //
GE09ram_02su:407: digbhyo 'pi śrutavṛttāntāḥ prāptā jānapadā janāḥ // RamS_2,6.25 //
GE09ram_02su:408: te tu digbhyaḥ purīṃ prāptā draṣṭuṃ rāmābhiṣecanam /
GE09ram_02su:409: rāmasya pūrayāmāsuḥ purīṃ jānapadā janāḥ // RamS_2,6.26 //
GE09ram_02su:410: janaughais tair visarpadbhiḥ śuśruve tatra nisvanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:412: tatas tad indrakṣayasaṃnibhaṃ puraṃ didṛkṣubhir jānapadair upāgataiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:413: samantataḥ sasvanam ākulaṃ babhau samudrayādobhir ivārṇavodakam // RamS_2,6.28 //
GE09ram_02su:416: jñātidāsī yato jātā kaikeyyās tu sahoṣitā /
GE09ram_02su:419: ayodhyāṃ mantharā tasmāt prāsādād anvavaikṣata // RamS_2,7.2 //
GE09ram_02su:421: siktāṃ candanatoyaiś ca śiraḥsnātajanair vṛtām // RamS_2,7.3 //
GE09ram_02su:422: avidūre sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhātrīṃ papraccha mantharā /
GE09ram_02su:424: rāmamātā dhanaṃ kiṃ nu janebhyaḥ samprayacchati /
GE09ram_02su:425: atimātraṃ praharṣo 'yaṃ kiṃ janasya ca śaṃsa me /
GE09ram_02su:426: kārayiṣyati kiṃ vāpi samprahṛṣṭo mahīpatiḥ // RamS_2,7.5 //
GE09ram_02su:428: ācacakṣe 'tha kubjāyai bhūyasīṃ rāghave śriyam // RamS_2,7.6 //
GE09ram_02su:431: dhātryās tu vacanaṃ śrutvā kubjā kṣipram amarṣitā /
GE09ram_02su:434: śayānām etya kaikeyīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,7.9 //
GE09ram_02su:435: uttiṣṭha mūḍhe kiṃ śeṣe bhayaṃ tvām abhivartate /
GE09ram_02su:436: upaplutamahaughena kim ātmānaṃ na budhyase // RamS_2,7.10 //
GE09ram_02su:438: calaṃ hi tava saubhāgyaṃ nadyāḥ srota ivoṣṇage // RamS_2,7.11 //
GE09ram_02su:439: evam uktā tu kaikeyī ruṣṭayā paruṣaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:440: kubjayā pāpadarśinyā viṣādam agamat param // RamS_2,7.12 //
GE09ram_02su:441: kaikeyī tv abravīt kubjāṃ kaccit kṣemaṃ na manthare /
GE09ram_02su:442: viṣaṇṇavadanāṃ hi tvāṃ lakṣaye bhṛśaduḥkhitām // RamS_2,7.13 //
GE09ram_02su:443: mantharā tu vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyyā madhurākṣaram /
GE09ram_02su:445: sā viṣaṇṇatarā bhūtvā kubjā tasyā hitaiṣiṇī /
GE09ram_02su:446: viṣādayantī provāca bhedayantī ca rāghavam // RamS_2,7.15 //
GE09ram_02su:451: tava duḥkhena kaikeyi mama duḥkhaṃ mahad bhavet /
GE09ram_02su:452: tvadvṛddhau mama vṛddhiś ca bhaved atra na saṃśayaḥ // RamS_2,7.18 //
GE09ram_02su:454: ugratvaṃ rājadharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ devi na budhyase // RamS_2,7.19 //
GE09ram_02su:455: dharmavādī śaṭho bhartā ślakṣṇavādī ca dāruṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:456: śuddhabhāve na jānīṣe tenaivam atisaṃdhitā // RamS_2,7.20 //
GE09ram_02su:458: arthenaivādya te bhartā kausalyāṃ yojayiṣyati // RamS_2,7.21 //
GE09ram_02su:459: apavāhya sa duṣṭātmā bharataṃ tava bandhuṣu /
GE09ram_02su:460: kālyaṃ sthāpayitā rāmaṃ rājye nihatakaṇṭake // RamS_2,7.22 //
GE09ram_02su:462: āśīviṣa ivāṅkena bāle paridhṛtas tvayā // RamS_2,7.23 //
GE09ram_02su:463: yathā hi kuryāt sarpo vā śatrur vā pratyupekṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:464: rājñā daśarathenādya saputrā tvaṃ tathā kṛtā // RamS_2,7.24 //
GE09ram_02su:466: rāmaṃ sthāpayatā rājye sānubandhā hatā hy asi // RamS_2,7.25 //
GE09ram_02su:467: sā prāptakālaṃ kaikeyi kṣipraṃ kuru hitaṃ tava /
GE09ram_02su:468: trāyasva putram ātmānaṃ māṃ ca vismayadarśane // RamS_2,7.26 //
GE09ram_02su:469: mantharāyā vacaḥ śrutvā śayanāt sa śubhānanā /
GE09ram_02su:470: evam ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pradadau śubham // RamS_2,7.27 //
GE09ram_02su:471: dattvā tv ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pramadottamā /
GE09ram_02su:472: kaikeyī mantharāṃ hṛṣṭā punar evābravīd idam // RamS_2,7.28 //
GE09ram_02su:473: idaṃ tu manthare mahyam ākhyāsi paramaṃ priyam /
GE09ram_02su:474: etan me priyam ākhyātuḥ kiṃ vā bhūyaḥ karomi te // RamS_2,7.29 //
GE09ram_02su:475: rāme vā bharate vāhaṃ viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye /
GE09ram_02su:476: tasmāt tuṣṭāsmi yad rājā rāmaṃ rājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // RamS_2,7.30 //
GE09ram_02su:477: na me paraṃ kiṃcid itas tvayā punaḥ priyaṃ priyārhe suvacaṃ vaco varam /
GE09ram_02su:478: tathā hy avocas tvam ataḥ priyottaraṃ varaṃ paraṃ te pradadāmi taṃ vṛṇu // RamS_2,7.31 //
GE09ram_02su:481: mantharā tv abhyasūyyainām utsṛjyābharaṇaṃ ca tat /
GE09ram_02su:483: harṣaṃ kim idam asthāne kṛtavaty asi bāliśe /
GE09ram_02su:486: yauvarājyena mahatā śvaḥ puṣyeṇa dvijottamaiḥ // RamS_2,8.3 //
GE09ram_02su:487: prāptāṃ sumahatīṃ prītiṃ pratītāṃ tāṃ hatadviṣam /
GE09ram_02su:488: upasthāsyasi kausalyāṃ dāsīva tvaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // RamS_2,8.4 //
GE09ram_02su:489: hṛṣṭāḥ khalu bhaviṣyanti rāmasya paramāḥ striyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:490: aprahṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti snuṣās te bharatakṣaye // RamS_2,8.5 //
GE09ram_02su:491: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītāṃ bruvantīṃ mantharāṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:492: rāmasyaiva guṇān devī kaikeyī praśaśaṃsa ha // RamS_2,8.6 //
GE09ram_02su:493: dharmajño gurubhir dāntaḥ kṛtajñaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02su:494: rāmo rājñaḥ suto jyeṣṭho yauvarājyam ato 'rhati // RamS_2,8.7 //
GE09ram_02su:495: bhrātḥn bhṛtyāṃś ca dīrghāyuḥ pitṛvat pālayiṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:496: saṃtapyase kathaṃ kubje śrutvā rāmābhiṣecanam // RamS_2,8.8 //
GE09ram_02su:497: bharataś cāpi rāmasya dhruvaṃ varṣaśatāt param /
GE09ram_02su:499: sā tvam abhyudaye prāpte vartamāne ca manthare /
GE09ram_02su:501: kausalyāto 'tiriktaṃ ca sa tu śuśrūṣate hi mām // RamS_2,8.10 //
GE09ram_02su:503: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya kaikeyīm idam abravīt // RamS_2,8.11 //
GE09ram_02su:506: bhavitā rāghavo rājā rāghavasya ca yaḥ sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:507: rājavaṃśāt tu bharataḥ kaikeyi parihāsyate // RamS_2,8.13 //
GE09ram_02su:508: na hi rājñaḥ sutāḥ sarve rājye tiṣṭhanti bhāmini /
GE09ram_02su:509: sthāpyamāneṣu sarveṣu sumahān anayo bhavet // RamS_2,8.14 //
GE09ram_02su:510: tasmāj jyeṣṭhe hi kaikeyi rājyatantrāṇi pārthivāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:511: sthāpayanty anavadyāṅgi guṇavatsv itareṣv api // RamS_2,8.15 //
GE09ram_02su:513: anāthavat sukhebhyaś ca rājavaṃśāc ca vatsale // RamS_2,8.16 //
GE09ram_02su:514: sāhaṃ tvadarthe samprāptā tvaṃ tu māṃ nāvabudhyase /
GE09ram_02su:515: sapatnivṛddhau yā me tvaṃ pradeyaṃ dātum icchasi // RamS_2,8.17 //
GE09ram_02su:516: dhruvaṃ tu bharataṃ rāmaḥ prāpya rājyam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:517: deśāntaraṃ nāyayitvā lokāntaram athāpi vā // RamS_2,8.18 //
GE09ram_02su:518: bāla eva hi mātulyaṃ bharato nāyitas tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:519: saṃnikarṣāc ca sauhārdaṃ jāyate sthāvareṣv api // RamS_2,8.19 //
GE09ram_02su:520: goptā hi rāmaṃ saumitrir lakṣmaṇaṃ cāpi rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:521: aśvinor iva saubhrātraṃ tayor lokeṣu viśrutam // RamS_2,8.20 //
GE09ram_02su:522: tasmān na lakṣmaṇe rāmaḥ pāpaṃ kiṃcit kariṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:523: rāmas tu bharate pāpaṃ kuryād iti na saṃśayaḥ // RamS_2,8.21 //
GE09ram_02su:524: tasmād rājagṛhād eva vanaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:525: etaddhi rocate mahyaṃ bhṛśaṃ cāpi hitaṃ tava // RamS_2,8.22 //
GE09ram_02su:526: evaṃ te jñātipakṣasya śreyaś caiva bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:527: yadi ced bharato dharmāt pitryaṃ rājyam avāpsyati // RamS_2,8.23 //
GE09ram_02su:528: sa te sukhocito bālo rāmasya sahajo ripuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:529: samṛddhārthasya naṣṭārtho jīviṣyati kathaṃ vaśe // RamS_2,8.24 //
GE09ram_02su:531: pracchādyamānaṃ rāmeṇa bharataṃ trātum arhasi // RamS_2,8.25 //
GE09ram_02su:533: rāmamātā sapatnī te kathaṃ vairaṃ na yātayet // RamS_2,8.26 //
GE09ram_02su:534: yadā hi rāmaḥ pṛthivīm avāpsyati dhruvaṃ pranaṣṭo bharato bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:535: ato hi saṃcintaya rājyam ātmaje parasya cādyaiva vivāsakāraṇam // RamS_2,8.27 //
GE09ram_02su:538: evam uktā tu kaikeyī krodhena jvalitānanā /
GE09ram_02su:539: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya mantharām idam abravīt // RamS_2,9.1 //
GE09ram_02su:540: adya rāmam itaḥ kṣipraṃ vanaṃ prasthāpayāmy aham /
GE09ram_02su:542: idaṃ tv idānīṃ saṃpaśya kenopāyena manthare /
GE09ram_02su:543: bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃcana // RamS_2,9.3 //
GE09ram_02su:544: evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī /
GE09ram_02su:545: rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kaikeyīm idam abravīt // RamS_2,9.4 //
GE09ram_02su:546: hantedānīṃ pravakṣyāmi kaikeyi śrūyatāṃ ca me /
GE09ram_02su:547: yathā te bharato rājyaṃ putraḥ prāpsyati kevalam // RamS_2,9.5 //
GE09ram_02su:548: śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasyā mantharāyās tu kaikayī /
GE09ram_02su:549: kiṃcid utthāya śayanāt svāstīrṇād idam abravīt // RamS_2,9.6 //
GE09ram_02su:551: bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃcana // RamS_2,9.7 //
GE09ram_02su:552: evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī /
GE09ram_02su:553: rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kubjā vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,9.8 //
GE09ram_02su:554: tava devāsure yuddhe saha rājarṣibhiḥ patiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:555: agacchat tvām upādāya devarājasya sāhyakṛt // RamS_2,9.9 //
GE09ram_02su:556: diśam āsthāya kaikeyi dakṣiṇāṃ daṇḍakān prati /
GE09ram_02su:557: vaijayantam iti khyātaṃ puraṃ yatra timidhvajaḥ // RamS_2,9.10 //
GE09ram_02su:558: sa śambara iti khyātaḥ śatamāyo mahāsuraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:559: dadau śakrasya saṃgrāmaṃ devasaṃghair anirjitaḥ // RamS_2,9.11 //
GE09ram_02su:560: tasmin mahati saṃgrāme rājā daśarathas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:561: apavāhya tvayā devi saṃgrāmān naṣṭacetanaḥ // RamS_2,9.12 //
GE09ram_02su:562: tatrāpi vikṣataḥ śastraiḥ patis te rakṣitas tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:563: tuṣṭena tena dattau te dvau varau śubhadarśane // RamS_2,9.13 //
GE09ram_02su:564: sa tvayoktaḥ patir devi yadeccheyaṃ tadā varau /
GE09ram_02su:565: gṛhṇīyām iti tat tena tathety uktaṃ mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02su:566: anabhijñā hy ahaṃ devi tvayaiva kathitaṃ purā // RamS_2,9.14 //*
GE09ram_02su:568: pravrājanaṃ ca rāmasya tvaṃ varṣāṇi caturdaśa // RamS_2,9.15 //
GE09ram_02su:571: mā smainaṃ pratyudīkṣethā mā cainam abhibhāṣathāḥ // RamS_2,9.16 //*
GE09ram_02su:572: dayitā tvaṃ sadā bhartur atra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:573: tvatkṛte ca mahārājo viśed api hutāśanam // RamS_2,9.17 //
GE09ram_02su:574: na tvāṃ krodhayituṃ śakto na kruddhāṃ pratyudīkṣitum /
GE09ram_02su:575: tava priyārthaṃ rājā hi prāṇān api parityajet // RamS_2,9.18 //
GE09ram_02su:576: na hy atikramituṃ śaktas tava vākyaṃ mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:579: dadyād daśaratho rājā mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ // RamS_2,9.20 //
GE09ram_02su:580: yau tau devāsure yuddhe varau daśaratho 'dadāt /
GE09ram_02su:581: tau smāraya mahābhāge so 'rtho mā tvām atikramet // RamS_2,9.21 //
GE09ram_02su:582: yadā tu te varaṃ dadyāt svayam utthāpya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:583: vyavasthāpya mahārājaṃ tvam imaṃ vṛṇuyā varam // RamS_2,9.22 //
GE09ram_02su:584: rāmaṃ pravrājayāraṇye nava varṣāṇi pañca ca /
GE09ram_02su:585: bharataḥ kriyatāṃ rājā pṛthivyāṃ pārthivarṣabhaḥ // RamS_2,9.23 //
GE09ram_02su:587: bharataś ca hatāmitras tava rājā bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,9.24 //
GE09ram_02su:588: yena kālena rāmaś ca vanāt pratyāgamiṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:589: tena kālena putras te kṛtamūlo bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:590: saṃgṛhītamanuṣyaś ca suhṛdbhiḥ sārdham ātmavān // RamS_2,9.25 //*
GE09ram_02su:591: prāptakālaṃ tu te manye rājānaṃ vītasādhvasā /
GE09ram_02su:593: anartham artharūpeṇa grāhitā sā tatas tayā /
GE09ram_02su:594: hṛṣṭā pratītā kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt // RamS_2,9.27 //
GE09ram_02su:596: pṛthivyām asi kubjānām uttamā buddhiniścaye // RamS_2,9.28 //
GE09ram_02su:597: tvam eva tu mamārtheṣu nityayuktā hitaiṣiṇī /
GE09ram_02su:598: nāhaṃ samavabudhyeyaṃ kubje rājñaś cikīrṣitam // RamS_2,9.29 //
GE09ram_02su:600: tvaṃ padmam iva vātena saṃnatā priyadarśanā // RamS_2,9.30 //
GE09ram_02su:601: uras te 'bhiniviṣṭaṃ vai yāvat skandhāt samunnatam /
GE09ram_02su:602: adhastāc codaraṃ śāntaṃ sunābham iva lajjitam // RamS_2,9.31 //
GE09ram_02su:604: jaṅghe bhṛśam upanyaste pādau cāpy āyatāv ubhau // RamS_2,9.32 //
GE09ram_02su:606: agrato mama gacchantī rājahaṃsīva rājase // RamS_2,9.33 //
GE09ram_02su:607: tavedaṃ sthagu yad dīrghaṃ rathaghoṇam ivāyatam /
GE09ram_02su:608: matayaḥ kṣatravidyāś ca māyāś cātra vasanti te // RamS_2,9.34 //
GE09ram_02su:609: atra te pratimokṣyāmi mālāṃ kubje hiraṇmayīm /
GE09ram_02su:610: abhiṣikte ca bharate rāghave ca vanaṃ gate // RamS_2,9.35 //
GE09ram_02su:612: labdhārthā ca pratītā ca lepayiṣyāmi te sthagu // RamS_2,9.36 //
GE09ram_02su:613: mukhe ca tilakaṃ citraṃ jātarūpamayaṃ śubham /
GE09ram_02su:614: kārayiṣyāmi te kubje śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca // RamS_2,9.37 //
GE09ram_02su:617: gamiṣyasi gatiṃ mukhyāṃ garvayantī dviṣajjanam // RamS_2,9.38 //*
GE09ram_02su:619: pādau paricariṣyanti yathaiva tvaṃ sadā mama // RamS_2,9.39 //
GE09ram_02su:620: iti praśasyamānā sā kaikeyīm idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:621: śayānāṃ śayane śubhre vedyām agniśikhām iva // RamS_2,9.40 //
GE09ram_02su:623: uttiṣṭha kuru kalyāṇaṃ rājānam anudarśaya // RamS_2,9.41 //
GE09ram_02su:624: tathā protsāhitā devī gatvā mantharayā saha /
GE09ram_02su:627: avamucya varārhāṇi śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca // RamS_2,9.43 //
GE09ram_02su:628: tato hemopamā tatra kubjā vākyavaśaṃ gatā /
GE09ram_02su:629: saṃviśya bhūmau kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt // RamS_2,9.44 //
GE09ram_02su:630: iha vā māṃ mṛtāṃ kubje nṛpāyāvedayiṣyasi /
GE09ram_02su:631: vanaṃ tu rāghave prāpte bharataḥ prāpsyati kṣitim // RamS_2,9.45 //
GE09ram_02su:632: athaitad uktvā vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ nidhāya sarvābharaṇāni bhāminī /
GE09ram_02su:633: asaṃvṛtām āstaraṇena medinīṃ tadādhiśiśye patiteva kiṃnarī // RamS_2,9.46 //
GE09ram_02su:635: narendrapatnī vimanā babhūva sā tamovṛtā dyaur iva magnatārakā // RamS_2,9.47 //
GE09ram_02su:639: priyārhāṃ priyam ākhyātuṃ viveśāntaḥpuraṃ vaśī // RamS_2,10.1 //
GE09ram_02su:640: tāṃ tatra patitāṃ bhūmau śayānām atathocitām /
GE09ram_02su:641: pratapta iva duḥkhena so 'paśyaj jagatīpatiḥ // RamS_2,10.2 //
GE09ram_02su:642: sa vṛddhas taruṇīṃ bhāryāṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm /
GE09ram_02su:644: kareṇum iva digdhena viddhāṃ mṛgayuṇā vane /
GE09ram_02su:645: mahāgaja ivāraṇye snehāt parimamarśa tām // RamS_2,10.4 //
GE09ram_02su:647: kāmī kamalapattrākṣīm uvāca vanitām idam // RamS_2,10.5 //
GE09ram_02su:648: na te 'ham abhijānāmi krodham ātmani saṃśritam /
GE09ram_02su:649: devi kenābhiyuktāsi kena vāsi vimānitā // RamS_2,10.6 //
GE09ram_02su:650: yad idaṃ mama duḥkhāya śeṣe kalyāṇi pāṃsuṣu /
GE09ram_02su:651: bhūmau śeṣe kimarthaṃ tvaṃ mayi kalyāṇacetasi /
GE09ram_02su:653: santi me kuśalā vaidyā abhituṣṭāś ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:654: sukhitāṃ tvāṃ kariṣyanti vyādhim ācakṣva bhāmini // RamS_2,10.8 //
GE09ram_02su:655: kasya vā te priyaṃ kāryaṃ kena vā vipriyaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:656: kaḥ priyaṃ labhatām adya ko vā sumahad apriyam // RamS_2,10.9 //
GE09ram_02su:657: avadhyo vadhyatāṃ ko vā vadhyaḥ ko vā vimucyatām /
GE09ram_02su:658: daridraḥ ko bhavatv āḍhyo dravyavān vāpy akiñcanaḥ // RamS_2,10.10 //
GE09ram_02su:659: ahaṃ caiva madīyāś ca sarve tava vaśānugāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:660: na te kaṃcid abhiprāyaṃ vyāhantum aham utsahe // RamS_2,10.11 //
GE09ram_02su:662: yāvad āvartate cakraṃ tāvatī me vasuṃdharā // RamS_2,10.12 //
GE09ram_02su:663: tathoktā sā samāśvastā vaktukāmā tad apriyam /
GE09ram_02su:665: nāsmi viprakṛtā deva kenacin na vimānitā /
GE09ram_02su:666: abhiprāyas tu me kaścit tam icchāmi tvayā kṛtam // RamS_2,10.14 //
GE09ram_02su:667: pratijñāṃ pratijānīṣva yadi tvaṃ kartum icchasi /
GE09ram_02su:668: atha tad vyāhariṣyāmi yad abhiprārthitaṃ mayā // RamS_2,10.15 //
GE09ram_02su:669: evam uktas tayā rājā priyayā strīvaśaṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:670: tām uvāca mahātejāḥ kaikeyīm īṣadutsmitaḥ // RamS_2,10.16 //
GE09ram_02su:671: avalipte na jānāsi tvattaḥ priyataro mama /
GE09ram_02su:672: manujo manujavyāghrād rāmād anyo na vidyate // RamS_2,10.17 //
GE09ram_02su:673: bhadre hṛdayam apy etad anumṛśyoddharasva me /
GE09ram_02su:674: etat samīkṣya kaikeyi brūhi yat sādhu manyase // RamS_2,10.18 //
GE09ram_02su:675: balam ātmani paśyantī na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:676: kariṣyāmi tava prītiṃ sukṛtenāpi te śape // RamS_2,10.19 //
GE09ram_02su:677: tena vākyena saṃhṛṣṭā tam abhiprāyam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:679: yathākrameṇa śapasi varaṃ mama dadāsi ca /
GE09ram_02su:680: tac chṛṇvantu trayastriṃśad devāḥ sendrapurogamāḥ // RamS_2,10.21 //
GE09ram_02su:681: candrādityau nabhaś caiva grahā rātryahanī diśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:682: jagac ca pṛthivī caiva sagandharvā sarākṣasā // RamS_2,10.22 //
GE09ram_02su:684: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni jānīyur bhāṣitaṃ tava // RamS_2,10.23 //
GE09ram_02su:686: varaṃ mama dadāty eṣa tan me śṛṇvantu devatāḥ // RamS_2,10.24 //
GE09ram_02su:688: tataḥ param uvācedaṃ varadaṃ kāmamohitam // RamS_2,10.25 //
GE09ram_02su:689: varau yau me tvayā deva tadā dattau mahīpate /
GE09ram_02su:690: tau tāvad aham adyaiva vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me vacaḥ // RamS_2,10.26 //
GE09ram_02su:693: nava pañca ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:696: adya caiva hi paśyeyaṃ prayāntaṃ rāghavaṃ vane // RamS_2,10.29 //
GE09ram_02su:697: tataḥ śrutvā mahārāja kaikeyyā dāruṇaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:698: vyathito vilavaś caiva vyāghrīṃ dṛṣṭvā yathā mṛgaḥ // RamS_2,10.30 //
GE09ram_02su:700: aho dhig iti sāmarṣo vācam uktvā narādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:702: cireṇa tu nṛpaḥ saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya suduḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:703: kaikeyīm abravīt kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣā // RamS_2,10.32 //
GE09ram_02su:705: kiṃ kṛtaṃ tava rāmeṇa pāpe pāpaṃ mayāpi vā // RamS_2,10.33 //
GE09ram_02su:706: sadā te jananītulyāṃ vṛttiṃ vahati rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:707: tasyaiva tvam anarthāya kiṃnimittam ihodyatā // RamS_2,10.34 //
GE09ram_02su:709: avijñānān nṛpasutā vyālī tīkṣṇaviṣā yathā // RamS_2,10.35 //
GE09ram_02su:711: aparādhaṃ kam uddiśya tyakṣyāmīṣṭam ahaṃ sutam // RamS_2,10.36 //
GE09ram_02su:712: kausalyāṃ vā sumitrāṃ vā tyajeyam api vā śriyam /
GE09ram_02su:713: jīvitaṃ vātmano rāmaṃ na tv eva pitṛvatsalam // RamS_2,10.37 //
GE09ram_02su:714: parā bhavati me prītir dṛṣṭvā tanayam agrajam /
GE09ram_02su:715: apaśyatas tu me rāmaṃ naṣṭā bhavati cetanā // RamS_2,10.38 //
GE09ram_02su:716: tiṣṭhel loko vinā sūryaṃ sasyaṃ vā salilaṃ vinā /
GE09ram_02su:717: na tu rāmaṃ vinā dehe tiṣṭhet tu mama jīvitam // RamS_2,10.39 //
GE09ram_02su:718: tad alaṃ tyajyatām eṣa niścayaḥ pāpaniścaye /
GE09ram_02su:719: api te caraṇau mūrdhnā spṛśāmy eṣa prasīda me // RamS_2,10.40 //
GE09ram_02su:720: sa bhūmipālo vilapann anāthavat striyā gṛhīto hṛdaye 'timātrayā /
GE09ram_02su:721: papāta devyāś caraṇau prasāritāv ubhāv asaṃspṛśya yathāturas tathā // RamS_2,10.41 //
GE09ram_02su:725: yayātim iva puṇyānte devalokāt paricyutam // RamS_2,11.1 //
GE09ram_02su:727: punar ākārayāmāsa tam eva varam aṅganā // RamS_2,11.2 //
GE09ram_02su:729: mama cemaṃ varaṃ kasmād vidhārayitum icchasi // RamS_2,11.3 //
GE09ram_02su:730: evam uktas tu kaikeyyā rājā daśarathas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:731: pratyuvāca tataḥ kruddho muhūrtaṃ vihvalann iva // RamS_2,11.4 //
GE09ram_02su:732: mṛte mayi gate rāme vanaṃ manujapuṃgave /
GE09ram_02su:733: hantānārye mamāmitre rāmaḥ pravrājito vanam // RamS_2,11.5 //
GE09ram_02su:734: yadi satyaṃ bravīmy etat tad asatyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:735: akīrtir atulā loke dhruvaṃ paribhavaś ca me // RamS_2,11.6 //
GE09ram_02su:737: astam abhyagamat sūryo rajanī cābhyavartata // RamS_2,11.7 //
GE09ram_02su:739: rājño vilapamānasya na vyabhāsata śarvarī // RamS_2,11.8 //
GE09ram_02su:743: atha vā gamyatāṃ śīghraṃ nāham icchāmi nirghṛṇām /
GE09ram_02su:744: nṛśaṃsāṃ kaikeyīṃ draṣṭuṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat // RamS_2,11.10 //*
GE09ram_02su:745: evam uktvā tato rājā kaikeyīṃ saṃyatāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_02su:746: prasādayāmāsa punaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt // RamS_2,11.11 //
GE09ram_02su:748: prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ devi bhadre rājño viśeṣataḥ // RamS_2,11.12 //
GE09ram_02su:750: kuru sādhu prasādaṃ me bāle sahṛdayā hy asi // RamS_2,11.13 //
GE09ram_02su:752: śrutvā vicitraṃ karuṇaṃ vilāpaṃ bhartur nṛśaṃsā na cakāra vākyam // RamS_2,11.14 //
GE09ram_02su:753: tataḥ sa rājā punar eva mūrchitaḥ priyām atuṣṭāṃ pratikūlabhāṣiṇīm /
GE09ram_02su:754: samīkṣya putrasya vivāsanaṃ prati kṣitau visaṃjño nipapāta duḥkhitaḥ // RamS_2,11.15 //
GE09ram_02su:758: viveṣṭamānam udīkṣya saikṣvākam idam abravīt // RamS_2,12.1 //
GE09ram_02su:759: pāpaṃ kṛtveva kim idaṃ mama saṃśrutya saṃśravam /
GE09ram_02su:760: śeṣe kṣititale sannaḥ sthityāṃ sthātuṃ tvam arhasi // RamS_2,12.2 //
GE09ram_02su:761: āhuḥ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ dharmavido janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:762: satyam āśritya hi mayā tvaṃ ca dharmaṃ pracoditaḥ // RamS_2,12.3 //
GE09ram_02su:763: saṃśrutya śaibyaḥ śyenāya svāṃ tanuṃ jagatīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:764: pradāya pakṣiṇo rājañ jagāma gatim uttamām // RamS_2,12.4 //
GE09ram_02su:765: tathā hy alarkas tejasvī brāhmaṇe vedapārage /
GE09ram_02su:766: yācamāne svake netre uddhṛtyāvimanā dadau // RamS_2,12.5 //
GE09ram_02su:767: saritāṃ tu patiḥ svalpāṃ maryādāṃ satyam anvitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:768: satyānurodhāt samaye velāṃ svāṃ nātivartate // RamS_2,12.6 //
GE09ram_02su:769: samayaṃ ca mamāryemaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi /
GE09ram_02su:770: agratas te parityaktā parityakṣyāmi jīvitam // RamS_2,12.7 //
GE09ram_02su:772: nāśakat pāśam unmoktuṃ balir indrakṛtaṃ yathā // RamS_2,12.8 //
GE09ram_02su:774: sa dhuryo vai parispandan yugacakrāntaraṃ yathā // RamS_2,12.9 //
GE09ram_02su:775: vihvalābhyāṃ ca netrābhyām apaśyann iva bhūmipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:776: kṛcchrād dhairyeṇa saṃstabhya kaikeyīm idam abravīt // RamS_2,12.10 //
GE09ram_02su:777: yas te mantrakṛtaḥ pāṇir agnau pāpe mayā dhṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:778: taṃ tyajāmi svajaṃ caiva tava putraṃ saha tvayā // RamS_2,12.11 //
GE09ram_02su:780: uvāca paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ vākyajñā roṣamūrchitā // RamS_2,12.12 //
GE09ram_02su:781: kim idaṃ bhāṣase rājan vākyaṃ gararujopamam /
GE09ram_02su:782: ānāyayitum akliṣṭaṃ putraṃ rāmam ihārhasi // RamS_2,12.13 //
GE09ram_02su:783: sthāpya rājye mama sutaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ vanecaram /
GE09ram_02su:784: niḥsapatnāṃ ca māṃ kṛtvā kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi // RamS_2,12.14 //
GE09ram_02su:785: sa nunna iva tīkṣṇeṇa pratodena hayottamaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:786: rājā pracodito 'bhīkṣṇaṃ kaikeyīm idam abravīt // RamS_2,12.15 //
GE09ram_02su:787: dharmabandhena baddho 'smi naṣṭā ca mama cetanā /
GE09ram_02su:788: jyeṣṭhaṃ putraṃ priyaṃ rāmaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi dhārmikam // RamS_2,12.16 //
GE09ram_02su:789: iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyī tadanantaram /
GE09ram_02su:790: svayam evābravīt sūtaṃ gaccha tvaṃ rāmam ānaya // RamS_2,12.17 //
GE09ram_02su:791: tataḥ sa rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sannaharṣaḥ sutaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:793: sumantraḥ karuṇaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā dīnaṃ ca pārthivam /
GE09ram_02su:794: pragṛhītāñjaliḥ kiṃcit tasmād deśād apākraman // RamS_2,12.19 //
GE09ram_02su:795: yadā vaktuṃ svayaṃ dainyān na śaśāka mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:796: tadā sumantraṃ mantrajñā kaikeyī pratyuvāca ha // RamS_2,12.20 //
GE09ram_02su:797: sumantra rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi śīghram ānaya sundaram /
GE09ram_02su:798: sa manyamānaḥ kalyāṇaṃ hṛdayena nananda ca // RamS_2,12.21 //
GE09ram_02su:801: iti sūto matiṃ kṛtvā harṣeṇa mahatā punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:803: tataḥ purastāt sahasā vinirgato mahīpatīn dvāragatān vilokayan /
GE09ram_02su:804: dadarśa paurān vividhān mahādhanān upasthitān dvāram upetya viṣṭhitān // RamS_2,12.24 //
GE09ram_02su:807: te tu tāṃ rajanīm uṣya brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:809: amātyā balamukhyāś ca mukhyā ye nigamasya ca /
GE09ram_02su:814: rāmaś ca samyagāstīrṇo bhāsvatā vyāghracarmaṇā // RamS_2,13.4 //
GE09ram_02su:816: yāś cānyāḥ saritaḥ puṇyā hradāḥ kūpāḥ sarāṃsi ca // RamS_2,13.5 //
GE09ram_02su:818: tābhyaś caivāhṛtaṃ toyaṃ samudrebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥ // RamS_2,13.6 //
GE09ram_02su:819: kṣaudraṃ dadhighṛtaṃ lājā darbhāḥ sumanasaḥ payaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:823: sajjaṃ tiṣṭhati rāmasya vālavyajanam uttamam // RamS_2,13.8 //
GE09ram_02su:826: pāṇḍuraś ca vṛṣaḥ sajjaḥ pāṇḍurāśvaś ca susthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:827: prasrutaś ca gajaḥ śrīmān aupavāhyaḥ pratīkṣate // RamS_2,13.10 //
GE09ram_02su:829: vāditrāṇi ca sarvāṇi bandinaś ca tathāpare // RamS_2,13.11 //
GE09ram_02su:833: apaśyanto 'bruvan ko nu rājño naḥ prativedayet // RamS_2,13.13 //
GE09ram_02su:834: na paśyāmaś ca rājānam uditaś ca divākaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:835: yauvarājyābhiṣekaś ca sajjo rāmasya dhīmataḥ // RamS_2,13.14 //
GE09ram_02su:837: abravīt tān idaṃ sarvān sumantro rājasatkṛtaḥ // RamS_2,13.15 //
GE09ram_02su:838: ayaṃ pṛcchāmi vacanāt sukham āyuṣmatām aham /
GE09ram_02su:843: budhyasva nṛpaśārdūla kuru kāryam anantaram // RamS_2,13.18 //
GE09ram_02su:844: brāhmaṇā balamukhyāś ca naigamāś cāgatā nṛpa /
GE09ram_02su:846: stuvantaṃ taṃ tadā sūtaṃ sumantraṃ mantrakovidam /
GE09ram_02su:847: pratibudhya tato rājā idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,13.20 //
GE09ram_02su:848: na caiva saṃprasupto 'ham ānayed āśu rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:849: iti rājā daśarathaḥ sūtaṃ tatrānvaśāt punaḥ // RamS_2,13.21 //
GE09ram_02su:850: sa rājavacanaṃ śrutvā śirasā pratipūjya tam /
GE09ram_02su:851: nirjagāma nṛpāvāsān manyamānaḥ priyaṃ mahat // RamS_2,13.22 //
GE09ram_02su:853: sa sūtas tatra śuśrāva rāmādhikaraṇāḥ kathāḥ // RamS_2,13.23 //
GE09ram_02su:860: sa vājiyuktena rathena sārathir narākulaṃ rājakulaṃ vilokayan /
GE09ram_02su:861: tataḥ samāsādya mahādhanaṃ mahat prahṛṣṭaromā sa babhūva sārathiḥ // RamS_2,13.27 //
GE09ram_02su:863: avāryamāṇaḥ praviveśa sārathiḥ prabhūtaratnaṃ makaro yathārṇavam // RamS_2,13.28 //
GE09ram_02su:867: praviviktāṃ tataḥ kakṣyām āsasāda purāṇavit // RamS_2,14.1 //
GE09ram_02su:871: dadarśa viṣṭhitān dvāri stryadhyakṣān susamāhitān // RamS_2,14.3 //
GE09ram_02su:877: dadarśa sūtaḥ paryaṅke sauvarṇe sottaracchade // RamS_2,14.6 //
GE09ram_02su:881: upetaṃ sītayā bhūyaś citrayā śaśinaṃ yathā // RamS_2,14.8 //
GE09ram_02su:883: vavande varadaṃ bandī niyamajño vinītavat // RamS_2,14.9 //
GE09ram_02su:886: kausalyā suprabhā deva pitā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati /
GE09ram_02su:887: mahiṣyā saha kaikeyyā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // RamS_2,14.11 //
GE09ram_02su:888: evam uktas tu saṃhṛṣṭo narasiṃho mahādyutiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:889: tataḥ saṃmānayāmāsa sītām idam uvāca ha // RamS_2,14.12 //
GE09ram_02su:890: devi devaś ca devī ca samāgamya madantare /
GE09ram_02su:894: yādṛśī pariṣat tatra tādṛśo dūta āgataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:895: dhruvam adyaiva māṃ rājā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // RamS_2,14.15 //
GE09ram_02su:896: hanta śīghram ito gatvā drakṣyāmi ca mahīpatim /
GE09ram_02su:897: saha tvaṃ parivāreṇa sukham āsva ramasva ca // RamS_2,14.16 //
GE09ram_02su:900: sa sarvān arthino dṛṣṭvā sametya pratinandya ca /
GE09ram_02su:905: prayayau tūrṇam āsthāya rāghavo jvalitaḥ śriyā // RamS_2,14.20 //
GE09ram_02su:907: niketān niryayau śrīmān mahābhrād iva candramāḥ // RamS_2,14.21 //
GE09ram_02su:909: jugopa bhrātaraṃ bhrātā ratham āsthāya pṛṣṭhataḥ // RamS_2,14.22 //
GE09ram_02su:912: sa rāghavas tatra kathāpralāpaṃ śuśrāva lokasya samāgatasya /
GE09ram_02su:913: ātmādhikārā vividhāś ca vācaḥ prahṛṣṭarūpasya pure janasya // RamS_2,14.24 //
GE09ram_02su:914: eṣa śriyaṃ gacchati rāghavo 'dya rājaprasādād vipulāṅgam iṣyan /
GE09ram_02su:915: ete vayaṃ sarvasamṛddhakāmā yeṣām ayaṃ no bhavitā praśāstā /
GE09ram_02su:916: lābho janasyāsya yad eṣa sarvaṃ prapatsyate rāṣṭram idaṃ cirāya // RamS_2,14.25 //*
GE09ram_02su:917: sa ghoṣavadbhiś ca hayaiḥ sanāgaiḥ puraḥsaraiḥ svastikasūtamāgadhaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:918: mahīyamānaḥ pravaraiś ca vādakair abhiṣṭuto vaiśravaṇo yathā yayau // RamS_2,14.26 //
GE09ram_02su:920: prabhūtaratnaṃ bahupaṇyasaṃcayaṃ dadarśa rāmo ruciraṃ mahāpatham // RamS_2,14.27 //
GE09ram_02su:928: saṃvṛtaṃ vividhaiḥ paṇyair bhakṣyair uccāvacair api // RamS_2,15.3 //
GE09ram_02su:930: yathārhaṃ cāpi sampūjya sarvān eva narān yayau // RamS_2,15.4 //
GE09ram_02su:933: yathā sma lālitāḥ pitrā yathā pūrvaiḥ pitāmahaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:934: tataḥ sukhataraṃ sarve rāme vatsyāma rājani // RamS_2,15.6 //
GE09ram_02su:935: alam adya hi bhuktena paramārthair alaṃ ca naḥ /
GE09ram_02su:936: yathā paśyāma niryāntaṃ rāmaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhitam // RamS_2,15.7 //
GE09ram_02su:937: ato hi na priyataraṃ nānyat kiṃcid bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:939: etāś cānyāś ca suhṛdām udāsīnaḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:940: ātmasaṃpūjanīḥ śṛṇvan yayau rāmo mahāpatham // RamS_2,15.9 //
GE09ram_02su:941: na hi tasmān manaḥ kaścic cakṣuṣī vā narottamāt /
GE09ram_02su:942: naraḥ śaknoty apākraṣṭum atikrānte 'pi rāghave // RamS_2,15.10 //
GE09ram_02su:943: sarveṣāṃ sa hi dharmātmā varṇānāṃ kurute dayām /
GE09ram_02su:944: caturṇāṃ hi vayaḥsthānāṃ tena te tam anuvratāḥ // RamS_2,15.11 //
GE09ram_02su:946: rājaputraḥ pitur veśma praviveśa śriyā jvalan // RamS_2,15.12 //
GE09ram_02su:948: saṃnivartya janaṃ sarvaṃ śuddhāntaḥpuram abhyagāt // RamS_2,15.13 //
GE09ram_02su:949: tataḥ praviṣṭe pitur antikaṃ tadā janaḥ sa sarvo mudito nṛpātmaje /
GE09ram_02su:950: pratīkṣate tasya punaḥ sma nirgamaṃ yathodayaṃ candramasaḥ saritpatiḥ // RamS_2,15.14 //
GE09ram_02su:953: sa dadarśāsane rāmo niṣaṇṇaṃ pitaraṃ śubhe /
GE09ram_02su:955: sa pituś caraṇau pūrvam abhivādya vinītavat /
GE09ram_02su:956: tato vavande caraṇau kaikeyyāḥ susamāhitaḥ // RamS_2,16.2 //
GE09ram_02su:958: śaśāka nṛpatir dīno nekṣituṃ nābhibhāṣitum // RamS_2,16.3 //
GE09ram_02su:959: tad apūrvaṃ narapater dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ bhayāvaham /
GE09ram_02su:960: rāmo 'pi bhayam āpannaḥ padā spṛṣṭveva pannagam // RamS_2,16.4 //
GE09ram_02su:964: upaplutam ivādityam uktānṛtam ṛṣiṃ yathā // RamS_2,16.6 //
GE09ram_02su:965: acintyakalpaṃ hi pitus taṃ śokam upadhārayan /
GE09ram_02su:966: babhūva saṃrabdhataraḥ samudra iva parvaṇi // RamS_2,16.7 //
GE09ram_02su:967: cintayāmāsa ca tadā rāmaḥ pitṛhite rataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:968: kiṃsvid adyaiva nṛpatir na māṃ pratyabhinandati // RamS_2,16.8 //
GE09ram_02su:969: anyadā māṃ pitā dṛṣṭvā kupito 'pi prasīdati /
GE09ram_02su:970: tasya mām adya samprekṣya kimāyāsaḥ pravartate // RamS_2,16.9 //
GE09ram_02su:972: kaikeyīm abhivādyaiva rāmo vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,16.10 //
GE09ram_02su:973: kaccin mayā nāparādham ajñānād yena me pitā /
GE09ram_02su:974: kupitas tan mamācakṣva tvaṃ caivainaṃ prasādaya // RamS_2,16.11 //
GE09ram_02su:975: vivarṇavadano dīno na hi mām abhibhāṣate /
GE09ram_02su:976: śārīro mānaso vāpi kaccid enaṃ na bādhate /
GE09ram_02su:977: saṃtāpo vābhitāpo vā durlabhaṃ hi sadā sukham // RamS_2,16.12 //*
GE09ram_02su:978: kaccin na kiṃcid bharate kumāre priyadarśane /
GE09ram_02su:979: śatrughne vā mahāsattve mātḥṇāṃ vā mamāśubham // RamS_2,16.13 //
GE09ram_02su:980: atoṣayan mahārājam akurvan vā pitur vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:981: muhūrtam api neccheyaṃ jīvituṃ kupite nṛpe // RamS_2,16.14 //
GE09ram_02su:983: kathaṃ tasmin na varteta pratyakṣe sati daivate // RamS_2,16.15 //
GE09ram_02su:984: kaccit te paruṣaṃ kiṃcid abhimānāt pitā mama /
GE09ram_02su:985: ukto bhavatyā kopena yatrāsya lulitaṃ manaḥ // RamS_2,16.16 //
GE09ram_02su:986: etad ācakṣva me devi tattvena paripṛcchataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:988: ahaṃ hi vacanād rājñaḥ pateyam api pāvake /
GE09ram_02su:989: bhakṣayeyaṃ viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ majjeyam api cārṇave /
GE09ram_02su:990: niyukto guruṇā pitrā nṛpeṇa ca hitena ca // RamS_2,16.18 //*
GE09ram_02su:991: tad brūhi vacanaṃ devi rājño yad abhikāṅkṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:992: kariṣye pratijāne ca rāmo dvir nābhibhāṣate // RamS_2,16.19 //
GE09ram_02su:994: uvāca rāmaṃ kaikeyī vacanaṃ bhṛśadāruṇam // RamS_2,16.20 //
GE09ram_02su:995: purā devāsure yuddhe pitrā te mama rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:996: rakṣitena varau dattau saśalyena mahāraṇe // RamS_2,16.21 //
GE09ram_02su:998: gamanaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye tava cādyaiva rāghava // RamS_2,16.22 //
GE09ram_02su:999: yadi satyapratijñaṃ tvaṃ pitaraṃ kartum icchasi /
GE09ram_02su:1000: ātmānaṃ ca naraśreṣṭha mama vākyam idaṃ śṛṇu // RamS_2,16.23 //
GE09ram_02su:1001: sa nideśe pitus tiṣṭha yathā tena pratiśrutam /
GE09ram_02su:1002: tvayāraṇyaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca // RamS_2,16.24 //
GE09ram_02su:1003: sapta sapta ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1004: abhiṣekam imaṃ tyaktvā jaṭācīradharo vasa // RamS_2,16.25 //
GE09ram_02su:1008: śrutvā na vivyathe rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt // RamS_2,16.27 //
GE09ram_02su:1009: evam astu gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ vastum ahaṃ tv ataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1011: idaṃ tu jñātum icchāmi kimarthaṃ māṃ mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1013: manyur na ca tvayā kāryo devi brūhi tavāgrataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1014: yāsyāmi bhava suprītā vanaṃ cīrajaṭādharaḥ // RamS_2,16.30 //
GE09ram_02su:1015: hitena guruṇā pitrā kṛtajñena nṛpeṇa ca /
GE09ram_02su:1016: niyujyamāno viśrabdhaṃ kiṃ na kuryād ahaṃ priyam // RamS_2,16.31 //
GE09ram_02su:1017: alīkaṃ mānasaṃ tv ekaṃ hṛdayaṃ dahatīva me /
GE09ram_02su:1018: svayaṃ yan nāha māṃ rājā bharatasyābhiṣecanam // RamS_2,16.32 //
GE09ram_02su:1019: ahaṃ hi sītāṃ rājyaṃ ca prāṇān iṣṭān dhanāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:1020: hṛṣṭo bhrātre svayaṃ dadyāṃ bharatāyāpracoditaḥ // RamS_2,16.33 //
GE09ram_02su:1021: kiṃ punar manujendreṇa svayaṃ pitrā pracoditaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1022: tava ca priyakāmārthaṃ pratijñām anupālayan // RamS_2,16.34 //
GE09ram_02su:1023: tad āśvāsaya hīmaṃ tvaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ yan mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1028: avicārya pitur vākyaṃ samāvastuṃ caturdaśa // RamS_2,16.37 //
GE09ram_02su:1029: sā hṛṣṭā tasya tadvākyaṃ śrutvā rāmasya kaikeyī /
GE09ram_02su:1030: prasthānaṃ śraddadhānā hi tvarayāmāsa rāghavam // RamS_2,16.38 //
GE09ram_02su:1031: evaṃ bhavatu yāsyanti dūtāḥ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1033: tava tv ahaṃ kṣamaṃ manye notsukasya vilambanam /
GE09ram_02su:1034: rāma tasmād itaḥ śīghraṃ vanaṃ tvaṃ gantum arhasi // RamS_2,16.40 //
GE09ram_02su:1035: vrīḍānvitaḥ svayaṃ yac ca nṛpas tvāṃ nābhibhāṣate /
GE09ram_02su:1036: naitat kiṃcin naraśreṣṭha manyur eṣo 'panīyatām // RamS_2,16.41 //
GE09ram_02su:1037: yāvat tvaṃ na vanaṃ yātaḥ purād asmād abhitvaran /
GE09ram_02su:1038: pitā tāvan na te rāma snāsyate bhokṣyate 'pi vā // RamS_2,16.42 //
GE09ram_02su:1039: dhik kaṣṭam iti niḥśvasya rājā śokapariplutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1040: mūrchito nyapatat tasmin paryaṅke hemabhūṣite // RamS_2,16.43 //
GE09ram_02su:1042: kaśayevāhato vājī vanaṃ gantuṃ kṛtatvaraḥ // RamS_2,16.44 //
GE09ram_02su:1044: śrutvā gatavyatho rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,16.45 //
GE09ram_02su:1045: nāham arthaparo devi lokam āvastum utsahe /
GE09ram_02su:1046: viddhi mām ṛṣibhis tulyaṃ kevalaṃ dharmam āsthitam // RamS_2,16.46 //
GE09ram_02su:1047: yad atrabhavataḥ kiṃcic chakyaṃ kartuṃ priyaṃ mayā /
GE09ram_02su:1048: prāṇān api parityajya sarvathā kṛtam eva tat // RamS_2,16.47 //
GE09ram_02su:1049: na hy ato dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃcid asti mahattaram /
GE09ram_02su:1050: yathā pitari śuśrūṣā tasya vā vacanakriyā // RamS_2,16.48 //
GE09ram_02su:1052: vane vatsyāmi vijane varṣāṇīha caturdaśa // RamS_2,16.49 //
GE09ram_02su:1053: na nūnaṃ mayi kaikeyi kiṃcid āśaṃsase guṇam /
GE09ram_02su:1054: yad rājānam avocas tvaṃ mameśvaratarā satī // RamS_2,16.50 //
GE09ram_02su:1055: yāvan mātaram āpṛcche sītāṃ cānunayāmy aham /
GE09ram_02su:1056: tato 'dyaiva gamiṣyāmi daṇḍakānāṃ mahad vanam // RamS_2,16.51 //
GE09ram_02su:1057: bharataḥ pālayed rājyaṃ śuśrūṣec ca pitur yathā /
GE09ram_02su:1058: tathā bhavatyā kartavyaṃ sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // RamS_2,16.52 //
GE09ram_02su:1059: sa rāmasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ duḥkhahataḥ pitā /
GE09ram_02su:1060: śokād aśaknuvan bāṣpaṃ praruroda mahāsvanam // RamS_2,16.53 //
GE09ram_02su:1061: vanditvā caraṇau rāmo visaṃjñasya pitus tadā /
GE09ram_02su:1062: kaikeyyāś cāpy anāryāyā niṣpapāta mahādyutiḥ // RamS_2,16.54 //
GE09ram_02su:1063: sa rāmaḥ pitaraṃ kṛtvā kaikeyīṃ ca pradakṣiṇam /
GE09ram_02su:1064: niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt svaṃ dadarśa suhṛjjanam // RamS_2,16.55 //
GE09ram_02su:1068: śanair jagāma sāpekṣo dṛṣṭiṃ tatrāvicālayan // RamS_2,16.57 //
GE09ram_02su:1070: lokakāntasya kāntatvaṃ śītaraśmer iva kṣapā // RamS_2,16.58 //
GE09ram_02su:1071: na vanaṃ gantukāmasya tyajataś ca vasuṃdharām /
GE09ram_02su:1073: dhārayan manasā duḥkham indriyāṇi nigṛhya ca /
GE09ram_02su:1075: praviśya veśmātibhṛśaṃ mudānvitaṃ samīkṣya tāṃ cārthavipattim āgatām /
GE09ram_02su:1076: na caiva rāmo 'tra jagāma vikriyāṃ suhṛjjanasyātmavipattiśaṅkayā // RamS_2,16.61 //
GE09ram_02su:1079: rāmas tu bhṛśam āyasto niḥśvasann iva kuñjaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1080: jagāma sahito bhrātrā mātur antaḥpuraṃ vaśī // RamS_2,17.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1082: upaviṣṭaṃ gṛhadvāri tiṣṭhataś cāparān bahūn // RamS_2,17.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1083: praviśya prathamāṃ kakṣyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1085: praṇamya rāmas tān vṛddhāṃs tṛtīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1086: striyo vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca dvārarakṣaṇatatparāḥ // RamS_2,17.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1087: vardhayitvā prahṛṣṭās tāḥ praviśya ca gṛhaṃ striyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1088: nyavedayanta tvaritā rāmamātuḥ priyaṃ tadā // RamS_2,17.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1089: kausalyāpi tadā devī rātriṃ sthitvā samāhitā /
GE09ram_02su:1090: prabhāte tv akarot pūjāṃ viṣṇoḥ putrahitaiṣiṇī // RamS_2,17.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1092: agniṃ juhoti sma tadā mantravat kṛtamaṅgalā // RamS_2,17.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1093: praviśya ca tadā rāmo mātur antaḥpuraṃ śubham /
GE09ram_02su:1094: dadarśa mātaraṃ tatra hāvayantīṃ hutāśanam // RamS_2,17.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1096: abhicakrāma saṃhṛṣṭā kiśoraṃ vaḍabā yathā // RamS_2,17.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1097: tam uvāca durādharṣaṃ rāghavaṃ sutam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1098: kausalyā putravātsalyād idaṃ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,17.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1100: prāpnuhy āyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca dharmaṃ copahitaṃ kule // RamS_2,17.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1102: adyaiva hi tvāṃ dharmātmā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // RamS_2,17.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1104: sa svabhāvavinītaś ca gauravāc ca tadānataḥ // RamS_2,17.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1105: devi nūnaṃ na jānīṣe mahad bhayam upasthitam /
GE09ram_02su:1106: idaṃ tava ca duḥkhāya vaidehyā lakṣmaṇasya ca // RamS_2,17.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1107: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vatsyāmi vijane vane /
GE09ram_02su:1108: madhumūlaphalair jīvan hitvā munivad āmiṣam // RamS_2,17.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1110: māṃ punar daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ vivāsayati tāpasam // RamS_2,17.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1111: tām aduḥkhocitāṃ dṛṣṭvā patitāṃ kadalīm iva /
GE09ram_02su:1117: yadi putra na jāyethā mama śokāya rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:1118: na sma duḥkham ato bhūyaḥ paśyeyam aham aprajā // RamS_2,17.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1119: eka eva hi vandhyāyāḥ śoko bhavati mānavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1120: aprajāsmīti saṃtāpo na hy anyaḥ putra vidyate // RamS_2,17.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1121: na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kalyāṇaṃ sukhaṃ vā patipauruṣe /
GE09ram_02su:1122: api putre vipaśyeyam iti rāmāsthitaṃ mayā // RamS_2,17.22 //
GE09ram_02su:1124: ahaṃ śroṣye sapatnīnām avarāṇāṃ varā satī /
GE09ram_02su:1125: ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu pramadānāṃ bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,17.23 //*
GE09ram_02su:1126: tvayi saṃnihite 'py evam aham āsaṃ nirākṛtā /
GE09ram_02su:1127: kiṃ punaḥ proṣite tāta dhruvaṃ maraṇam eva me // RamS_2,17.24 //
GE09ram_02su:1128: yo hi māṃ sevate kaścid atha vāpy anuvartate /
GE09ram_02su:1129: kaikeyyāḥ putram anvīkṣya sa jano nābhibhāṣate // RamS_2,17.25 //
GE09ram_02su:1130: daśa sapta ca varṣāṇi tava jātasya rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:1132: upavāsaiś ca yogaiś ca bahubhiś ca pariśramaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1133: duḥkhaṃ saṃvardhito moghaṃ tvaṃ hi durgatayā mayā // RamS_2,17.27 //
GE09ram_02su:1134: sthiraṃ tu hṛdayaṃ manye mamedaṃ yan na dīryate /
GE09ram_02su:1135: prāvṛṣīva mahānadyāḥ spṛṣṭaṃ kūlaṃ navāmbhasā // RamS_2,17.28 //
GE09ram_02su:1136: mamaiva nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ na vidyate na cāvakāśo 'sti yamakṣaye mama /
GE09ram_02su:1137: yad antako 'dyaiva na māṃ jihīrṣati prasahya siṃho rudatīṃ mṛgīm iva // RamS_2,17.29 //
GE09ram_02su:1138: sthiraṃ hi nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ mamāyasaṃ na bhidyate yad bhuvi nāvadīryate /
GE09ram_02su:1139: anena duḥkhena ca deham arpitaṃ dhruvaṃ hy akāle maraṇaṃ na vidyate // RamS_2,17.30 //
GE09ram_02su:1140: idaṃ tu duḥkhaṃ yad anarthakāni me vratāni dānāni ca saṃyamāś ca hi /
GE09ram_02su:1141: tapaś ca taptaṃ yad apatyakāraṇāt suniṣphalaṃ bījam ivoptam ūṣare // RamS_2,17.31 //
GE09ram_02su:1142: yadi hy akāle maraṇaṃ svayecchayā labheta kaścid guruduḥkhakarśitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1143: gatāham adyaiva paretasaṃsadaṃ vinā tvayā dhenur ivātmajena vai // RamS_2,17.32 //
GE09ram_02su:1144: bhṛśam asukham amarṣitā tadā bahu vilalāpa samīkṣya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:1145: vyasanam upaniśāmya sā mahat sutam iva baddham avekṣya kiṃnarī // RamS_2,17.33 //
GE09ram_02su:1148: tathā tu vilapantīṃ tāṃ kausalyāṃ rāmamātaram /
GE09ram_02su:1149: uvāca lakṣmaṇo dīnas tat kālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,18.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1150: na rocate mamāpy etad ārye yad rāghavo vanam /
GE09ram_02su:1151: tyaktvā rājyaśriyaṃ gacchet striyā vākyavaśaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,18.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1152: viparītaś ca vṛddhaś ca viṣayaiś ca pradharṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1153: nṛpaḥ kim iva na brūyāc codyamānaḥ samanmathaḥ // RamS_2,18.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1155: yena nirvāsyate rāṣṭrād vanavāsāya rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,18.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1156: na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ loke parokṣam api yo naraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1157: amitro 'pi nirasto 'pi yo 'sya doṣam udāharet // RamS_2,18.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1158: devakalpam ṛjuṃ dāntaṃ ripūṇām api vatsalam /
GE09ram_02su:1159: avekṣamāṇaḥ ko dharmaṃ tyajet putram akāraṇāt // RamS_2,18.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1160: tad idaṃ vacanaṃ rājñaḥ punar bālyam upeyuṣaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1161: putraḥ ko hṛdaye kuryād rājavṛttam anusmaran // RamS_2,18.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1162: yāvad eva na jānāti kaścid artham imaṃ naraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1163: tāvad eva mayā sārdham ātmasthaṃ kuru śāsanam // RamS_2,18.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1164: mayā pārśve sadhanuṣā tava guptasya rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:1165: kaḥ samartho 'dhikaṃ kartuṃ kṛtāntasyeva tiṣṭhataḥ // RamS_2,18.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1167: kariṣyāmi śarais tīkṣṇair yadi sthāsyati vipriye // RamS_2,18.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1168: bharatasyātha pakṣyo vā yo vāsya hitam icchati /
GE09ram_02su:1169: sarvān etān vadhiṣyāmi mṛdur hi paribhūyate // RamS_2,18.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1170: tvayā caiva mayā caiva kṛtvā vairam anuttamam /
GE09ram_02su:1171: kasya śaktiḥ śriyaṃ dātuṃ bharatāyāriśāsana // RamS_2,18.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1173: satyena dhanuṣā caiva datteneṣṭena te śape // RamS_2,18.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1174: dīptam agnim araṇyaṃ vā yadi rāmaḥ pravekṣyate /
GE09ram_02su:1175: praviṣṭaṃ tatra māṃ devi tvaṃ pūrvam avadhāraya // RamS_2,18.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1176: harāmi vīryād duḥkhaṃ te tamaḥ sūrya ivoditaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1177: devī paśyatu me vīryaṃ rāghavaś caiva paśyatu // RamS_2,18.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1178: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1179: uvāca rāmaṃ kausalyā rudantī śokalālasā // RamS_2,18.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1180: bhrātus te vadataḥ putra lakṣmaṇasya śrutaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:1181: yad atrānantaraṃ tat tvaṃ kuruṣva yadi rocate // RamS_2,18.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1182: na cādharmyaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sapatnyā mama bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:1183: vihāya śokasaṃtaptāṃ gantum arhasi mām itaḥ // RamS_2,18.18 //
GE09ram_02su:1184: dharmajña yadi dharmiṣṭho dharmaṃ caritum icchasi /
GE09ram_02su:1185: śuśrūṣa mām ihasthas tvaṃ cara dharmam anuttamam // RamS_2,18.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1186: śuśrūṣur jananīṃ putra svagṛhe niyato vasan /
GE09ram_02su:1187: pareṇa tapasā yuktaḥ kāśyapas tridivaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,18.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1188: yathaiva rājā pūjyas te gauraveṇa tathā hy aham /
GE09ram_02su:1189: tvāṃ nāham anujānāmi na gantavyam ito vanam // RamS_2,18.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1190: tvadviyogān na me kāryaṃ jīvitena sukhena vā /
GE09ram_02su:1191: tvayā saha mama śreyas tṛṇānām api bhakṣaṇam // RamS_2,18.22 //
GE09ram_02su:1192: yadi tvaṃ yāsyasi vanaṃ tyaktvā māṃ śokalālasām /
GE09ram_02su:1193: ahaṃ prāyam ihāsiṣye na hi śakṣyāmi jīvitum // RamS_2,18.23 //
GE09ram_02su:1194: tatas tvaṃ prāpsyase putra nirayaṃ lokaviśrutam /
GE09ram_02su:1195: brahmahatyām ivādharmāt samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // RamS_2,18.24 //
GE09ram_02su:1196: vilapantīṃ tathā dīnāṃ kausalyāṃ jananīṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1197: uvāca rāmo dharmātmā vacanaṃ dharmasaṃhitam // RamS_2,18.25 //
GE09ram_02su:1198: nāsti śaktiḥ pitur vākyaṃ samatikramituṃ mama /
GE09ram_02su:1199: prasādaye tvāṃ śirasā gantum icchāmy ahaṃ vanam // RamS_2,18.26 //
GE09ram_02su:1200: ṛṣiṇā ca pitur vākyaṃ kurvatā vratacāriṇā /
GE09ram_02su:1201: gaur hatā jānatā dharmaṃ kaṇḍunāpi vipaścitā // RamS_2,18.27 //
GE09ram_02su:1202: asmākaṃ ca kule pūrvaṃ sagarasyājñayā pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1203: khanadbhiḥ sāgarair bhūtim avāptaḥ sumahān vadhaḥ // RamS_2,18.28 //
GE09ram_02su:1206: na khalv etan mayaikena kriyate pitṛśāsanam /
GE09ram_02su:1207: pūrvair ayam abhipreto gato mārgo 'nugamyate // RamS_2,18.30 //
GE09ram_02su:1208: tad etat tu mayā kāryaṃ kriyate bhuvi nānyathā /
GE09ram_02su:1209: pitur hi vacanaṃ kurvan na kaścin nāma hīyate // RamS_2,18.31 //
GE09ram_02su:1210: tām evam uktvā jananīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ punar abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:1211: tava lakṣmaṇa jānāmi mayi sneham anuttamam /
GE09ram_02su:1212: abhiprāyam avijñāya satyasya ca śamasya ca // RamS_2,18.32 //*
GE09ram_02su:1213: dharmo hi paramo loke dharme satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GE09ram_02su:1214: dharmasaṃśritam etac ca pitur vacanam uttamam // RamS_2,18.33 //
GE09ram_02su:1215: saṃśrutya ca pitur vākyaṃ mātur vā brāhmaṇasya vā /
GE09ram_02su:1216: na kartavyaṃ vṛthā vīra dharmam āśritya tiṣṭhatā // RamS_2,18.34 //
GE09ram_02su:1217: so 'haṃ na śakṣyāmi pitur niyogam ativartitum /
GE09ram_02su:1218: pitur hi vacanād vīra kaikeyyāhaṃ pracoditaḥ // RamS_2,18.35 //
GE09ram_02su:1220: dharmam āśraya mā taikṣṇyaṃ madbuddhir anugamyatām // RamS_2,18.36 //
GE09ram_02su:1221: tam evam uktvā sauhārdād bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1222: uvāca bhūyaḥ kausalyāṃ prāñjaliḥ śirasānataḥ // RamS_2,18.37 //
GE09ram_02su:1223: anumanyasva māṃ devi gamiṣyantam ito vanam /
GE09ram_02su:1224: śāpitāsi mama prāṇaiḥ kuru svastyayanāni me /
GE09ram_02su:1225: tīrṇapratijñaś ca vanāt punar eṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm // RamS_2,18.38 //*
GE09ram_02su:1226: yaśo hy ahaṃ kevalarājyakāraṇān na pṛṣṭhataḥ kartum alaṃ mahodayam /
GE09ram_02su:1227: adīrghakāle na tu devi jīvite vṛṇe 'varām adya mahīm adharmataḥ // RamS_2,18.39 //
GE09ram_02su:1228: prasādayan naravṛṣabhaḥ sa mātaraṃ parākramāj jigamiṣur eva daṇḍakān /
GE09ram_02su:1229: athānujaṃ bhṛśam anuśāsya darśanaṃ cakāra tāṃ hṛdi jananīṃ pradakṣiṇam // RamS_2,18.40 //
GE09ram_02su:1232: atha taṃ vyathayā dīnaṃ saviśeṣam amarṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:1234: āsādya rāmaḥ saumitriṃ suhṛdaṃ bhrātaraṃ priyam /
GE09ram_02su:1235: uvācedaṃ sa dhairyeṇa dhārayan sattvam ātmavān // RamS_2,19.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1239: mātā naḥ sā yathā na syāt saviśaṅkā tathā kuru // RamS_2,19.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1240: tasyāḥ śaṅkāmayaṃ duḥkhaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe /
GE09ram_02su:1243: mātḥṇāṃ vā pitur vāhaṃ kṛtam alpaṃ ca vipriyam // RamS_2,19.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1245: paralokabhayād bhīto nirbhayo 'stu pitā mama // RamS_2,19.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1246: tasyāpi hi bhaved asmin karmaṇy apratisaṃhṛte /
GE09ram_02su:1247: satyaṃ neti manastāpas tasya tāpas tapec ca mām // RamS_2,19.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1249: anvag evāham icchāmi vanaṃ gantum itaḥ punaḥ // RamS_2,19.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1251: sutaṃ bharatam avyagram abhiṣecayitā tataḥ // RamS_2,19.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1253: gate 'raṇyaṃ ca kaikeyyā bhaviṣyati manaḥsukham // RamS_2,19.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1254: buddhiḥ praṇītā yeneyaṃ manaś ca susamāhitam /
GE09ram_02su:1255: tat tu nārhāmi saṃkleṣṭuṃ pravrajiṣyāmi māciram // RamS_2,19.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1256: kṛtāntas tv eva saumitre draṣṭavyo matpravāsane /
GE09ram_02su:1257: rājyasya ca vitīrṇasya punar eva nivartane // RamS_2,19.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1258: kaikeyyāḥ pratipattir hi kathaṃ syān mama pīḍane /
GE09ram_02su:1259: yadi bhāvo na daivo 'yaṃ kṛtāntavihito bhavet // RamS_2,19.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1260: jānāsi hi yathā saumya na mātṛṣu mamāntaram /
GE09ram_02su:1261: bhūtapūrvaṃ viśeṣo vā tasyā mayi sute 'pi vā // RamS_2,19.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1263: ugrair vākyair ahaṃ tasyā nānyad daivāt samarthaye // RamS_2,19.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1265: brūyāt sā prākṛteva strī matpīḍāṃ bhartṛsaṃnidhau // RamS_2,19.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1266: yad acintyaṃ tu tad daivaṃ bhūteṣv api na hanyate /
GE09ram_02su:1267: vyaktaṃ mayi ca tasyāṃ ca patito hi viparyayaḥ // RamS_2,19.18 //
GE09ram_02su:1268: kaścid daivena saumitre yoddhum utsahate pumān /
GE09ram_02su:1269: yasya na grahaṇaṃ kiṃcit karmaṇo 'nyatra dṛśyate // RamS_2,19.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1271: yasya kiṃcit tathā bhūtaṃ nanu daivasya karma tat // RamS_2,19.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1272: vyāhate 'py abhiṣeke me paritāpo na vidyate /
GE09ram_02su:1273: tasmād aparitāpaḥ saṃs tvam apy anuvidhāya mām /
GE09ram_02su:1275: na lakṣmaṇāsmin mama rājyavighne mātā yavīyasy atiśaṅkanīyā /
GE09ram_02su:1276: daivābhipannā hi vadanty aniṣṭaṃ jānāsi daivaṃ ca tathā prabhāvam // RamS_2,19.22 //
GE09ram_02su:1279: iti bruvati rāme tu lakṣmaṇo 'dhaḥśirā muhuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1280: śrutvā madhyaṃ jagāmeva manasā duḥkhaharṣayoḥ // RamS_2,20.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1281: tadā tu baddhvā bhrukuṭīṃ bhruvor madhye nararṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1282: niśaśvāsa mahāsarpo bilastha iva roṣitaḥ // RamS_2,20.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1284: babhau kruddhasya siṃhasya mukhasya sadṛśaṃ mukham // RamS_2,20.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1285: agrahas taṃ vidhunvaṃs tu hastī hastam ivātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1286: tiryag ūrdhvaṃ śarīre ca pātayitvā śirodharām // RamS_2,20.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1287: agrākṣṇā vīkṣamāṇas tu tiryag bhrātaram abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:1288: asthāne sambhramo yasya jāto vai sumahān ayam // RamS_2,20.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1290: kathaṃ hy etad asambhrāntas tvadvidho vaktum arhati // RamS_2,20.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1292: kiṃ nāma kṛpaṇaṃ daivam aśaktam abhiśaṃsasi // RamS_2,20.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1293: pāpayos tu kathaṃ nāma tayoḥ śaṅkā na vidyate /
GE09ram_02su:1294: santi dharmopadhāḥ ślakṣṇā dharmātman kiṃ na budhyase // RamS_2,20.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1296: yeneyam āgatā dvaidhaṃ tava buddhir mahīpate /
GE09ram_02su:1297: sa hi dharmo mama dveṣyaḥ prasaṅgād yasya muhyasi // RamS_2,20.9 //*
GE09ram_02su:1298: yady api pratipattis te daivī cāpi tayor matam /
GE09ram_02su:1299: tathāpy upekṣaṇīyaṃ te na me tad api rocate // RamS_2,20.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1300: viklavo vīryahīno yaḥ sa daivam anuvartate /
GE09ram_02su:1301: vīrāḥ saṃbhāvitātmāno na daivaṃ paryupāsate // RamS_2,20.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1303: na daivena vipannārthaḥ puruṣaḥ so 'vasīdati // RamS_2,20.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1304: drakṣyanti tv adya daivasya pauruṣaṃ puruṣasya ca /
GE09ram_02su:1305: daivamānuṣayor adya vyaktā vyaktir bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,20.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1306: adya matpauruṣahataṃ daivaṃ drakṣyanti vai janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1307: yad daivād āhataṃ te 'dya dṛṣṭaṃ rājyābhiṣecanam // RamS_2,20.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1309: pradhāvitam ahaṃ daivaṃ pauruṣeṇa nivartaye // RamS_2,20.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1311: na ca kṛtsnās trayo lokā vihanyuḥ kiṃ punaḥ pitā // RamS_2,20.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1312: yair vivāsas tavāraṇye mitho rājan samarthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1313: araṇye te vivatsyanti caturdaśa samās tathā // RamS_2,20.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1314: ahaṃ tadāśāṃ chetsyāmi pitus tasyāś ca yā tava /
GE09ram_02su:1316: madbalena viruddhāya na syād daivabalaṃ tathā /
GE09ram_02su:1317: prabhaviṣyati duḥkhāya yathograṃ pauruṣaṃ mama // RamS_2,20.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1319: āryaputrāḥ kariṣyanti vanavāsaṃ gate tvayi // RamS_2,20.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1321: prajā nikṣipya putreṣu putravat paripālane // RamS_2,20.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1323: naivam icchasi dharmātman rājyaṃ rāma tvam ātmani // RamS_2,20.22 //
GE09ram_02su:1324: pratijāne ca te vīra mā bhūvaṃ vīralokabhāk /
GE09ram_02su:1325: rājyaṃ ca tava rakṣeyam ahaṃ veleva sāgaram // RamS_2,20.23 //
GE09ram_02su:1326: maṅgalair abhiṣiñcasva tatra tvaṃ vyāpṛto bhava /
GE09ram_02su:1327: aham eko mahīpālān alaṃ vārayituṃ balāt // RamS_2,20.24 //
GE09ram_02su:1328: na śobhārthāv imau bāhū na dhanur bhūṣaṇāya me /
GE09ram_02su:1331: na cāhaṃ kāmaye 'tyarthaṃ yaḥ syāc chatrur mato mama // RamS_2,20.26 //
GE09ram_02su:1333: pragṛhītena vai śatruṃ vajriṇaṃ vā na kalpaye // RamS_2,20.27 //
GE09ram_02su:1337: patiṣyanti dvipā bhūmau meghā iva savidyutaḥ // RamS_2,20.29 //
GE09ram_02su:1339: kathaṃ puruṣamānī syāt puruṣāṇāṃ mayi sthite // RamS_2,20.30 //
GE09ram_02su:1340: bahubhiś caikam atyasyann ekena ca bahūñ janān /
GE09ram_02su:1343: rājñaś cāprabhutāṃ kartuṃ prabhutvaṃ ca tava prabho // RamS_2,20.32 //
GE09ram_02su:1345: vasūnāṃ ca vimokṣasya suhṛdāṃ pālanasya ca // RamS_2,20.33 //
GE09ram_02su:1346: anurūpāv imau bāhū rāma karma kariṣyataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1348: bravīhi ko 'dyaiva mayā viyujyatāṃ tavāsuhṛt prāṇayaśaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1349: yathā taveyaṃ vasudhā vaśe bhavet tathaiva māṃ śādhi tavāsmi kiṃkaraḥ // RamS_2,20.35 //
GE09ram_02su:1350: vimṛjya bāṣpaṃ parisāntvya cāsakṛt sa lakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1351: uvāca pitrye vacane vyavasthitaṃ nibodha mām eṣa hi saumya satpathaḥ // RamS_2,20.36 //
GE09ram_02su:1354: taṃ samīkṣya tv avahitaṃ pitur nirdeśapālane /
GE09ram_02su:1355: kausalyā bāṣpasaṃruddhā vaco dharmiṣṭham abravīt // RamS_2,21.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1357: mayi jāto daśarathāt katham uñchena vartayet // RamS_2,21.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1358: yasya bhṛtyāś ca dāsāś ca mṛṣṭāny annāni bhuñjate /
GE09ram_02su:1359: kathaṃ sa bhokṣyate nātho vane mūlaphalāny ayam // RamS_2,21.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1360: ka etacchraddadhecchrutvā kasya vā na bhaved bhayam /
GE09ram_02su:1361: guṇavān dayito rājño rāghavo yad vivāsyate // RamS_2,21.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1362: tvayā vihīnām iha māṃ śokāgnir atulo mahān /
GE09ram_02su:1363: pradhakṣyati yathā kakṣaṃ citrabhānur himātyaye // RamS_2,21.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1364: kathaṃ hi dhenuḥ svaṃ vatsaṃ gacchantaṃ nānugacchati /
GE09ram_02su:1365: ahaṃ tvānugamiṣyāmi yatra putra gamiṣyasi // RamS_2,21.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1366: tathā nigaditaṃ mātrā tad vākyaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1367: śrutvā rāmo 'bravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // RamS_2,21.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1368: kaikeyyā vañcito rājā mayi cāraṇyam āśrite /
GE09ram_02su:1369: bhavatyā ca parityakto na nūnaṃ vartayiṣyati // RamS_2,21.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1370: bhartuḥ kila parityāgo nṛśaṃsaḥ kevalaṃ striyāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1371: sa bhavatyā na kartavyo manasāpi vigarhitaḥ // RamS_2,21.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1372: yāvaj jīvati kākutsthaḥ pitā me jagatīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1373: śuśrūṣā kriyatāṃ tāvat sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // RamS_2,21.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1374: evam uktā tu rāmeṇa kausalyā śubhadarśanā /
GE09ram_02su:1375: tathety uvāca suprītā rāmam akliṣṭakāriṇam // RamS_2,21.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1376: evam uktas tu vacanaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1377: bhūyas tām abravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // RamS_2,21.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1378: mayā caiva bhavatyā ca kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1379: rājā bhartā guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ // RamS_2,21.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1380: imāni tu mahāraṇye vihṛtya nava pañca ca /
GE09ram_02su:1381: varṣāṇi paramaprītaḥ sthāsyāmi vacane tava // RamS_2,21.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1382: evam uktā priyaṃ putraṃ bāṣpapūrṇānanā tadā /
GE09ram_02su:1383: uvāca paramārtā tu kausalyā putravatsalā // RamS_2,21.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1384: āsāṃ rāma sapatnīnāṃ vastuṃ madhye na me kṣamam /
GE09ram_02su:1385: naya mām api kākutstha vanaṃ vanyāṃ mṛgīṃ yathā /
GE09ram_02su:1386: yadi te gamane buddhiḥ kṛtā pitur apekṣayā // RamS_2,21.16 //*
GE09ram_02su:1387: tāṃ tathā rudatīṃ rāmo rudan vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:1388: jīvantyā hi striyā bhartā daivataṃ prabhur eva ca /
GE09ram_02su:1389: bhavatyā mama caivādya rājā prabhavati prabhuḥ // RamS_2,21.17 //*
GE09ram_02su:1391: bhavatīm anuvarteta sa hi dharmarataḥ sadā // RamS_2,21.18 //
GE09ram_02su:1392: yathā mayi tu niṣkrānte putraśokena pārthivaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1393: śramaṃ nāvāpnuyāt kiṃcid apramattā tathā kuru // RamS_2,21.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1395: bhartāraṃ nānuvarteta sā ca pāpagatir bhavet // RamS_2,21.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1396: śuśrūṣām eva kurvīta bhartuḥ priyahite ratā /
GE09ram_02su:1397: eṣa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭo loke vede śrutaḥ smṛtaḥ // RamS_2,21.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1398: pūjyās te matkṛte devi brāhmaṇāś caiva suvratāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1400: prāpsyase paramaṃ kāmaṃ mayi pratyāgate sati /
GE09ram_02su:1401: yadi dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho dhārayiṣyati jīvitam // RamS_2,21.23 //
GE09ram_02su:1404: gaccha putra tvam ekāgro bhadraṃ te 'stu sadā vibho // RamS_2,21.24 //*
GE09ram_02su:1405: tathā hi rāmaṃ vanavāsaniścitaṃ samīkṣya devī parameṇa cetasā /
GE09ram_02su:1406: uvāca rāmaṃ śubhalakṣaṇaṃ vaco babhūva ca svastyayanābhikāṅkṣiṇī // RamS_2,21.25 //
GE09ram_02su:1409: sāpanīya tam āyāsam upaspṛśya jalaṃ śuci /
GE09ram_02su:1410: cakāra mātā rāmasya maṅgalāni manasvinī // RamS_2,22.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1411: svasti sādhyāś ca viśve ca marutaś ca maharṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1412: svasti dhātā vidhātā ca svasti pūṣā bhago 'ryamā // RamS_2,22.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1413: ṛtavaś caiva pakṣāś ca māsāḥ saṃvatsarāḥ kṣapāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1414: dināni ca muhūrtāś ca svasti kurvantu te sadā // RamS_2,22.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1415: smṛtir dhṛtiś ca dharmaś ca pāntu tvāṃ putra sarvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1416: skandaś ca bhagavān devaḥ somaś ca sabṛhaspatiḥ // RamS_2,22.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1417: saptarṣayo nāradaś ca te tvāṃ rakṣantu sarvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1418: nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi grahāś ca sahadevatāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1420: plavagā vṛścikā daṃśā maśakāś caiva kānane /
GE09ram_02su:1421: sarīsṛpāś ca kīṭāś ca mā bhūvan gahane tava // RamS_2,22.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1422: mahādvipāś ca siṃhāś ca vyāghrā ṛkṣāś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1423: mahiṣāḥ śṛṅgiṇo raudrā na te druhyantu putraka // RamS_2,22.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1425: mā ca tvāṃ hiṃsiṣuḥ putra mayā sampūjitās tv iha // RamS_2,22.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1426: āgamās te śivāḥ santu sidhyantu ca parākramāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1427: sarvasampattayo rāma svastimān gaccha putraka // RamS_2,22.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1428: svasti te 'stv āntarikṣebhyaḥ pārthivebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1429: sarvebhyaś caiva devebhyo ye ca te paripanthinaḥ // RamS_2,22.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1431: ye ca śeṣāḥ surās te tvāṃ rakṣantu vanavāsinam // RamS_2,22.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1432: iti mālyaiḥ suragaṇān gandhaiś cāpi yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:1435: vṛtranāśe samabhavat tat te bhavatu maṅgalam // RamS_2,22.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1437: amṛtaṃ prārthayānasya tat te bhavatu maṅgalam // RamS_2,22.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1439: cakāra rakṣāṃ kausalyā mantrair abhijajāpa ca // RamS_2,22.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1441: avadat putra siddhārtho gaccha rāma yathāsukham // RamS_2,22.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1443: paśyāmi tvāṃ sukhaṃ vatsa susthitaṃ rājaveśmani // RamS_2,22.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1445: abhiprayātasya vanaṃ cirāya te hitāni kāṅkṣantu diśaś ca rāghava // RamS_2,22.18 //
GE09ram_02su:1446: itīva cāśrupratipūrṇalocanā samāpya ca svastyayanaṃ yathāvidhi /
GE09ram_02su:1447: pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ punaḥ punaś cāpi nipīḍya sasvaje // RamS_2,22.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1448: tathā tu devyā sa kṛtapradakṣiṇo nipīḍya mātuś caraṇau punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1449: jagāma sītānilayaṃ mahāyaśāḥ sa rāghavaḥ prajvalitaḥ svayā śriyā // RamS_2,22.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1452: abhivādya tu kausalyāṃ rāmaḥ samprasthito vanam /
GE09ram_02su:1453: kṛtasvastyayano mātrā dharmiṣṭhe vartmani sthitaḥ // RamS_2,23.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1456: vaidehī cāpi tat sarvaṃ na śuśrāva tapasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:1457: tad eva hṛdi tasyāś ca yauvarājyābhiṣecanam // RamS_2,23.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1458: devakāryaṃ sma sā kṛtvā kṛtajñā hṛṣṭacetanā /
GE09ram_02su:1462: atha sītā samutpatya vepamānā ca taṃ patim /
GE09ram_02su:1465: āha duḥkhābhisaṃtaptā kim idānīm idaṃ prabho // RamS_2,23.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1466: adya bārhaspataḥ śrīmān yuktaḥ puṣyo na rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:1467: procyate brāhmaṇaiḥ prājñaiḥ kena tvam asi durmanāḥ // RamS_2,23.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1472: vāgmino bandinaś cāpi prahṛṣṭās tvāṃ nararṣabha /
GE09ram_02su:1473: stuvanto nādya dṛśyante maṅgalaiḥ sūtamāgadhāḥ // RamS_2,23.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1474: na te kṣaudraṃ ca dadhi ca brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1475: mūrdhni mūrdhāvasiktasya dadhati sma vidhānataḥ // RamS_2,23.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1476: na tvāṃ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā śreṇīmukhyāś ca bhūṣitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1479: mukhyaḥ puṣyaratho yuktaḥ kiṃ na gacchati te 'grataḥ // RamS_2,23.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1480: na hastī cāgrataḥ śrīmāṃs tava lakṣaṇapūjitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1482: na ca kāñcanacitraṃ te paśyāmi priyadarśana /
GE09ram_02su:1484: abhiṣeko yadā sajjaḥ kim idānīm idaṃ tava /
GE09ram_02su:1485: apūrvo mukhavarṇaś ca na praharṣaś ca lakṣyate // RamS_2,23.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1487: sīte tatrabhavāṃs tātaḥ pravrājayati māṃ vanam // RamS_2,23.18 //
GE09ram_02su:1489: śṛṇu jānaki yenedaṃ krameṇābhyāgataṃ mama // RamS_2,23.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1491: kaikeyyai prītamanasā purā dattau mahāvarau // RamS_2,23.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1493: pracoditaḥ sa samayo dharmeṇa pratinirjitaḥ // RamS_2,23.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1494: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyaṃ daṇḍake mayā /
GE09ram_02su:1495: pitrā me bharataś cāpi yauvarājye niyojitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1496: so 'haṃ tvām āgato draṣṭuṃ prasthito vijanaṃ vanam // RamS_2,23.22 //*
GE09ram_02su:1497: bharatasya samīpe te nāhaṃ kathyaḥ kadācana /
GE09ram_02su:1498: ṛddhiyuktā hi puruṣā na sahante parastavam /
GE09ram_02su:1499: tasmān na te guṇāḥ kathyā bharatasyāgrato mama // RamS_2,23.23 //*
GE09ram_02su:1500: nāpi tvaṃ tena bhartavyā viśeṣeṇa kadācana /
GE09ram_02su:1501: anukūlatayā śakyaṃ samīpe tasya vartitum // RamS_2,23.24 //
GE09ram_02su:1502: ahaṃ cāpi pratijñāṃ tāṃ guroḥ samanupālayan /
GE09ram_02su:1503: vanam adyaiva yāsyāmi sthirā bhava manasvini // RamS_2,23.25 //
GE09ram_02su:1504: yāte ca mayi kalyāṇi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam /
GE09ram_02su:1506: kālyam utthāya devānāṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ yathāvidhi /
GE09ram_02su:1507: vanditavyo daśarathaḥ pitā mama nareśvaraḥ // RamS_2,23.27 //
GE09ram_02su:1508: mātā ca mama kausalyā vṛddhā saṃtāpakarśitā /
GE09ram_02su:1509: dharmam evāgrataḥ kṛtvā tvattaḥ sammānam arhati // RamS_2,23.28 //
GE09ram_02su:1510: vanditavyāś ca te nityaṃ yāḥ śeṣā mama mātaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1511: snehapraṇayasambhogaiḥ samā hi mama mātaraḥ // RamS_2,23.29 //
GE09ram_02su:1513: tvayā lakṣmaṇaśatrughnau prāṇaiḥ priyatarau mama // RamS_2,23.30 //
GE09ram_02su:1514: vipriyaṃ na ca kartavyaṃ bharatasya kadācana /
GE09ram_02su:1515: sa hi rājā prabhuś caiva deśasya ca kulasya ca // RamS_2,23.31 //
GE09ram_02su:1518: aurasān api putrān hi tyajanty ahitakāriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1519: samarthān sampragṛhṇanti janān api narādhipāḥ // RamS_2,23.33 //
GE09ram_02su:1520: ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi mahāvanaṃ priye tvayā hi vastavyam ihaiva bhāmini /
GE09ram_02su:1521: yathā vyalīkaṃ kuruṣe na kasyacit tathā tvayā kāryam idaṃ vaco mama // RamS_2,23.34 //
GE09ram_02su:1524: evam uktā tu vaidehī priyārhā priyavādinī /
GE09ram_02su:1525: praṇayād eva saṃkruddhā bhartāram idam abravīt // RamS_2,24.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1526: āryaputra pitā mātā bhrātā putras tathā snuṣā /
GE09ram_02su:1527: svāni puṇyāni bhuñjānāḥ svaṃ svaṃ bhāgyam upāsate // RamS_2,24.2 //
