GE09ram_02su:1528: bhartur bhāgyaṃ tu bhāryaikā prāpnoti puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_02su:1529: ataś caivāham ādiṣṭā vane vastavyam ity api // RamS_2,24.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1530: na pitā nātmajo nātmā na mātā na sakhījanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1531: iha pretya ca nārīṇāṃ patir eko gatiḥ sadā // RamS_2,24.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1532: yadi tvaṃ prasthito durgaṃ vanam adyaiva rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:1533: agratas te gamiṣyāmi mṛdnantī kuśakaṇṭakān // RamS_2,24.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1535: naya māṃ vīra viśrabdhaḥ pāpaṃ mayi na vidyate // RamS_2,24.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1538: anuśiṣṭāsmi mātrā ca pitrā ca vividhāśrayam /
GE09ram_02su:1539: nāsmi samprati vaktavyā vartitavyaṃ yathā mayā // RamS_2,24.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1540: sukhaṃ vane nivatsyāmi yathaiva bhavane pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1541: acintayantī trīṃl lokāṃś cintayantī pativratam // RamS_2,24.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1543: saha raṃsye tvayā vīra vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu // RamS_2,24.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1544: tvaṃ hi kartuṃ vane śakto rāma samparipālanam /
GE09ram_02su:1545: anyasyāpi janasyeha kiṃ punar mama mānada // RamS_2,24.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1547: na te duḥkhaṃ kariṣyāmi nivasantī saha tvayā // RamS_2,24.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1548: icchāmi saritaḥ śailān palvalāni vanāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:1549: draṣṭuṃ sarvatra nirbhītā tvayā nāthena dhīmatā // RamS_2,24.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1551: iccheyaṃ sukhinī draṣṭuṃ tvayā vīreṇa saṃgatā // RamS_2,24.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1553: evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ vāhaṃ tvayā saha // RamS_2,24.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1554: svarge 'pi ca vinā vāso bhavitā yadi rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:1555: tvayā mama naravyāghra nāhaṃ tam api rocaye // RamS_2,24.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1556: ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ sudurgamaṃ mṛgāyutaṃ vānaravāraṇair yutam /
GE09ram_02su:1557: vane nivatsyāmi yathā pitur gṛhe tavaiva pādāv upagṛhya saṃmatā // RamS_2,24.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1558: ananyabhāvām anuraktacetasaṃ tvayā viyuktāṃ maraṇāya niścitām /
GE09ram_02su:1559: nayasva māṃ sādhu kuruṣva yācanāṃ na te mayāto gurutā bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,24.18 //
GE09ram_02su:1560: tathā bruvāṇām api dharmavatsalo na ca sma sītāṃ nṛvaro ninīṣati /
GE09ram_02su:1561: uvāca caināṃ bahu saṃnivartane vane nivāsasya ca duḥkhitāṃ prati // RamS_2,24.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1564: sa evaṃ bruvatīṃ sītāṃ dharmajño dharmavatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1565: nivartanārthe dharmātmā vākyam etad uvāca ha // RamS_2,25.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1566: sīte mahākulīnāsi dharme ca niratā sadā /
GE09ram_02su:1567: ihācara svadharmaṃ tvaṃ mā yathā manasaḥ sukham // RamS_2,25.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1568: sīte yathā tvāṃ vakṣyāmi tathā kāryaṃ tvayābale /
GE09ram_02su:1569: vane doṣā hi bahavo vadatas tān nibodha me // RamS_2,25.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1571: bahudoṣaṃ hi kāntāraṃ vanam ity abhidhīyate // RamS_2,25.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1573: sadā sukhaṃ na jānāmi duḥkham eva sadā vanam // RamS_2,25.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1575: siṃhānāṃ ninadā duḥkhāḥ śrotuṃ duḥkham ato vanam // RamS_2,25.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1577: rātriṣu śramakhinnena tasmād duḥkhataraṃ vanam // RamS_2,25.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1580: atīva vātas timiraṃ bubhukṣā cātra nityaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1581: bhayāni ca mahānty atra tato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // RamS_2,25.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1582: sarīsṛpāś ca bahavo bahurūpāś ca bhāmini /
GE09ram_02su:1583: caranti pṛthivīṃ darpād ato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // RamS_2,25.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1585: tiṣṭhanty āvṛtya panthānam ato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // RamS_2,25.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1586: pataṃgā vṛścikāḥ kīṭā daṃśāś ca maśakaiḥ saha /
GE09ram_02su:1587: bādhante nityam abale sarvaṃ duḥkham ato vanam // RamS_2,25.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1588: drumāḥ kaṇṭakinaś caiva kuśakāśāś ca bhāmini /
GE09ram_02su:1589: vane vyākulaśākhāgrās tena duḥkhataraṃ vanam // RamS_2,25.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1590: tad alaṃ te vanaṃ gatvā kṣamaṃ na hi vanaṃ tava /
GE09ram_02su:1591: vimṛśann iha paśyāmi bahudoṣataraṃ vanam // RamS_2,25.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1592: vanaṃ tu netuṃ na kṛtā matis tadā babhūva rāmeṇa yadā mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02su:1593: na tasya sītā vacanaṃ cakāra tat tato 'bravīd rāmam idaṃ suduḥkhitā // RamS_2,25.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1596: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sītā rāmasya duḥkhitā /
GE09ram_02su:1597: prasaktāśrumukhī mandam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,26.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1598: ye tvayā kīrtitā doṣā vane vastavyatāṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:1599: guṇān ity eva tān viddhi tava snehapuraskṛtān // RamS_2,26.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1600: tvayā ca saha gantavyaṃ mayā gurujanājñayā /
GE09ram_02su:1601: tvadviyogena me rāma tyaktavyam iha jīvitam // RamS_2,26.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1602: na ca māṃ tvatsamīpasthām api śaknoti rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:1603: surāṇām īśvaraḥ śakraḥ pradharṣayitum ojasā // RamS_2,26.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1604: patihīnā tu yā nārī na sā śakṣyati jīvitum /
GE09ram_02su:1605: kāmam evaṃvidhaṃ rāma tvayā mama vidarśitam // RamS_2,26.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1606: atha cāpi mahāprājña brāhmaṇānāṃ mayā śrutam /
GE09ram_02su:1607: purā pitṛgṛhe satyaṃ vastavyaṃ kila me vane // RamS_2,26.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1610: ādeśo vanavāsasya prāptavyaḥ sa mayā kila /
GE09ram_02su:1611: sā tvayā saha tatrāhaṃ yāsyāmi priya nānyathā // RamS_2,26.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1613: kālaś cāyaṃ samutpannaḥ satyavāg bhavatu dvijaḥ // RamS_2,26.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1614: vanavāse hi jānāmi duḥkhāni bahudhā kila /
GE09ram_02su:1615: prāpyante niyataṃ vīra puruṣair akṛtātmabhiḥ // RamS_2,26.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1616: kanyayā ca pitur gehe vanavāsaḥ śruto mayā /
GE09ram_02su:1617: bhikṣiṇyāḥ sādhuvṛttāyā mama mātur ihāgrataḥ // RamS_2,26.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1618: prasāditaś ca vai pūrvaṃ tvaṃ vai bahuvidhaṃ prabho /
GE09ram_02su:1619: gamanaṃ vanavāsasya kāṅkṣitaṃ hi saha tvayā // RamS_2,26.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1620: kṛtakṣaṇāhaṃ bhadraṃ te gamanaṃ prati rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:1621: vanavāsasya śūrasya caryā hi mama rocate // RamS_2,26.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1623: bhartāram anugacchantī bhartā hi mama daivatam // RamS_2,26.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1624: pretyabhāve 'pi kalyāṇaḥ saṃgamo me saha tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:1625: śrutir hi śrūyate puṇyā brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśasvinām // RamS_2,26.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1626: iha loke ca pitṛbhir yā strī yasya mahāmate /
GE09ram_02su:1627: adbhir dattā svadharmeṇa pretyabhāve 'pi tasya sā // RamS_2,26.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1628: evam asmāt svakāṃ nārīṃ suvṛttāṃ hi pativratām /
GE09ram_02su:1629: nābhirocayase netuṃ tvaṃ māṃ keneha hetunā // RamS_2,26.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1630: bhaktāṃ pativratāṃ dīnāṃ māṃ samāṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1632: yadi māṃ duḥkhitām evaṃ vanaṃ netuṃ na cecchasi /
GE09ram_02su:1633: viṣam agniṃ jalaṃ vāham āsthāsye mṛtyukāraṇāt // RamS_2,26.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1634: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ taṃ sā yācate gamanaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:1635: nānumene mahābāhus tāṃ netuṃ vijanaṃ vanam // RamS_2,26.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1636: evam uktā tu sā cintāṃ maithilī samupāgatā /
GE09ram_02su:1637: snāpayantīva gām uṣṇair aśrubhir nayanacyutaiḥ // RamS_2,26.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1638: cintayantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu nivartayitum ātmavān /
GE09ram_02su:1639: krodhāviṣṭāṃ tu vaidehīṃ kākutstho bahv asāntvayat // RamS_2,26.22 //
GE09ram_02su:1645: praṇayāc cābhimānāc ca paricikṣepa rāghavam // RamS_2,27.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1646: kiṃ tvāmanyata vaidehaḥ pitā me mithilādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1647: rāma jāmātaraṃ prāpya striyaṃ puruṣavigraham // RamS_2,27.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1649: tejo nāsti paraṃ rāme tapatīva divākare // RamS_2,27.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1650: kiṃ hi kṛtvā viṣaṇṇas tvaṃ kuto vā bhayam asti te /
GE09ram_02su:1651: yat parityaktukāmas tvaṃ mām ananyaparāyaṇām // RamS_2,27.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1653: sāvitrīm iva māṃ viddhi tvam ātmavaśavartinīm // RamS_2,27.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1654: na tv ahaṃ manasāpy anyaṃ draṣṭāsmi tvadṛte 'nagha /
GE09ram_02su:1655: tvayā rāghava gaccheyaṃ yathānyā kulapāṃsanī // RamS_2,27.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1656: svayaṃ tu bhāryāṃ kaumārīṃ ciram adhyuṣitāṃ satīm /
GE09ram_02su:1657: śailūṣa iva māṃ rāma parebhyo dātum icchasi // RamS_2,27.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1658: sa mām anādāya vanaṃ na tvaṃ prasthātum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:1659: tapo vā yadi vāraṇyaṃ svargo vā syāt saha tvayā // RamS_2,27.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1660: na ca me bhavitā tatra kaścit pathi pariśramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1661: pṛṣṭhatas tava gacchantyā vihāraśayaneṣv api // RamS_2,27.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1663: tūlājinasamasparśā mārge mama saha tvayā // RamS_2,27.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1665: rajo ramaṇa tan manye parārdhyam iva candanam // RamS_2,27.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1667: kuthāstaraṇatalpeṣu kiṃ syāt sukhataraṃ tataḥ // RamS_2,27.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1668: pattraṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ yat tvam alpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu /
GE09ram_02su:1669: dāsyasi svayam āhṛtya tan me 'mṛtarasopamam // RamS_2,27.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1670: na mātur na pitus tatra smariṣyāmi na veśmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1671: ārtavāny upabhuñjānā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca // RamS_2,27.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1672: na ca tatra gataḥ kiṃcid draṣṭum arhasi vipriyam /
GE09ram_02su:1673: matkṛte na ca te śoko na bhaviṣyāmi durbharā // RamS_2,27.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1674: yas tvayā saha sa svargo nirayo yas tvayā vinā /
GE09ram_02su:1675: iti jānan parāṃ prītiṃ gaccha rāma mayā saha // RamS_2,27.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1676: atha mām evam avyagrāṃ vanaṃ naiva nayiṣyasi /
GE09ram_02su:1677: viṣam adyaiva pāsyāmi mā viśaṃ dviṣatāṃ vaśam // RamS_2,27.18 //
GE09ram_02su:1678: paścād api hi duḥkhena mama naivāsti jīvitam /
GE09ram_02su:1679: ujjhitāyās tvayā nātha tadaiva maraṇaṃ varam // RamS_2,27.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1680: idaṃ hi sahituṃ śokaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe /
GE09ram_02su:1681: kiṃ punar daśavarṣāṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca duḥkhitā // RamS_2,27.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1682: iti sā śokasaṃtaptā vilapya karuṇaṃ bahu /
GE09ram_02su:1683: cukrośa patim āyastā bhṛśam āliṅgya sasvaram // RamS_2,27.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1684: sā viddhā bahubhir vākyair digdhair iva gajāṅganā /
GE09ram_02su:1688: tāṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ visaṃjñām iva duḥkhitām /
GE09ram_02su:1689: uvāca vacanaṃ rāmaḥ pariviśvāsayaṃs tadā // RamS_2,27.24 //
GE09ram_02su:1690: na devi tava duḥkhena svargam apy abhirocaye /
GE09ram_02su:1691: na hi me 'sti bhayaṃ kiṃcit svayambhor iva sarvataḥ // RamS_2,27.25 //
GE09ram_02su:1693: vāsaṃ na rocaye 'raṇye śaktimān api rakṣaṇe // RamS_2,27.26 //
GE09ram_02su:1694: yat sṛṣṭāsi mayā sārdhaṃ vanavāsāya maithili /
GE09ram_02su:1695: na vihātuṃ mayā śakyā kīrtir ātmavatā yathā // RamS_2,27.27 //
GE09ram_02su:1696: dharmas tu gajanāsoru sadbhir ācaritaḥ purā /
GE09ram_02su:1697: taṃ cāham anuvarte 'dya yathā sūryaṃ suvarcalā // RamS_2,27.28 //
GE09ram_02su:1698: eṣa dharmas tu suśroṇi pitur mātuś ca vaśyatā /
GE09ram_02su:1699: ataś cājñāṃ vyatikramya nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe // RamS_2,27.29 //
GE09ram_02su:1700: sa māṃ pitā yathā śāsti satyadharmapathe sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1701: tathā vartitum icchāmi sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1702: anugacchasva māṃ bhīru sahadharmacarī bhava // RamS_2,27.30 //*
GE09ram_02su:1703: brāhmaṇebhyaś ca ratnāni bhikṣukebhyaś ca bhojanam /
GE09ram_02su:1704: dehi cāśaṃsamānebhyaḥ saṃtvarasva ca māciram // RamS_2,27.31 //
GE09ram_02su:1705: anukūlaṃ tu sā bhartur jñātvā gamanam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1706: kṣipraṃ pramuditā devī dātum evopacakrame // RamS_2,27.32 //
GE09ram_02su:1707: tataḥ prahṛṣṭā paripūrṇamānasā yaśasvinī bhartur avekṣya bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:1708: dhanāni ratnāni ca dātum aṅganā pracakrame dharmabhṛtāṃ manasvinī // RamS_2,27.33 //
GE09ram_02su:1712: sthitaṃ prāggāminaṃ vīraṃ yācamānaṃ kṛtāñjalim // RamS_2,28.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1713: mayādya saha saumitre tvayi gacchati tad vanam /
GE09ram_02su:1714: ko bhariṣyati kausalyāṃ sumitrāṃ vā yaśasvinīm // RamS_2,28.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1715: abhivarṣati kāmair yaḥ parjanyaḥ pṛthivīm iva /
GE09ram_02su:1717: sā hi rājyam idaṃ prāpya nṛpasyāśvapateḥ sutā /
GE09ram_02su:1718: duḥkhitānāṃ sapatnīnāṃ na kariṣyati śobhanam // RamS_2,28.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1719: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā /
GE09ram_02su:1720: pratyuvāca tadā rāmaṃ vākyajño vākyakovidam // RamS_2,28.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1722: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca prayato nātra saṃśayaḥ // RamS_2,28.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1723: kausalyā bibhṛyād āryā sahasram api madvidhān /
GE09ram_02su:1724: yasyāḥ sahasraṃ grāmāṇāṃ samprāptam upajīvanam // RamS_2,28.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1726: agratas te gamiṣyāmi panthānam anudarśayan // RamS_2,28.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1727: āhariṣyāmi te nityaṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:1728: vanyāni yāni cānyāni svāhārāṇi tapasvinām // RamS_2,28.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1729: bhavāṃs tu saha vaidehyā girisānuṣu raṃsyate /
GE09ram_02su:1730: ahaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi jāgrataḥ svapataś ca te // RamS_2,28.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1731: rāmas tv anena vākyena suprītaḥ pratyuvāca tam /
GE09ram_02su:1732: vrajāpṛcchasva saumitre sarvam eva suhṛjjanam // RamS_2,28.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1733: ye ca rājño dadau divye mahātmā varuṇaḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02su:1738: sa tvam āyudham ādāya kṣipram āvraja lakṣmaṇa // RamS_2,28.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1742: rāmāya darśayāmāsa saumitriḥ sarvam āyudham // RamS_2,28.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1743: tam uvācātmavān rāmaḥ prītyā lakṣmaṇam āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:1744: kāle tvam āgataḥ saumya kāṅkṣite mama lakṣmaṇa // RamS_2,28.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1745: ahaṃ pradātum icchāmi yad idaṃ māmakaṃ dhanam /
GE09ram_02su:1746: brāhmaṇebhyas tapasvibhyas tvayā saha paraṃtapa // RamS_2,28.18 //
GE09ram_02su:1748: teṣām api ca me bhūyaḥ sarveṣāṃ copajīvinām // RamS_2,28.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1749: vasiṣṭhaputraṃ tu suyajñam āryaṃ tvam ānayāśu pravaraṃ dvijānām /
GE09ram_02su:1750: abhiprayāsyāmi vanaṃ samastān abhyarcya śiṣṭān aparān dvijātīn // RamS_2,28.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1753: tataḥ śāsanam ājñāya bhrātuḥ śubhataraṃ priyam /
GE09ram_02su:1754: gatvā sa praviveśāśu suyajñasya niveśanam // RamS_2,29.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1756: sakhe 'bhyāgaccha paśya tvaṃ veśma duṣkarakāriṇaḥ // RamS_2,29.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1757: tataḥ saṃdhyām upāsyāśu gatvā saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_02su:1758: juṣṭaṃ tat prāviśal lakṣmyā ramyaṃ rāmaniveśanam // RamS_2,29.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1759: tam āgataṃ vedavidaṃ prāñjaliḥ sītayā saha /
GE09ram_02su:1762: sahemasūtrair maṇibhiḥ keyūrair valayair api // RamS_2,29.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1763: anyaiś ca ratnair bahubhiḥ kākutsthaḥ pratyapūjayat /
GE09ram_02su:1764: suyajñaṃ sa tadovāca rāmaḥ sītāpracoditaḥ // RamS_2,29.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1765: hāraṃ ca hemasūtraṃ ca bhāryāyai saumya hāraya /
GE09ram_02su:1766: raśanāṃ cādhunā sītā dātum icchati te sakhe // RamS_2,29.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1768: tam apīcchati vaidehī pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ tvayi // RamS_2,29.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1769: nāgaḥ śatruṃjayo nāma mātulo yaṃ dadau mama /
GE09ram_02su:1770: taṃ te gajasahasreṇa dadāmi dvijapuṃgava // RamS_2,29.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1771: ity uktaḥ sa hi rāmeṇa suyajñaḥ pratigṛhya tat /
GE09ram_02su:1773: atha bhrātaram avyagraṃ priyaṃ rāmaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1774: saumitriṃ tam uvācedaṃ brahmeva tridaśeśvaram // RamS_2,29.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1775: agastyaṃ kauśikaṃ caiva tāv ubhau brāhmaṇottamau /
GE09ram_02su:1776: arcayāhūya saumitre ratnaiḥ sasyam ivāmbubhiḥ // RamS_2,29.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1777: kausalyāṃ ca ya āśīrbhir bhaktaḥ paryupatiṣṭhati /
GE09ram_02su:1778: ācāryas taittirīyāṇām abhirūpaś ca vedavit // RamS_2,29.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1779: tasya yānaṃ ca dāsīś ca saumitre saṃpradāpaya /
GE09ram_02su:1780: kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi yāvat tuṣyati sa dvijaḥ // RamS_2,29.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1782: toṣayainaṃ mahārhaiś ca ratnair vastrair dhanais tathā // RamS_2,29.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1783: śālivāhasahasraṃ ca dve śate bhadrakāṃs tathā /
GE09ram_02su:1784: vyañjanārthaṃ ca saumitre gosahasram upākuru // RamS_2,29.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1785: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02su:1786: yathoktaṃ brāhmaṇendrāṇām adadād dhanado yathā // RamS_2,29.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1789: lakṣmaṇasya ca yad veśma gṛhaṃ ca yad idaṃ mama /
GE09ram_02su:1790: aśūnyaṃ kāryam ekaikaṃ yāvadāgamanaṃ mama // RamS_2,29.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1791: ity uktvā duḥkhitaṃ sarvaṃ janaṃ tam upajīvinam /
GE09ram_02su:1793: tato 'sya dhanam ājahruḥ sarvam evopajīvinaḥ // RamS_2,29.20 //*
GE09ram_02su:1794: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1796: tatrāsīt piṅgalo gārgyas trijaṭo nāma vai dvijaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1797: ā pañcamāyāḥ kakṣyāyā nainaṃ kaścid avārayat // RamS_2,29.22 //
GE09ram_02su:1798: sa rājaputram āsādya trijaṭo vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:1800: uñchavṛttir vane nityaṃ pratyavekṣasva mām iti // RamS_2,29.23 //*
GE09ram_02su:1802: gavāṃ sahasram apy ekaṃ na tu viśrāṇitaṃ mayā /
GE09ram_02su:1803: parikṣipasi daṇḍena yāvat tāvad avāpsyasi // RamS_2,29.24 //*
GE09ram_02su:1804: sa śāṭīṃ tvaritaḥ kaṭyāṃ saṃbhrāntaḥ pariveṣṭya tām /
GE09ram_02su:1805: āvidhya daṇḍaṃ cikṣepa sarvaprāṇena vegitaḥ // RamS_2,29.25 //
GE09ram_02su:1806: uvāca ca tato rāmas taṃ gārgyam abhisāntvayan /
GE09ram_02su:1807: manyur na khalu kartavyaḥ parihāso hy ayaṃ mama // RamS_2,29.26 //
GE09ram_02su:1808: tataḥ sabhāryas trijaṭo mahāmunir gavām anīkaṃ pratigṛhya moditaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1809: yaśobalaprītisukhopabṛṃhiṇīs tad āśiṣaḥ pratyavadan mahātmanaḥ // RamS_2,29.27 //
GE09ram_02su:1812: dattvā tu saha vaidehyā brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ bahu /
GE09ram_02su:1813: jagmatuḥ pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ sītayā saha rāghavau // RamS_2,30.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1817: adhiruhya janaḥ śrīmān udāsīno vyalokayat // RamS_2,30.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1818: na hi rathyāḥ sma śakyante gantuṃ bahujanākulāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1819: āruhya tasmāt prāsādān dīnāḥ paśyanti rāghavam // RamS_2,30.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1820: padātiṃ varjitacchattraṃ rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1822: yaṃ yāntam anuyāti sma caturaṅgabalaṃ mahat /
GE09ram_02su:1823: tam ekaṃ sītayā sārdham anuyāti sma lakṣmaṇaḥ // RamS_2,30.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1824: aiśvaryasya rasajñaḥ san kāmināṃ caiva kāmadaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1825: necchaty evānṛtaṃ kartuṃ pitaraṃ dharmagauravāt // RamS_2,30.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1826: yā na śakyā purā draṣṭuṃ bhūtair ākāśagair api /
GE09ram_02su:1827: tām adya sītāṃ paśyanti rājamārgagatā janāḥ // RamS_2,30.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1829: varṣam uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca neṣyaty āśu vivarṇatām // RamS_2,30.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1830: adya nūnaṃ daśarathaḥ sattvam āviśya bhāṣate /
GE09ram_02su:1831: na hi rājā priyaṃ putraṃ vivāsayitum arhati // RamS_2,30.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1833: kiṃ punar yasya loko 'yaṃ jito vṛttena kevalam // RamS_2,30.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1834: ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaḥ śrutaṃ śīlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1835: rāghavaṃ śobhayanty ete ṣaḍguṇāḥ puruṣottamam // RamS_2,30.12 //
GE09ram_02su:1838: pīḍayā pīḍitaṃ sarvaṃ jagad asya jagatpateḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1840: te lakṣmaṇa iva kṣipraṃ sapatnyaḥ sahabāndhavāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1841: gacchantam anugacchāmo yena gacchati rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,30.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1842: udyānāni parityajya kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:1848: vanaṃ nagaram evāstu yena gacchati rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1849: asmābhiś ca parityaktaṃ puraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ vanam // RamS_2,30.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1851: asmattyaktaṃ prapadyantāṃ sevyamānaṃ tyajantu ca // RamS_2,30.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1853: śuśrāva rāmaḥ śrutvā ca na vicakre 'sya mānasam // RamS_2,30.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1855: jagāma rāmaḥ pitaraṃ didṛkṣuḥ pitur nideśaṃ vidhivac cikīrṣuḥ // RamS_2,30.22 //
GE09ram_02su:1856: tat pūrvam aikṣvākasuto mahātmā rāmo gamiṣyan vanam ārtarūpam /
GE09ram_02su:1857: vyatiṣṭhata prekṣya tadā sumantraṃ pitur mahātmā pratihāraṇārtham // RamS_2,30.23 //
GE09ram_02su:1858: pitur nideśena tu dharmavatsalo vanapraveśe kṛtabuddhiniścayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1859: sa rāghavaḥ prekṣya sumantram abravīn nivedayasvāgamanaṃ nṛpāya me // RamS_2,30.24 //
GE09ram_02su:1863: praviśya nṛpatiṃ sūto niḥśvasantaṃ dadarśa ha // RamS_2,31.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1865: rāmam evānuśocantaṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir āsadat // RamS_2,31.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1866: ayaṃ sa puruṣavyāghra dvāri tiṣṭhati te sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1867: brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā sarvaṃ caivopajīvinām // RamS_2,31.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1868: sa tvā paśyatu bhadraṃ te rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1869: sarvān suhṛda āpṛcchya tvām idānīṃ didṛkṣate // RamS_2,31.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1871: vṛtaṃ rājaguṇaiḥ sarvair ādityam iva raśmibhiḥ // RamS_2,31.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1873: ākāśa iva niṣpaṅko narendraḥ pratyuvāca tam // RamS_2,31.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1874: sumantrānaya me dārān ye kecid iha māmakāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1875: dāraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvair draṣṭum icchāmi rāghavam // RamS_2,31.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1876: so 'ntaḥpuram atītyaiva striyas tā vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:1877: āryo hvayati vo rājā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // RamS_2,31.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1878: evam uktāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ sumantreṇa nṛpājñayā /
GE09ram_02su:1879: pracakramus tad bhavanaṃ bhartur ājñāya śāsanam // RamS_2,31.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1881: kausalyāṃ parivāryātha śanair jagmur dhṛtavratāḥ // RamS_2,31.10 //
GE09ram_02su:1883: uvāca rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sumantrānaya me sutam // RamS_2,31.11 //
GE09ram_02su:1884: sa sūto rāmam ādāya lakṣmaṇaṃ maithilīṃ tadā /
GE09ram_02su:1886: sa rājā putram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrāt kṛtāñjalim /
GE09ram_02su:1889: tam asaṃprāpya duḥkhārtaḥ papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ // RamS_2,31.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1890: taṃ rāmo 'bhyapatat kṣipraṃ lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1891: visaṃjñam iva duḥkhena saśokaṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā // RamS_2,31.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1893: hā hā rāmeti sahasā bhūṣaṇadhvanimūrchitaḥ // RamS_2,31.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1894: taṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau /
GE09ram_02su:1895: paryaṅke sītayā sārdhaṃ rudantaḥ samaveśayan // RamS_2,31.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1898: āpṛcche tvāṃ mahārāja sarveṣām īśvaro 'si naḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1899: prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ paśya tvaṃ kuśalena mām // RamS_2,31.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1900: lakṣmaṇaṃ cānujānīhi sītā cānveti māṃ vanam /
GE09ram_02su:1901: kāraṇair bahubhis tathyair vāryamāṇau na cecchataḥ // RamS_2,31.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1902: anujānīhi sarvān naḥ śokam utsṛjya mānada /
GE09ram_02su:1903: lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca prajāpatir iva prajāḥ // RamS_2,31.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1905: uvāca rājā samprekṣya vanavāsāya rāghavam // RamS_2,31.22 //
GE09ram_02su:1907: ayodhyāyās tvam evādya bhava rājā nigṛhya mām // RamS_2,31.23 //
GE09ram_02su:1908: evam ukto nṛpatinā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1911: ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi na me kāryaṃ tvayānṛtam // RamS_2,31.25 //
GE09ram_02su:1914: adya tv idānīṃ rajanīṃ putra mā gaccha sarvathā /
GE09ram_02su:1915: mātaraṃ māṃ ca saṃpaśyan vasemām adya śarvarīm /
GE09ram_02su:1916: tarpitaḥ sarvakāmais tvaṃ śvaḥkāle sādhayiṣyasi // RamS_2,31.27 //*
GE09ram_02su:1917: atha rāmas tathā śrutvā pitur ārtasya bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:1918: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dīno vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,31.28 //
GE09ram_02su:1919: prāpsyāmi yān adya guṇān ko me śvastān pradāsyati /
GE09ram_02su:1920: apakramaṇam evātaḥ sarvakāmair ahaṃ vṛṇe // RamS_2,31.29 //
GE09ram_02su:1922: mayā visṛṣṭā vasudhā bharatāya pradīyatām // RamS_2,31.30 //
GE09ram_02su:1923: apagacchatu te duḥkhaṃ mā bhūr bāṣpapariplutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1924: na hi kṣubhyati durdharṣaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // RamS_2,31.31 //
GE09ram_02su:1925: naivāhaṃ rājyam icchāmi na sukhaṃ na ca maithilīm /
GE09ram_02su:1926: tvām ahaṃ satyam icchāmi nānṛtaṃ puruṣarṣabha // RamS_2,31.32 //
GE09ram_02su:1927: puraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca mahī ca kevalā mayā nisṛṣṭā bharatāya dīyatām /
GE09ram_02su:1928: ahaṃ nideśaṃ bhavato 'nupālayan vanaṃ gamiṣyāmi cirāya sevitum // RamS_2,31.33 //
GE09ram_02su:1929: mayā nisṛṣṭāṃ bharato mahīm imāṃ saśailakhaṇḍāṃ sapurāṃ sakānanām /
GE09ram_02su:1930: śivāṃ susīmām anuśāstu kevalaṃ tvayā yad uktaṃ nṛpate yathāstu tat // RamS_2,31.34 //
GE09ram_02su:1931: na me tathā pārthiva dhīyate mano mahatsu kāmeṣu na cātmanaḥ priye /
GE09ram_02su:1932: yathā nideśe tava śiṣṭasaṃmate vyapaitu duḥkhaṃ tava matkṛte 'nagha // RamS_2,31.35 //
GE09ram_02su:1933: tad adya naivānagha rājyam avyayaṃ na sarvakāmān na sukhaṃ na maithilīm /
GE09ram_02su:1934: na jīvitaṃ tvām anṛtena yojayan vṛṇīya satyaṃ vratam astu te tathā // RamS_2,31.36 //
GE09ram_02su:1935: phalāni mūlāni ca bhakṣayan vane girīṃś ca paśyan saritaḥ sarāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_02su:1936: vanaṃ praviśyaiva vicitrapādapaṃ sukhī bhaviṣyāmi tavāstu nirvṛtiḥ // RamS_2,31.37 //
GE09ram_02su:1940: sabāṣpam atiniḥśvasya jagādedaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // RamS_2,32.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1945: ye cainam upajīvanti ramate yaiś ca vīryataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1946: teṣāṃ bahuvidhaṃ dattvā tān apy atra niyojaya // RamS_2,32.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1947: nighnan mṛgān kuñjarāṃś ca pibaṃś cāraṇyakaṃ madhu /
GE09ram_02su:1948: nadīś ca vividhāḥ paśyan na rājyaṃ saṃsmariṣyati // RamS_2,32.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1949: dhānyakośaś ca yaḥ kaścid dhanakośaś ca māmakaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1950: tau rāmam anugacchetāṃ vasantaṃ nirjane vane // RamS_2,32.6 //
GE09ram_02su:1952: ṛṣibhiś ca samāgamya pravatsyati sukhaṃ vane // RamS_2,32.7 //
GE09ram_02su:1954: sarvakāmaiḥ punaḥ śrīmān rāmaḥ saṃsādhyatām iti // RamS_2,32.8 //
GE09ram_02su:1955: evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe kaikeyyā bhayam āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:1956: mukhaṃ cāpy agamacchoṣaṃ svaraś cāpi nyarudhyata // RamS_2,32.9 //
GE09ram_02su:1957: sā viṣaṇṇā ca saṃtrastā kaikeyī vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:1958: rājyaṃ gatajanaṃ sādho pītamaṇḍāṃ surām iva /
GE09ram_02su:1962: vahantaṃ kiṃ tudasi māṃ niyujya dhuri māhite // RamS_2,32.11 //*
GE09ram_02su:1963: kaikeyī dviguṇaṃ kruddhā rājānam idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:1964: tavaiva vaṃśe sagaro jyeṣṭhaṃ putram upārudhat /
GE09ram_02su:1965: asamañja iti khyātaṃ tathāyaṃ gantum arhati // RamS_2,32.12 //*
GE09ram_02su:1966: evam ukto dhig ity eva rājā daśaratho 'bravīt /
GE09ram_02su:1967: vrīḍitaś ca janaḥ sarvaḥ sā ca tan nāvabudhyata // RamS_2,32.13 //
GE09ram_02su:1968: tatra vṛddho mahāmātraḥ siddhārtho nāma nāmataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1969: śucir bahumato rājñaḥ kaikeyīm idam abravīt // RamS_2,32.14 //
GE09ram_02su:1970: asamañjo gṛhītvā tu krīḍitaḥ pathi dārakān /
GE09ram_02su:1971: sarayvāḥ prakṣipann apsu ramate tena durmatiḥ // RamS_2,32.15 //
GE09ram_02su:1972: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāgarāḥ sarve kruddhā rājānam abruvan /
GE09ram_02su:1973: asamañjaṃ vṛṇīṣvaikam asmān vā rāṣṭravardhana // RamS_2,32.16 //
GE09ram_02su:1974: tān uvāca tato rājā kiṃnimittam idaṃ bhayam /
GE09ram_02su:1975: tāś cāpi rājñā saṃpṛṣṭā vākyaṃ prakṛtayo 'bruvan // RamS_2,32.17 //
GE09ram_02su:1976: krīḍitas tv eṣa naḥ putrān bālān udbhrāntacetanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1977: sarayvāṃ prakṣipan maurkhyād atulāṃ prītim aśnute // RamS_2,32.18 //
GE09ram_02su:1978: sa tāsāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā prakṛtīnāṃ narādhipa /
GE09ram_02su:1979: taṃ tatyājāhitaṃ putraṃ tāsāṃ priyacikīrṣayā // RamS_2,32.19 //
GE09ram_02su:1980: ity evam atyajad rājā sagaro vai sudhārmikaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1981: rāmaḥ kim akarot pāpaṃ yenaivam uparudhyate // RamS_2,32.20 //
GE09ram_02su:1983: śokopahatayā vācā kaikeyīm idam abravīt // RamS_2,32.21 //
GE09ram_02su:1984: anuvrajiṣyāmy aham adya rāmaṃ rājyaṃ parityajya sukhaṃ dhanaṃ ca /
GE09ram_02su:1985: sahaiva rājñā bharatena ca tvaṃ yathā sukhaṃ bhuṅkṣva cirāya rājyam // RamS_2,32.22 //
GE09ram_02su:1989: anvabhāṣata vākyaṃ tu vinayajño vinītavat // RamS_2,33.1 //
GE09ram_02su:1990: tyaktabhogasya me rājan vane vanyena jīvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1991: kiṃ kāryam anuyātreṇa tyaktasaṅgasya sarvataḥ // RamS_2,33.2 //
GE09ram_02su:1992: yo hi dattvā dvipaśreṣṭhaṃ kakṣyāyāṃ kurute manaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:1993: rajjusnehena kiṃ tasya tyajataḥ kuñjarottamam // RamS_2,33.3 //
GE09ram_02su:1994: tathā mama satāṃ śreṣṭha kiṃ dhvajinyā jagatpate /
GE09ram_02su:1995: sarvāṇy evānujānāmi cīrāṇy evānayantu me // RamS_2,33.4 //
GE09ram_02su:1997: caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi vasato mama // RamS_2,33.5 //
GE09ram_02su:1998: atha cīrāṇi kaikeyī svayam āhṛtya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:2000: sa cīre puruṣavyāghraḥ kaikeyyāḥ pratigṛhya te /
GE09ram_02su:2001: sūkṣmavastram avakṣipya munivastrāṇy avasta ha // RamS_2,33.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2002: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tatraiva vihāya vasane śubhe /
GE09ram_02su:2003: tāpasāc chādane caiva jagrāha pitur agrataḥ // RamS_2,33.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2005: samīkṣya cīraṃ saṃtrastā pṛṣatī vāgurām iva // RamS_2,33.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2008: kathaṃ nu cīraṃ badhnanti munayo vanavāsinaḥ // RamS_2,33.10 //*
GE09ram_02su:2009: kṛtvā kaṇṭhe ca sā cīram ekam ādāya pāṇinā /
GE09ram_02su:2010: tasthau hy akuśalā tatra vrīḍitā janakātmajā // RamS_2,33.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2011: tasyās tat kṣipram āgamya rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2012: cīraṃ babandha sītāyāḥ kauśeyasyopari svayam // RamS_2,33.12 //
GE09ram_02su:2014: pracukrośa janaḥ sarvo dhik tvāṃ daśarathaṃ tv iti // RamS_2,33.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2015: sa niḥśvasyoṣṇam aikṣvākas tāṃ bhāryām idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:2016: kaikeyi kuśacīreṇa na sītā gantum arhati // RamS_2,33.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2017: nanu paryāptam etat te pāpe rāmavivāsanam /
GE09ram_02su:2018: kim ebhiḥ kṛpaṇair bhūyaḥ pātakair api te kṛtaiḥ // RamS_2,33.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2019: evaṃ bruvantaṃ pitaraṃ rāmaḥ samprasthito vanam /
GE09ram_02su:2020: avākśirasam āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,33.16 //
GE09ram_02su:2021: iyaṃ dhārmika kausalyā mama mātā yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:2022: vṛddhā cākṣudraśīlā ca na ca tvāṃ devagarhite // RamS_2,33.17 //
GE09ram_02su:2025: imāṃ mahendropamajātagarbhiṇīṃ tathā vidhātuṃ jananīṃ mamārhasi /
GE09ram_02su:2026: yathā vanasthe mayi śokakarśitā na jīvitaṃ nyasya yamakṣayaṃ vrajet // RamS_2,33.19 //
GE09ram_02su:2029: rāmasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā muniveṣadharaṃ ca tam /
GE09ram_02su:2030: samīkṣya saha bhāryābhī rājā vigatacetanaḥ // RamS_2,34.1 //
GE09ram_02su:2032: na cainam abhisamprekṣya pratyabhāṣata durmanāḥ // RamS_2,34.2 //
GE09ram_02su:2033: sa muhūrtam ivāsaṃjño duḥkhitaś ca mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2035: manye khalu mayā pūrvaṃ vivatsā bahavaḥ kṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2036: prāṇino hiṃsitā vāpi tasmād idam upasthitam // RamS_2,34.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2037: na tv evānāgate kāle dehāc cyavati jīvitam /
GE09ram_02su:2038: kaikeyyā kliśyamānasya mṛtyur mama na vidyate // RamS_2,34.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2040: vihāya vasane sūkṣme tāpasācchādam ātmajam // RamS_2,34.6 //
GE09ram_02su:2041: ekasyāḥ khalu kaikeyyāḥ kṛte 'yaṃ kliśyate janaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2042: svārthe prayatamānāyāḥ saṃśritya nikṛtiṃ tv imām // RamS_2,34.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2043: evam uktvā tu vacanaṃ bāṣpeṇa pihitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2044: rāmeti sakṛd evoktvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha // RamS_2,34.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2045: saṃjñāṃ tu pratilabhyaiva muhūrtāt sa mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2046: netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ sumantram idam abravīt // RamS_2,34.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2047: aupavāhyaṃ rathaṃ yuktvā tvam āyāhi hayottamaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2048: prāpayainaṃ mahābhāgam ito janapadāt param // RamS_2,34.10 //
GE09ram_02su:2049: evaṃ manye guṇavatāṃ guṇānāṃ phalam ucyate /
GE09ram_02su:2050: pitrā mātrā ca yat sādhur vīro nirvāsyate vanam // RamS_2,34.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2052: yojayitvāyayau tatra ratham aśvair alaṃkṛtam // RamS_2,34.12 //
GE09ram_02su:2056: uvāca deśakālajño niścitaṃ sarvataḥ śuci // RamS_2,34.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2057: vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:2058: varṣāṇy etāni saṃkhyāya vaidehyāḥ kṣipram ānaya // RamS_2,34.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2059: narendreṇaivam uktas tu gatvā kośagṛhaṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2060: prāyacchat sarvam āhṛtya sītāyai kṣipram eva tat // RamS_2,34.16 //
GE09ram_02su:2061: sā sujātā sujātāni vaidehī prasthitā vanam /
GE09ram_02su:2062: bhūṣayāmāsa gātrāṇi tair vicitrair vibhūṣaṇaiḥ // RamS_2,34.17 //
GE09ram_02su:2064: udyato 'ṃśumataḥ kāle khaṃ prabheva vivasvataḥ // RamS_2,34.18 //
GE09ram_02su:2065: tāṃ bhujābhyāṃ pariṣvajya śvaśrūr vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:2066: anācarantīṃ kṛpaṇaṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya maithilīm // RamS_2,34.19 //
GE09ram_02su:2069: sa tvayā nāvamantavyaḥ putraḥ pravrājito mama /
GE09ram_02su:2070: tava daivatam astv eṣa nirdhanaḥ sadhano 'pi vā // RamS_2,34.21 //
GE09ram_02su:2072: kṛtāñjalir uvācedaṃ śvaśrūm abhimukhe sthitā // RamS_2,34.22 //
GE09ram_02su:2073: kariṣye sarvam evāham āryā yad anuśāsti mām /
GE09ram_02su:2074: abhijñāsmi yathā bhartur vartitavyaṃ śrutaṃ ca me // RamS_2,34.23 //
GE09ram_02su:2076: dharmād vicalituṃ nāham alaṃ candrād iva prabhā // RamS_2,34.24 //
GE09ram_02su:2077: nātantrī vādyate vīṇā nācakro vartate rathaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2078: nāpatiḥ sukham edhate yā syād api śatātmajā // RamS_2,34.25 //
GE09ram_02su:2079: mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ mātā mitaṃ sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2080: amitasya hi dātāraṃ bhartāraṃ kā na pūjayet // RamS_2,34.26 //
GE09ram_02su:2082: ārye kim avamanyeyaṃ strīṇāṃ bhartā hi daivatam // RamS_2,34.27 //
GE09ram_02su:2086: rāmaḥ paramadharmajño mātaraṃ vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,34.29 //
GE09ram_02su:2087: amba mā duḥkhitā bhūs tvaṃ paśya tvaṃ pitaraṃ mama /
GE09ram_02su:2088: kṣayo hi vanavāsasya kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,34.30 //
GE09ram_02su:2089: suptāyās te gamiṣyanti navavarṣāṇi pañca ca /
GE09ram_02su:2090: sā samagram iha prāptaṃ māṃ drakṣyasi suhṛdvṛtam // RamS_2,34.31 //
GE09ram_02su:2091: etāvad abhinītārtham uktvā sa jananīṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2092: trayaḥ śataśatārdhā hi dadarśāvekṣya mātaraḥ // RamS_2,34.32 //
GE09ram_02su:2093: tāś cāpi sa tathaivārtā mātḥn daśarathātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2094: dharmayuktam idaṃ vākyaṃ nijagāda kṛtāñjaliḥ // RamS_2,34.33 //
GE09ram_02su:2095: saṃvāsāt paruṣaṃ kiṃcid ajñānād vāpi yat kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:2096: tan me samanujānīta sarvāś cāmantrayāmi vaḥ // RamS_2,34.34 //
GE09ram_02su:2097: jajñe 'tha tāsāṃ saṃnādaḥ krauñcīnām iva niḥsvanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2098: mānavendrasya bhāryāṇām evaṃ vadati rāghave // RamS_2,34.35 //
GE09ram_02su:2100: vilapitaparidevanākulaṃ vyasanagataṃ tad abhūt suduḥkhitam // RamS_2,34.36 //
GE09ram_02su:2103: atha rāmaś ca sītā ca lakṣmaṇaś ca kṛtāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2104: upasaṃgṛhya rājānaṃ cakrur dīnāḥ pradakṣiṇam // RamS_2,35.1 //
GE09ram_02su:2105: taṃ cāpi samanujñāpya dharmajñaḥ sītayā saha /
GE09ram_02su:2108: atha mātuḥ sumitrāyā jagrāha caraṇau punaḥ // RamS_2,35.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2109: taṃ vandamānaṃ rudatī mātā saumitrim abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:2110: hitakāmā mahābāhuṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya lakṣmaṇam // RamS_2,35.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2112: rāme pramādaṃ mā kārṣīḥ putra bhrātari gacchati // RamS_2,35.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2113: vyasanī vā samṛddho vā gatir eṣa tavānagha /
GE09ram_02su:2114: eṣa loke satāṃ dharmo yaj jyeṣṭhavaśago bhavet // RamS_2,35.6 //
GE09ram_02su:2115: idaṃ hi vṛttam ucitaṃ kulasyāsya sanātanam /
GE09ram_02su:2116: dānaṃ dīkṣā ca yajñeṣu tanutyāgo mṛdheṣu ca // RamS_2,35.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2117: rāmaṃ daśarathaṃ viddhi māṃ viddhi janakātmajām /
GE09ram_02su:2118: ayodhyām aṭavīṃ viddhi gaccha tāta yathāsukham // RamS_2,35.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2119: tataḥ sumantraḥ kākutsthaṃ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:2120: vinīto vinayajñaś ca mātalir vāsavaṃ yathā // RamS_2,35.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2121: ratham āroha bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2122: kṣipraṃ tvāṃ prāpayiṣyāmi yatra māṃ rāma vakṣyasi // RamS_2,35.10 //
GE09ram_02su:2123: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyāni vane tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:2124: tāny upakramitavyāni yāni devyāsi coditaḥ // RamS_2,35.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2125: taṃ rathaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaṃ sītā hṛṣṭena cetasā /
GE09ram_02su:2128: rathopasthe pratinyasya sacarmakaṭhinaṃ ca tat // RamS_2,35.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2130: sumantraḥ saṃmatān aśvān vāyuvegasamāñ jave // RamS_2,35.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2132: babhūva nagare mūrchā balamūrchā janasya ca // RamS_2,35.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2136: rāmam evābhidudrāva gharmārtaḥ salilaṃ yathā // RamS_2,35.17 //
GE09ram_02su:2138: bāṣpapūrṇamukhāḥ sarve tam ūcur bhṛśaduḥkhitāḥ // RamS_2,35.18 //
GE09ram_02su:2139: saṃyaccha vājināṃ raśmīn sūta yāhi śanaiḥ śanaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2140: mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi rāmasya durdarśaṃ no bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,35.19 //
GE09ram_02su:2142: yad devagarbhapratime vanaṃ yāti na bhidyate // RamS_2,35.20 //
GE09ram_02su:2144: na jahāti ratā dharme merum arkaprabhā yathā // RamS_2,35.21 //
GE09ram_02su:2146: bhrātaraṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ yas tvaṃ paricariṣyasi // RamS_2,35.22 //
GE09ram_02su:2147: mahaty eṣā hi te siddhir eṣa cābhyudayo mahān /
GE09ram_02su:2148: eṣa svargasya mārgaś ca yad enam anugacchasi /
GE09ram_02su:2149: evaṃ vadantas te soḍhuṃ na śekur bāṣpam āgatam // RamS_2,35.23 //*
GE09ram_02su:2150: atha rājā vṛtaḥ strībhir dīnābhir dīnacetanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2151: nirjagāma priyaṃ putraṃ drakṣyāmīti bruvan gṛhāt // RamS_2,35.24 //
GE09ram_02su:2153: yathā nādaḥ kareṇūnāṃ baddhe mahati kuñjare // RamS_2,35.25 //
GE09ram_02su:2154: pitā ca rājā kākutsthaḥ śrīmān sannas tadā babhau /
GE09ram_02su:2155: paripūrṇaḥ śaśī kāle graheṇopapluto yathā // RamS_2,35.26 //
GE09ram_02su:2157: narāṇāṃ prekṣya rājānaṃ sīdantaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitam // RamS_2,35.27 //
GE09ram_02su:2158: hā rāmeti janāḥ kecid rāmamāteti cāpare /
GE09ram_02su:2159: antaḥpuraṃ samṛddhaṃ ca krośantaṃ paryadevayan // RamS_2,35.28 //
GE09ram_02su:2164: dṛṣṭvā saṃcodayāmāsa śīghraṃ yāhīti sārathim // RamS_2,35.30 //
GE09ram_02su:2165: na hi tat puruṣavyāghro duḥkhadaṃ darśanaṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2166: mātuś ca sahituṃ śaktas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ // RamS_2,35.31 //
GE09ram_02su:2167: tathā rudantīṃ kausalyāṃ rathaṃ tam anudhāvatīm /
GE09ram_02su:2168: krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca /
GE09ram_02su:2169: asakṛt praikṣata tadā nṛtyantīm iva mātaram // RamS_2,35.32 //*
GE09ram_02su:2170: tiṣṭheti rājā cukrośa yāhi yāhīti rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2171: sumantrasya babhūvātmā cakrayor iva cāntarā // RamS_2,35.33 //
GE09ram_02su:2173: ciraṃ duḥkhasya pāpiṣṭham iti rāmas tam abravīt // RamS_2,35.34 //
GE09ram_02su:2174: rāmasya sa vacaḥ kurvann anujñāpya ca taṃ janam /
GE09ram_02su:2175: vrajato 'pi hayāñ śīghraṃ codayāmāsa sārathiḥ // RamS_2,35.35 //
GE09ram_02su:2176: nyavartata jano rājño rāmaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam /
GE09ram_02su:2177: manasāpy aśruvegaiś ca na nyavartata mānuṣam // RamS_2,35.36 //
GE09ram_02su:2178: yam icchet punar āyāntaṃ nainaṃ dūram anuvrajet /
GE09ram_02su:2179: ity amātyā mahārājam ūcur daśarathaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,35.37 //
GE09ram_02su:2181: niśamya rājā kṛpaṇaḥ sabhāryo vyavasthitas taṃ sutam īkṣamāṇaḥ // RamS_2,35.38 //
GE09ram_02su:2185: ārtaśabdo hi saṃjajñe strīṇām antaḥpure mahān // RamS_2,36.1 //
GE09ram_02su:2187: yo gatiḥ śaraṇaṃ cāsīt sa nāthaḥ kva nu gacchati // RamS_2,36.2 //
GE09ram_02su:2189: kruddhān prasādayan sarvān samaduḥkhaḥ kva gacchati // RamS_2,36.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2191: tathā yo vartate 'smāsu mahātmā kva nu gacchati // RamS_2,36.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2193: paritrātā janasyāsya jagataḥ kva nu gacchati // RamS_2,36.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2195: dharmyaṃ satyavrataṃ rāmaṃ vanavāse pravatsyati // RamS_2,36.6 //
GE09ram_02su:2196: iti sarvā mahiṣyas tā vivatsā iva dhenavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2197: ruruduś caiva duḥkhārtāḥ sasvaraṃ ca vicukruśuḥ // RamS_2,36.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2198: sa tam antaḥpure ghoram ārtaśabdaṃ mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2201: vyasṛjan kavalān nāgā gāvo vatsān na pāyayan // RamS_2,36.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2203: dāruṇāḥ somam abhyetya grahāḥ sarve vyavasthitāḥ // RamS_2,36.10 //
GE09ram_02su:2205: viśākhāś ca sadhūmāś ca nabhasi pracakāśire // RamS_2,36.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2206: akasmān nāgaraḥ sarvo jano dainyam upāgamat /
GE09ram_02su:2207: āhāre vā vihāre vā na kaścid akaron manaḥ // RamS_2,36.12 //
GE09ram_02su:2209: na hṛṣṭo lakṣyate kaścit sarvaḥ śokaparāyaṇaḥ // RamS_2,36.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2210: na vāti pavanaḥ śīto na śaśī saumyadarśanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2211: na sūryas tapate lokaṃ sarvaṃ paryākulaṃ jagat // RamS_2,36.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2212: anarthinaḥ sutāḥ strīṇāṃ bhartāro bhrātaras tathā /
GE09ram_02su:2213: sarve sarvaṃ parityajya rāmam evānvacintayan // RamS_2,36.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2214: ye tu rāmasya suhṛdaḥ sarve te mūḍhacetasaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2215: śokabhāreṇa cākrāntāḥ śayanaṃ na jahus tadā // RamS_2,36.16 //
GE09ram_02su:2216: tatas tv ayodhyā rahitā mahātmanā puraṃdareṇeva mahī saparvatā /
GE09ram_02su:2217: cacāla ghoraṃ bhayabhārapīḍitā sanāgayodhāśvagaṇā nanāda ca // RamS_2,36.17 //
GE09ram_02su:2220: yāvat tu niryatas tasya rajorūpam adṛśyata /
GE09ram_02su:2222: yāvad rājā priyaṃ putraṃ paśyaty atyantadhārmikam /
GE09ram_02su:2224: na paśyati rajo 'py asya yadā rāmasya bhūmipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2225: tadārtaś ca viṣaṇṇaś ca papāta dharaṇītale // RamS_2,37.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2226: tasya dakṣiṇam anvagāt kausalyā bāhum aṅganā /
GE09ram_02su:2227: vāmaṃ cāsyānvagāt pārśvaṃ kaikeyī bharatapriyā // RamS_2,37.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2228: tāṃ nayena ca sampanno dharmeṇa vinayena ca /
GE09ram_02su:2229: uvāca rājā kaikeyīṃ samīkṣya vyathitendriyaḥ // RamS_2,37.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2230: kaikeyi mā mamāṅgāni sprākṣīs tvaṃ duṣṭacāriṇī /
GE09ram_02su:2231: na hi tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi na bhāryā na ca bāndhavī // RamS_2,37.6 //
GE09ram_02su:2232: ye ca tvām upajīvanti nāhaṃ teṣāṃ na te mama /
GE09ram_02su:2233: kevalārthaparāṃ hi tvāṃ tyaktadharmāṃ tyajāmy aham // RamS_2,37.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2234: agṛhṇāṃ yac ca te pāṇim agniṃ paryaṇayaṃ ca yat /
GE09ram_02su:2235: anujānāmi tat sarvam asmiṃl loke paratra ca // RamS_2,37.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2236: bharataś cet pratītaḥ syād rājyaṃ prāpyedam avyayam /
GE09ram_02su:2237: yan me sa dadyāt pitrarthaṃ mā mā tad dattam āgamat // RamS_2,37.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2239: nyavartata tadā devī kausalyā śokakarśitā // RamS_2,37.10 //
GE09ram_02su:2240: hatveva brāhmaṇaṃ kāmāt spṛṣṭvāgnim iva pāṇinā /
GE09ram_02su:2241: anvatapyata dharmātmā putraṃ saṃcintya tāpasam // RamS_2,37.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2243: rājño nātibabhau rūpaṃ grastasyāṃśumato yathā // RamS_2,37.12 //
GE09ram_02su:2244: vilalāpa ca duḥkhārtaḥ priyaṃ putram anusmaran /
GE09ram_02su:2245: nagarāntam anuprāptaṃ buddhvā putram athābravīt // RamS_2,37.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2246: vāhanānāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vahatāṃ taṃ mamātmajam /
GE09ram_02su:2247: padāni pathi dṛśyante sa mahātmā na dṛśyate // RamS_2,37.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2248: sa nūnaṃ kvacid evādya vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2249: kāṣṭhaṃ vā yadi vāśmānam upadhāya śayiṣyate // RamS_2,37.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2253: rāmam utthāya gacchantaṃ lokanātham anāthavat // RamS_2,37.17 //
GE09ram_02su:2254: sakāmā bhava kaikeyi vidhavā rājyam āvasa /
GE09ram_02su:2255: na hi taṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ vinā jīvitum utsahe // RamS_2,37.18 //
GE09ram_02su:2260: tām avekṣya purīṃ sarvāṃ rāmam evānucintayan /
GE09ram_02su:2261: vilapan prāviśad rājā gṛhaṃ sūrya ivāmbudam // RamS_2,37.21 //
GE09ram_02su:2263: rāmeṇa rahitaṃ veśma vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // RamS_2,37.22 //
GE09ram_02su:2264: kausalyāyā gṛhaṃ śīghraṃ rāmamātur nayantu mām /
GE09ram_02su:2265: iti bruvantaṃ rājānam anayan dvāradarśinaḥ // RamS_2,37.23 //
GE09ram_02su:2267: adhiruhyāpi śayanaṃ babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ // RamS_2,37.24 //
GE09ram_02su:2268: tac ca dṛṣṭvā mahārājo bhujam udyamya vīryavān /
GE09ram_02su:2269: uccaiḥ svareṇa cukrośa hā rāghava jahāsi mām // RamS_2,37.25 //
GE09ram_02su:2270: sukhitā bata taṃ kālaṃ jīviṣyanti narottamāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2271: pariṣvajanto ye rāmaṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam // RamS_2,37.26 //
GE09ram_02su:2272: na tvāṃ paśyāmi kausalye sādhu māṃ pāṇinā spṛśa /
GE09ram_02su:2273: rāmaṃ me 'nugatā dṛṣṭir adyāpi na nivartate // RamS_2,37.27 //
GE09ram_02su:2274: taṃ rāmam evānuvicintayantaṃ samīkṣya devī śayane narendram /
GE09ram_02su:2275: upopaviśyādhikam ārtarūpā viniḥśvasantī vilalāpa kṛcchram // RamS_2,37.28 //
GE09ram_02su:2278: tataḥ samīkṣya śayane sannaṃ śokena pārthivam /
GE09ram_02su:2279: kausalyā putraśokārtā tam uvāca mahīpatim // RamS_2,38.1 //
GE09ram_02su:2281: vicariṣyati kaikeyī nirmukteva hi pannagī // RamS_2,38.2 //
GE09ram_02su:2283: trāsayiṣyati māṃ bhūyo duṣṭāhir iva veśmani // RamS_2,38.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2284: atha sma nagare rāmaś caran bhaikṣaṃ gṛhe vaset /
GE09ram_02su:2285: kāmakāro varaṃ dātum api dāsaṃ mamātmajam // RamS_2,38.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2286: pātayitvā tu kaikeyyā rāmaṃ sthānād yatheṣṭataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2289: vanam āviśate nūnaṃ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // RamS_2,38.6 //
GE09ram_02su:2291: tyaktānāṃ vanavāsāya kā nv avasthā bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,38.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2293: kathaṃ vatsyanti kṛpaṇāḥ phalamūlaiḥ kṛtāśanāḥ // RamS_2,38.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2294: apīdānīṃ sa kālaḥ syān mama śokakṣayaḥ śivaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2295: sabhāryaṃ yat saha bhrātrā paśyeyam iha rāghavam // RamS_2,38.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2299: nandiṣyati purī hṛṣṭā samudra iva parvaṇi // RamS_2,38.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2301: puraskṛtya rathe sītāṃ vṛṣabho govadhūm iva // RamS_2,38.12 //
GE09ram_02su:2304: kadā sumanasaḥ kanyā dvijātīnāṃ phalāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:2305: pradiśantyaḥ purīṃ hṛṣṭāḥ kariṣyanti pradakṣiṇam // RamS_2,38.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2307: abhyupaiṣyati dharmajñas trivarṣa iva māṃ lalan // RamS_2,38.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2308: niḥsaṃśayaṃ mayā manye purā vīra kadaryayā /
GE09ram_02su:2309: pātu kāmeṣu vatseṣu mātḥṇāṃ śātitāḥ stanāḥ // RamS_2,38.16 //
GE09ram_02su:2310: sāhaṃ gaur iva siṃhena vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā /
GE09ram_02su:2311: kaikeyyā puruṣavyāghra bālavatseva gaur balāt // RamS_2,38.17 //
GE09ram_02su:2312: na hi tāvad guṇair juṣṭaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam /
GE09ram_02su:2313: ekaputrā vinā putram ahaṃ jīvitum utsahe // RamS_2,38.18 //
GE09ram_02su:2314: na hi me jīvite kiṃcit sāmarthyam iha kalpyate /
GE09ram_02su:2315: apaśyantyāḥ priyaṃ putraṃ mahābāhuṃ mahābalam // RamS_2,38.19 //
GE09ram_02su:2316: ayaṃ hi māṃ dīpayate samutthitas tanūjaśokaprabhavo hutāśanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2317: mahīm imāṃ raśmibhir uttamaprabho yathā nidāghe bhagavān divākaraḥ // RamS_2,38.20 //
GE09ram_02su:2320: vilapantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu kausalyāṃ pramadottamām /
GE09ram_02su:2321: idaṃ dharme sthitā dharmyaṃ sumitrā vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,39.1 //
GE09ram_02su:2322: tavārye sadguṇair yuktaḥ putraḥ sa puruṣottamaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2323: kiṃ te vilapitenaivaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ ruditena vā // RamS_2,39.2 //
GE09ram_02su:2324: yas tavārye gataḥ putras tyaktvā rājyaṃ mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2325: sādhu kurvan mahātmānaṃ pitaraṃ satyavādinām // RamS_2,39.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2326: śiṣṭair ācarite samyak śaśvat pretya phalodaye /
GE09ram_02su:2327: rāmo dharme sthitaḥ śreṣṭho na sa śocyaḥ kadācana // RamS_2,39.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2329: dayāvān sarvabhūteṣu lābhas tasya mahātmanaḥ // RamS_2,39.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2330: araṇyavāse yad duḥkhaṃ jānatī vai sukhocitā /
GE09ram_02su:2332: kīrtibhūtāṃ patākāṃ yo loke bhrāmayati prabhuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2333: damasatyavrataparaḥ kiṃ na prāptas tavātmajaḥ // RamS_2,39.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2334: vyaktaṃ rāmasya vijñāya śaucaṃ māhātmyam uttamam /
GE09ram_02su:2335: na gātram aṃśubhiḥ sūryaḥ saṃtāpayitum arhati // RamS_2,39.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2339: raśmibhiḥ saṃspṛśañ śītaiś candramā hlādayiṣyati // RamS_2,39.10 //
GE09ram_02su:2340: dadau cāstrāṇi divyāni yasmai brahmā mahaujase /
GE09ram_02su:2341: dānavendraṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā timidhvajasutaṃ raṇe // RamS_2,39.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2342: pṛthivyā saha vaidehyā śriyā ca puruṣarṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2343: kṣipraṃ tisṛbhir etābhiḥ saha rāmo 'bhiṣekṣyate // RamS_2,39.12 //
GE09ram_02su:2344: duḥkhajaṃ visṛjanty asraṃ niṣkrāmantam udīkṣya yam /
GE09ram_02su:2345: samutsrakṣyasi netrābhyāṃ kṣipram ānandajaṃ payaḥ // RamS_2,39.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2347: mudāśru mokṣyase kṣipraṃ meghalekheva vārṣikī // RamS_2,39.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2348: putras te varadaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ punar āgataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2350: niśamya tal lakṣmaṇamātṛvākyaṃ rāmasya mātur naradevapatnyāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2351: sadyaḥ śarīre vinanāśa śokaḥ śaradgato megha ivālpatoyaḥ // RamS_2,39.16 //
GE09ram_02su:2355: anujagmuḥ prayāntaṃ taṃ vanavāsāya mānavāḥ // RamS_2,40.1 //
GE09ram_02su:2356: nivartite 'pi ca balāt suhṛdvarge ca rājani /
GE09ram_02su:2357: naiva te saṃnyavartanta rāmasyānugatā ratham // RamS_2,40.2 //
GE09ram_02su:2359: babhūva guṇasampannaḥ pūrṇacandra iva priyaḥ // RamS_2,40.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2360: sa yācyamānaḥ kākutsthaḥ svābhiḥ prakṛtibhis tadā /
GE09ram_02su:2361: kurvāṇaḥ pitaraṃ satyaṃ vanam evānvapadyata // RamS_2,40.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2363: uvāca rāmaḥ snehena tāḥ prajāḥ svāḥ prajā iva // RamS_2,40.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2364: yā prītir bahumānaś ca mayy ayodhyānivāsinām /
GE09ram_02su:2365: matpriyārthaṃ viśeṣeṇa bharate sā niveśyatām // RamS_2,40.6 //
GE09ram_02su:2367: kariṣyati yathāvad vaḥ priyāṇi ca hitāni ca // RamS_2,40.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2369: anurūpaḥ sa vo bhartā bhaviṣyati bhayāpahaḥ // RamS_2,40.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2370: sa hi rājaguṇair yukto yuvarājaḥ samīkṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2371: api cāpi mayā śiṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ vo bhartṛśāsanam // RamS_2,40.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2372: na ca tapyed yathā cāsau vanavāsaṃ gate mayi /
GE09ram_02su:2373: mahārājas tathā kāryo mama priyacikīrṣayā // RamS_2,40.10 //
GE09ram_02su:2375: tathā tathā prakṛtayo rāmaṃ patim akāmayan // RamS_2,40.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2376: bāṣpeṇa pihitaṃ dīnaṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_02su:2377: cakarṣeva guṇair baddhvā janaṃ punar ivāsanam // RamS_2,40.12 //
GE09ram_02su:2378: te dvijās trividhaṃ vṛddhā jñānena vayasaujasā /
GE09ram_02su:2379: vayaḥprakampaśiraso dūrād ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,40.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2380: vahanto javanā rāmaṃ bho bho jātyās turaṃgamāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2381: nivartadhvaṃ na gantavyaṃ hitā bhavata bhartari /
GE09ram_02su:2382: upavāhyas tu vo bhartā nāpavāhyaḥ purād vanam // RamS_2,40.14 //*
GE09ram_02su:2383: evam ārtapralāpāṃs tān vṛddhān pralapato dvijān /
GE09ram_02su:2384: avekṣya sahasā rāmo rathād avatatāra ha // RamS_2,40.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2387: dvijātīṃs tu padātīṃs tān rāmaś cāritravatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2388: na śaśāka ghṛṇācakṣuḥ parimoktuṃ rathena saḥ // RamS_2,40.17 //
GE09ram_02su:2389: gacchantam eva taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ saṃbhrāntamānasāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2390: ūcuḥ paramasaṃtaptā rāmaṃ vākyam idaṃ dvijāḥ // RamS_2,40.18 //
GE09ram_02su:2391: brāhmaṇyaṃ kṛtsnam etat tvāṃ brahmaṇyam anugacchati /
GE09ram_02su:2392: dvijaskandhādhirūḍhās tvām agnayo 'py anuyānty amī // RamS_2,40.19 //
GE09ram_02su:2396: ebhiś chāyāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ svaiś chattrair vājapeyikaiḥ // RamS_2,40.21 //
GE09ram_02su:2397: yā hi naḥ satataṃ buddhir vedamantrānusāriṇī /
GE09ram_02su:2398: tvatkṛte sā kṛtā vatsa vanavāsānusāriṇī // RamS_2,40.22 //
GE09ram_02su:2399: hṛdayeṣv avatiṣṭhante vedā ye naḥ paraṃ dhanam /
GE09ram_02su:2400: vatsyanty api gṛheṣv eva dārāś cāritrarakṣitāḥ // RamS_2,40.23 //
GE09ram_02su:2401: na punar niścayaḥ kāryas tvadgatau sukṛtā matiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2402: tvayi dharmavyapekṣe tu kiṃ syād dharmam avekṣitum // RamS_2,40.24 //
GE09ram_02su:2405: bahūnāṃ vitatā yajñā dvijānāṃ ya ihāgatāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2406: teṣāṃ samāptir āyattā tava vatsa nivartane // RamS_2,40.26 //
GE09ram_02su:2408: yācamāneṣu teṣu tvaṃ bhaktiṃ bhakteṣu darśaya // RamS_2,40.27 //
GE09ram_02su:2414: dadṛśe tamasā tatra vārayantīva rāghavam // RamS_2,40.30 //
GE09ram_02su:2417: tatas tu tamasā tīraṃ ramyam āśritya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2418: sītām udvīkṣya saumitrim idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,41.1 //
GE09ram_02su:2419: iyam adya niśā pūrvā saumitre prasthitā vanam /
GE09ram_02su:2420: vanavāsasya bhadraṃ te sa notkaṇṭhitum arhasi // RamS_2,41.2 //
GE09ram_02su:2423: adyāyodhyā tu nagarī rājadhānī pitur mama /
GE09ram_02su:2424: sastrīpuṃsā gatān asmāñ śociṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // RamS_2,41.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2425: bharataḥ khalu dharmātmā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca me /
GE09ram_02su:2428: nānuśocāmi pitaraṃ mātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa // RamS_2,41.6 //
GE09ram_02su:2429: tvayā kāryaṃ naravyāghra mām anuvrajatā kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:2430: anveṣṭavyā hi vaidehyā rakṣaṇārthe sahāyatā // RamS_2,41.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2431: adbhir eva tu saumitre vatsyāmy adya niśām imām /
GE09ram_02su:2432: etaddhi rocate mahyaṃ vanye 'pi vividhe sati // RamS_2,41.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2433: evam uktvā tu saumitraṃ sumantram api rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2434: apramattas tvam aśveṣu bhava saumyety uvāca ha // RamS_2,41.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2437: upāsyatu śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā rātrim upasthitām /
GE09ram_02su:2438: rāmasya śayanaṃ cakre sūtaḥ saumitriṇā saha // RamS_2,41.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2439: tāṃ śayyāṃ tamasātīre vīkṣya vṛkṣadalaiḥ kṛtām /
GE09ram_02su:2440: rāmaḥ saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sabhāryaḥ saṃviveśa ha // RamS_2,41.12 //
GE09ram_02su:2441: sabhāryaṃ saṃprasuptaṃ taṃ bhrātaraṃ vīkṣya lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2442: kathayāmāsa sūtāya rāmasya vividhān guṇān // RamS_2,41.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2443: jāgrato hy eva tāṃ rātriṃ saumitrer udito raviḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2444: sūtasya tamasātīre rāmasya bruvato guṇān // RamS_2,41.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2446: avasat tatra tāṃ rātriṃ rāmaḥ prakṛtibhiḥ saha // RamS_2,41.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2447: utthāya tu mahātejāḥ prakṛtīs tā niśāmya ca /
GE09ram_02su:2448: abravīd bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ puṇyalakṣaṇam // RamS_2,41.16 //
GE09ram_02su:2450: vṛkṣamūleṣu saṃsuptān paśya lakṣmaṇa sāmpratam // RamS_2,41.17 //
GE09ram_02su:2452: api prāṇān asiṣyanti na tu tyakṣyanti niścayam // RamS_2,41.18 //
GE09ram_02su:2453: yāvad eva tu saṃsuptās tāvad eva vayaṃ laghu /
GE09ram_02su:2454: ratham āruhya gacchāmaḥ panthānam akutobhayam // RamS_2,41.19 //
GE09ram_02su:2456: svapeyur anuraktā māṃ vṛkṣamūlāni saṃśritāḥ // RamS_2,41.20 //
GE09ram_02su:2457: paurā hy ātmakṛtād duḥkhād vipramocyā nṛpātmajaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2458: na tu khalv ātmanā yojyā duḥkhena puravāsinaḥ // RamS_2,41.21 //
GE09ram_02su:2459: abravīl lakṣmaṇo rāmaṃ sākṣād dharmam iva sthitam /
GE09ram_02su:2460: rocate me mahāprājña kṣipram āruhyatām iti // RamS_2,41.22 //
GE09ram_02su:2461: sūtas tataḥ saṃtvaritaḥ syandanaṃ tair hayottamaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2463: mohanārthaṃ tu paurāṇāṃ sūtaṃ rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2464: udaṅmukhaḥ prayāhi tvaṃ ratham āsthāya sārathe // RamS_2,41.24 //
GE09ram_02su:2465: muhūrtaṃ tvaritaṃ gatvā nirvartaya rathaṃ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2466: yathā na vidyuḥ paurā māṃ tathā kuru samāhitaḥ // RamS_2,41.25 //
GE09ram_02su:2467: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tathā cakre sa sārathiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2468: pratyāgamya ca rāmasya syandanaṃ pratyavedayat // RamS_2,41.26 //
GE09ram_02su:2470: śīghragām ākulāvartāṃ tamasām ataran nadīm // RamS_2,41.27 //
GE09ram_02su:2471: sa saṃtīrya mahābāhuḥ śrīmāñ śivam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:2473: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ paurās te rāghavaṃ vinā /
GE09ram_02su:2476: ālokam api rāmasya na paśyanti sma duḥkhitāḥ // RamS_2,41.30 //
GE09ram_02su:2477: tato mārgānusāreṇa gatvā kiṃcit kṣaṇaṃ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2480: kim idaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmo daivenopahatā iti // RamS_2,41.32 //
GE09ram_02su:2482: ayodhyām agaman sarve purīṃ vyathitasajjanām // RamS_2,41.33 //
GE09ram_02su:2487: svaṃ svaṃ nilayam āgamya putradāraiḥ samāvṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2488: aśrūṇi mumucuḥ sarve bāṣpeṇa pihitānanāḥ // RamS_2,42.2 //
GE09ram_02su:2489: na cāhṛṣyan na cāmodan vaṇijo na prasārayan /
GE09ram_02su:2490: na cāśobhanta paṇyāni nāpacan gṛhamedhinaḥ // RamS_2,42.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2491: naṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā nābhyanandan vipulaṃ vā dhanāgamam /
GE09ram_02su:2492: putraṃ prathamajaṃ labdhvā jananī nābhyanandata // RamS_2,42.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2493: gṛhe gṛhe rudantyaś ca bhartāraṃ gṛham āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:2494: vyagarhayanta duḥkhārtā vāgbhis totrair iva dvipān // RamS_2,42.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2495: kiṃ nu teṣāṃ gṛhaiḥ kāryaṃ kiṃ dāraiḥ kiṃ dhanena vā /
GE09ram_02su:2496: putrair vā kiṃ sukhair vāpi ye na paśyanti rāghavam // RamS_2,42.6 //
GE09ram_02su:2497: ekaḥ satpuruṣo loke lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:2498: yo 'nugacchati kākutsthaṃ rāmaṃ paricaran vane // RamS_2,42.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2499: āpagāḥ kṛtapuṇyās tāḥ padminyaś ca sarāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_02su:2500: yeṣu snāsyati kākutstho vigāhya salilaṃ śuci // RamS_2,42.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2502: āpagāś ca mahānūpāḥ sānumantaś ca parvatāḥ // RamS_2,42.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2503: kānanaṃ vāpi śailaṃ vā yaṃ rāmo 'bhigamiṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:2504: priyātithim iva prāptaṃ nainaṃ śakṣyanty anarcitum // RamS_2,42.10 //
GE09ram_02su:2506: akāle cāpi mukhyāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:2507: darśayiṣyanty anukrośād girayo rāmam āgatam // RamS_2,42.11 //*
GE09ram_02su:2508: vidarśayanto vividhān bhūyaś citrāṃś ca nirjharān /
GE09ram_02su:2510: yatra rāmo bhayaṃ nātra nāsti tatra parābhavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2511: sa hi śūro mahābāhuḥ putro daśarathasya ca // RamS_2,42.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2512: purā bhavati no dūrād anugacchāma rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:2514: sa hi nātho janasyāsya sa gatiḥ sa parāyaṇam // RamS_2,42.14 //*
GE09ram_02su:2515: vayaṃ paricariṣyāmaḥ sītāṃ yūyaṃ tu rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:2516: iti paurastriyo bhartḥn duḥkhārtās tat tad abruvan // RamS_2,42.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2521: kaikeyyā yadi ced rājyaṃ syād adharmyam anāthavat /
GE09ram_02su:2522: na hi no jīvitenārthaḥ kutaḥ putraiḥ kuto dhanaiḥ // RamS_2,42.18 //
GE09ram_02su:2523: yayā putraś ca bhartā ca tyaktāv aiśvaryakāraṇāt /
GE09ram_02su:2524: kaṃ sā parihared anyaṃ kaikeyī kulapāṃsanī // RamS_2,42.19 //
GE09ram_02su:2525: kaikeyyā na vayaṃ rājye bhṛtakā nivasema hi /
GE09ram_02su:2526: jīvantyā jātu jīvantyaḥ putrair api śapāmahe // RamS_2,42.20 //
GE09ram_02su:2528: kas tāṃ prāpya sukhaṃ jīved adharmyāṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm // RamS_2,42.21 //
GE09ram_02su:2529: na hi pravrajite rāme jīviṣyati mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2530: mṛte daśarathe vyaktaṃ vilopas tadanantaram // RamS_2,42.22 //
GE09ram_02su:2532: rāghavaṃ vānugacchadhvam aśrutiṃ vāpi gacchata // RamS_2,42.23 //
GE09ram_02su:2534: bharate saṃnisṛṣṭāḥ smaḥ saunike paśavo yathā // RamS_2,42.24 //
GE09ram_02su:2535: tās tathā vilapantyas tu nagare nāgarastriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2536: cukruśur bhṛśasaṃtaptā mṛtyor iva bhayāgame // RamS_2,42.25 //
GE09ram_02su:2537: tathā striyo rāmanimittam āturā yathā sute bhrātari vā vivāsite /
GE09ram_02su:2538: vilapya dīnā rurudur vicetasaḥ sutair hi tāsām adhiko hi so 'bhavat // RamS_2,42.26 //
GE09ram_02su:2542: jagāma puruṣavyāghraḥ pitur ājñām anusmaran // RamS_2,43.1 //
GE09ram_02su:2543: tathaiva gacchatas tasya vyapāyād rajanī śivā /
GE09ram_02su:2544: upāsya sa śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ viṣayāntaṃ vyagāhata // RamS_2,43.2 //
GE09ram_02su:2545: grāmān vikṛṣṭasīmāṃs tān puṣpitāni vanāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:2546: paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ śarair iva hayottamaiḥ // RamS_2,43.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2548: rājānaṃ dhig daśarathaṃ kāmasya vaśam āgatam // RamS_2,43.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2550: tīkṣṇā saṃbhinnamaryādā tīkṣṇe karmaṇi vartate // RamS_2,43.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2551: yā putram īdṛśaṃ rājñaḥ pravāsayati dhārmikam /
GE09ram_02su:2554: śṛṇvann atiyayau vīraḥ kosalān kosaleśvaraḥ // RamS_2,43.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2557: gatvā tu suciraṃ kālaṃ tataḥ śītajalāṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_02su:2559: gomatīṃ cāpy atikramya rāghavaḥ śīghragair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2561: sa mahīṃ manunā rājñā dattām ikṣvākave purā /
GE09ram_02su:2562: sphītāṃ rāṣṭrāvṛtāṃ rāmo vaidehīm anvadarśayat // RamS_2,43.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2563: sūta ity eva cābhāṣya sārathiṃ tam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2565: kadāhaṃ punar āgamya sarayvāḥ puṣpite vane /
GE09ram_02su:2566: mṛgayāṃ paryaṭiṣyāmi mātrā pitrā ca saṃgataḥ // RamS_2,43.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2568: ratir hy eṣātulā loke rājarṣigaṇasaṃmatā // RamS_2,43.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2569: sa tam adhvānam aikṣvākaḥ sūtaṃ madhurayā girā /
GE09ram_02su:2570: taṃ tam artham abhipretya yayau vākyam udīrayan // RamS_2,43.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2576: dadarśa rāghavo gaṅgāṃ puṇyām ṛṣiniṣevitām // RamS_2,44.2 //
GE09ram_02su:2578: śiśumāraiś ca nakraiś ca bhujaṃgaiś ca niṣevitām // RamS_2,44.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2580: sumantram abravīt sūtam ihaivādya vasāmahe // RamS_2,44.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2583: lakṣaṇaś ca sumantraś ca bāḍham ity eva rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:2584: uktvā tam iṅgudīvṛkṣaṃ tadopayayatur hayaiḥ // RamS_2,44.6 //
GE09ram_02su:2586: rathād avātarat tasmāt sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // RamS_2,44.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2589: tatra rājā guho nāma rāmasyātmasamaḥ sakhā /
GE09ram_02su:2590: niṣādajātyo balavān sthapatiś ceti viśrutaḥ // RamS_2,44.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2591: sa śrutvā puruṣavyāghraṃ rāmaṃ viṣayam āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:2592: vṛddhaiḥ parivṛto 'mātyair jñātibhiś cāpy upāgataḥ // RamS_2,44.10 //
GE09ram_02su:2594: saha saumitriṇā rāmaḥ samāgacchad guhena saḥ // RamS_2,44.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2595: tam ārtaḥ sampariṣvajya guho rāghavam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:2596: yathāyodhyā tathedaṃ te rāma kiṃ karavāṇi te // RamS_2,44.12 //
GE09ram_02su:2598: arghyaṃ copānayat kṣipraṃ vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha // RamS_2,44.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2599: svāgataṃ te mahābāho taveyam akhilā mahī /
GE09ram_02su:2600: vayaṃ preṣyā bhavān bhartā sādhu rājyaṃ praśādhi naḥ // RamS_2,44.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2601: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca lehyaṃ cedam upasthitam /
GE09ram_02su:2602: śayanāni ca mukhyāni vājināṃ khādanaṃ ca te // RamS_2,44.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2603: guham eva bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:2604: arcitāś caiva hṛṣṭāś ca bhavatā sarvathā vayam // RamS_2,44.16 //
GE09ram_02su:2606: bhujābhyāṃ sādhuvṛttābhyāṃ pīḍayan vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,44.17 //
GE09ram_02su:2607: diṣṭyā tvāṃ guha paśyāmi arogaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2608: api te kuśalaṃ rāṣṭre mitreṣu ca dhaneṣu ca // RamS_2,44.18 //
GE09ram_02su:2609: yat tv idaṃ bhavatā kiṃcit prītyā samupakalpitam /
GE09ram_02su:2610: sarvaṃ tad anujānāmi na hi varte pratigrahe // RamS_2,44.19 //
GE09ram_02su:2612: viddhi praṇihitaṃ dharme tāpasaṃ vanagocaram // RamS_2,44.20 //
GE09ram_02su:2615: ete hi dayitā rājñaḥ pitur daśarathasya me /
GE09ram_02su:2616: etaiḥ suvihitair aśvair bhaviṣyāmy aham arcitaḥ // RamS_2,44.22 //
GE09ram_02su:2617: aśvānāṃ pratipānaṃ ca khādanaṃ caiva so 'nvaśāt /
GE09ram_02su:2618: guhas tatraiva puruṣāṃs tvaritaṃ dīyatām iti // RamS_2,44.23 //
GE09ram_02su:2620: jalam evādade bhojyaṃ lakṣmaṇenāhṛtaṃ svayam // RamS_2,44.24 //
GE09ram_02su:2621: tasya bhūmau śayānasya pādau prakṣālya lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2622: sabhāryasya tato 'bhyetya tasthau vṛkṣam upāśritaḥ // RamS_2,44.25 //
GE09ram_02su:2624: anvajāgrat tato rāmam apramatto dhanurdharaḥ // RamS_2,44.26 //
GE09ram_02su:2625: tathā śayānasya tato 'sya dhīmato yaśasvino dāśarather mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2626: adṛṣṭaduḥkhasya sukhocitasya sā tadā vyatīyāya cireṇa śarvarī // RamS_2,44.27 //
GE09ram_02su:2629: taṃ jāgratam adambhena bhrātur arthāya lakṣmaṇam /
GE09ram_02su:2630: guhaḥ saṃtāpasaṃtapto rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,45.1 //
GE09ram_02su:2631: iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā /
GE09ram_02su:2632: pratyāśvasihi sādhv asyāṃ rājaputra yathāsukham // RamS_2,45.2 //
GE09ram_02su:2633: ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvaḥ kleśānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2634: guptyarthaṃ jāgariṣyāmaḥ kākutsthasya vayaṃ niśām // RamS_2,45.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2635: na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaścana /
GE09ram_02su:2636: bravīmy etad ahaṃ satyaṃ satyenaiva ca te śape // RamS_2,45.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2637: asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2638: dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām // RamS_2,45.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2639: so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:2640: rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvato jñātibhiḥ saha // RamS_2,45.6 //
GE09ram_02su:2641: na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃcid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā /
GE09ram_02su:2642: caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ sumahat prasahemahi // RamS_2,45.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2644: nātra bhītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā // RamS_2,45.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2645: kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:2646: śakyā nidrā mayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā // RamS_2,45.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2647: yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi /
GE09ram_02su:2648: taṃ paśya sukhasaṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā // RamS_2,45.10 //
GE09ram_02su:2649: yo mantratapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2651: asmin pravrajito rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:2652: vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,45.12 //
GE09ram_02su:2655: kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama /
GE09ram_02su:2656: nāśaṃse yadi jīvanti sarve te śarvarīm imām // RamS_2,45.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2657: jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā /
GE09ram_02su:2658: tad duḥkhaṃ yat tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati // RamS_2,45.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2662: rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati // RamS_2,45.17 //
GE09ram_02su:2663: siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite /
GE09ram_02su:2670: sukhitā vicariṣyanti rājadhānīṃ pitur mama // RamS_2,45.21 //
GE09ram_02su:2675: tathā hi satyaṃ bruvati prajāhite narendraputre gurusauhṛdād guhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2676: mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyasanābhipīḍito jvarāturo nāga iva vyathāturaḥ // RamS_2,45.24 //
GE09ram_02su:2680: uvāca rāmaḥ saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam // RamS_2,46.1 //
GE09ram_02su:2682: asau sukṛṣṇo vihagaḥ kokilas tāta kūjati // RamS_2,46.2 //
GE09ram_02su:2683: barhiṇānāṃ ca nirghoṣaḥ śrūyate nadatāṃ vane /
GE09ram_02su:2684: tarāma jāhnavīṃ saumya śīghragāṃ sāgaraṃgamām // RamS_2,46.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2686: guham āmantrya sūtaṃ ca so 'tiṣṭhad bhrātur agrataḥ // RamS_2,46.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2687: tataḥ kalāpān saṃnahya khaḍgau baddhvā ca dhanvinau /
GE09ram_02su:2688: jagmatur yena tau gaṅgāṃ sītayā saha rāghavau // RamS_2,46.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2689: rāmam eva tu dharmajñam upagamya vinītavat /
GE09ram_02su:2690: kim ahaṃ karavāṇīti sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // RamS_2,46.6 //
GE09ram_02su:2692: yānaṃ vihāya padbhyāṃ tu gamiṣyāmo mahāvanam // RamS_2,46.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2693: ātmānaṃ tv abhyanujñātam avekṣyārtaḥ sa sārathiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2694: sumantraḥ puruṣavyāghram aikṣvākam idam abravīt // RamS_2,46.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2696: tava sabhrātṛbhāryasya vāsaḥ prākṛtavad vane // RamS_2,46.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2697: na manye brahmacarye 'sti svadhīte vā phalodayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2698: mārdavārjavayor vāpi tvāṃ ced vyasanam āgatam // RamS_2,46.10 //
GE09ram_02su:2699: saha rāghava vaidehyā bhrātrā caiva vane vasan /
GE09ram_02su:2700: tvaṃ gatiṃ prāpsyase vīra trīṃl lokāṃs tu jayann iva // RamS_2,46.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2701: vayaṃ khalu hatā rāma ye tayāpy upavañcitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2702: kaikeyyā vaśam eṣyāmaḥ pāpāyā duḥkhabhāginaḥ // RamS_2,46.12 //
GE09ram_02su:2703: iti bruvann ātmasamaṃ sumantraḥ sārathis tadā /
GE09ram_02su:2704: dṛṣṭvā dūragataṃ rāmaṃ duḥkhārto rurude ciram // RamS_2,46.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2705: tatas tu vigate bāṣpe sūtaṃ spṛṣṭodakaṃ śucim /
GE09ram_02su:2706: rāmas tu madhuraṃ vākyaṃ punaḥ punar uvāca tam // RamS_2,46.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2708: yathā daśaratho rājā māṃ na śocet tathā kuru // RamS_2,46.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2710: kāmabhārāvasannaś ca tasmād etad bravīmi te // RamS_2,46.16 //
GE09ram_02su:2711: yad yad ājñāpayet kiṃcit sa mahātmā mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2712: kaikeyyāḥ priyakāmārthaṃ kāryaṃ tad avikāṅkṣayā // RamS_2,46.17 //
GE09ram_02su:2714: yad eṣāṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu mano na pratihanyate // RamS_2,46.18 //
GE09ram_02su:2715: tad yathā sa mahārājo nālīkam adhigacchati /
GE09ram_02su:2716: na ca tāmyati duḥkhena sumantra kuru tat tathā // RamS_2,46.19 //
GE09ram_02su:2718: brūyās tvam abhivādyaiva mama hetor idaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,46.20 //
GE09ram_02su:2719: naivāham anuśocāmi lakṣmaṇo na ca maithilī /
GE09ram_02su:2720: ayodhyāyāś cyutāś ceti vane vatsyāmaheti vā // RamS_2,46.21 //
GE09ram_02su:2722: lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca drakṣyasi kṣipram āgatān // RamS_2,46.22 //
GE09ram_02su:2723: evam uktvā tu rājānaṃ mātaraṃ ca sumantra me /
GE09ram_02su:2724: anyāś ca devīḥ sahitāḥ kaikeyīṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ // RamS_2,46.23 //
GE09ram_02su:2726: sītāyā mama cāryasya vacanāl lakṣmaṇasya ca // RamS_2,46.24 //
GE09ram_02su:2727: brūyāś ca hi mahārājaṃ bharataṃ kṣipram ānaya /
GE09ram_02su:2728: āgataś cāpi bharataḥ sthāpyo nṛpamate pade // RamS_2,46.25 //
GE09ram_02su:2730: asmatsaṃtāpajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na tvām abhibhaviṣyati // RamS_2,46.26 //
GE09ram_02su:2731: bharataś cāpi vaktavyo yathā rājani vartase /
GE09ram_02su:2732: tathā mātṛṣu vartethāḥ sarvāsv evāviśeṣataḥ // RamS_2,46.27 //
GE09ram_02su:2733: yathā ca tava kaikeyī sumitrā cāviśeṣataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2734: tathaiva devī kausalyā mama mātā viśeṣataḥ // RamS_2,46.28 //
GE09ram_02su:2736: tat sarvaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā snehāt kākutstham abravīt // RamS_2,46.29 //
GE09ram_02su:2737: yad ahaṃ nopacāreṇa brūyāṃ snehād aviklavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2738: bhaktimān iti tat tāvad vākyaṃ tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi // RamS_2,46.30 //
GE09ram_02su:2739: kathaṃ hi tvadvihīno 'haṃ pratiyāsyāmi tāṃ purīm /
GE09ram_02su:2740: tava tāta viyogena putraśokākulām iva // RamS_2,46.31 //
GE09ram_02su:2741: sarāmam api tāvan me rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2742: vinā rāmaṃ rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidīryetāpi sā purī // RamS_2,46.32 //
GE09ram_02su:2743: dainyaṃ hi nagarī gacched dṛṣṭvā śūnyam imaṃ ratham /
GE09ram_02su:2744: sūtāvaśeṣaṃ svaṃ sainyaṃ hatavīram ivāhave // RamS_2,46.33 //
GE09ram_02su:2746: cintayantyo 'dya nūnaṃ tvāṃ nirāhārāḥ kṛtāḥ prajāḥ // RamS_2,46.34 //
GE09ram_02su:2747: ārtanādo hi yaḥ paurair muktas tadvipravāsane /
GE09ram_02su:2748: rathasthaṃ māṃ niśāmyaiva kuryuḥ śataguṇaṃ tataḥ // RamS_2,46.35 //
GE09ram_02su:2749: ahaṃ kiṃ cāpi vakṣyāmi devīṃ tava suto mayā /
GE09ram_02su:2750: nīto 'sau mātulakulaṃ saṃtāpaṃ mā kṛthā iti // RamS_2,46.36 //
GE09ram_02su:2751: asatyam api naivāhaṃ brūyāṃ vacanam īdṛśam /
GE09ram_02su:2752: katham apriyam evāhaṃ brūyāṃ satyam idaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,46.37 //
GE09ram_02su:2754: kathaṃ rathaṃ tvayā hīnaṃ pravakṣyanti hayottamāḥ // RamS_2,46.38 //
GE09ram_02su:2755: yadi me yācamānasya tyāgam eva kariṣyasi /
GE09ram_02su:2756: saratho 'gniṃ pravekṣyāmi tyaktamātra iha tvayā // RamS_2,46.39 //
GE09ram_02su:2758: rathena pratibādhiṣye tāni sattvāni rāghava // RamS_2,46.40 //
GE09ram_02su:2759: tvatkṛte na mayā prāptaṃ rathacaryākṛtaṃ sukham /
GE09ram_02su:2762: prītyābhihitam icchāmi bhava me patyanantaraḥ // RamS_2,46.42 //
GE09ram_02su:2763: tava śuśrūṣaṇaṃ mūrdhnā kariṣyāmi vane vasan /
GE09ram_02su:2764: ayodhyāṃ devalokaṃ vā sarvathā prajahāmy aham // RamS_2,46.43 //
GE09ram_02su:2765: na hi śakyā praveṣṭuṃ sā mayāyodhyā tvayā vinā /
GE09ram_02su:2767: ime cāpi hayā vīra yadi te vanavāsinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2768: paricaryāṃ kariṣyanti prāpsyanti paramāṃ gatim // RamS_2,46.45 //
GE09ram_02su:2769: vanavāse kṣayaṃ prāpte mamaiṣa hi manorathaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2770: yad anena rathenaiva tvāṃ vaheyaṃ purīṃ punaḥ // RamS_2,46.46 //
GE09ram_02su:2771: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi sahitasya tvayā vane /
GE09ram_02su:2772: kṣaṇabhūtāni yāsyanti śataśas tu tato 'nyathā // RamS_2,46.47 //
GE09ram_02su:2774: bhaktaṃ bhṛtyaṃ sthitaṃ sthityāṃ tvaṃ na māṃ hātum arhasi // RamS_2,46.48 //
GE09ram_02su:2775: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dīnaṃ yācamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2776: rāmo bhṛtyānukampī tu sumantram idam abravīt // RamS_2,46.49 //
GE09ram_02su:2777: jānāmi paramāṃ bhaktiṃ mayi te bhartṛvatsala /
GE09ram_02su:2778: śṛṇu cāpi yadarthaṃ tvāṃ preṣayāmi purīm itaḥ // RamS_2,46.50 //
GE09ram_02su:2779: nagarīṃ tvāṃ gataṃ dṛṣṭvā jananī me yavīyasī /
GE09ram_02su:2780: kaikeyī pratyayaṃ gacched iti rāmo vanaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,46.51 //
GE09ram_02su:2781: parituṣṭā hi sā devī vanavāsaṃ gate mayi /
GE09ram_02su:2783: eṣa me prathamaḥ kalpo yad ambā me yavīyasī /
GE09ram_02su:2785: mama priyārthaṃ rājñaś ca sarathas tvaṃ purīṃ vraja /
GE09ram_02su:2786: saṃdiṣṭaś cāsi yānarthāṃs tāṃs tān brūyās tathātathā // RamS_2,46.54 //
GE09ram_02su:2787: ity uktvā vacanaṃ sūtaṃ sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2788: guhaṃ vacanam aklībaṃ rāmo hetumad abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:2789: jaṭāḥ kṛtvā gamiṣyāmi nyagrodhakṣīram ānaya // RamS_2,46.55 //*
GE09ram_02su:2790: tat kṣīraṃ rājaputrāya guhaḥ kṣipram upāharat /
GE09ram_02su:2791: lakṣmaṇasyātmanaś caiva rāmas tenākaroj jaṭāḥ // RamS_2,46.56 //
GE09ram_02su:2795: vratam ādiṣṭavān rāmaḥ sahāyaṃ guham abravīt // RamS_2,46.58 //
GE09ram_02su:2796: apramatto bale kośe durge janapade tathā /
GE09ram_02su:2797: bhavethā guha rājyaṃ hi durārakṣatamaṃ matam // RamS_2,46.59 //
GE09ram_02su:2799: jagāma tūrṇam avyagraḥ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // RamS_2,46.60 //
GE09ram_02su:2800: sa tu dṛṣṭvā nadītīre nāvam ikṣvākunandanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2801: titīrṣuḥ śīghragāṃ gaṅgām idaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // RamS_2,46.61 //
GE09ram_02su:2802: āroha tvaṃ naravyāghra sthitāṃ nāvam imāṃ śanaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2804: sa bhrātuḥ śāsanaṃ śrutvā sarvam apratikūlayan /
GE09ram_02su:2805: āropya maithilīṃ pūrvam ārurohātmavāṃs tataḥ // RamS_2,46.63 //
GE09ram_02su:2807: tato niṣādādhipatir guho jñātīn acodayat // RamS_2,46.64 //
GE09ram_02su:2808: anujñāya sumantraṃ ca sabalaṃ caiva taṃ guham /
GE09ram_02su:2809: āsthāya nāvaṃ rāmas tu codayāmāsa nāvikān // RamS_2,46.65 //
GE09ram_02su:2810: tatas taiś coditā sā nauḥ karṇadhārasamāhitā /
GE09ram_02su:2812: madhyaṃ tu samanuprāpya bhāgīrathyās tv aninditā /
GE09ram_02su:2813: vaidehī prāñjalir bhūtvā tāṃ nadīm idam abravīt // RamS_2,46.67 //
GE09ram_02su:2815: nideśaṃ pālayatv enaṃ gaṅge tvadabhirakṣitaḥ // RamS_2,46.68 //
GE09ram_02su:2816: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi samagrāṇy uṣya kānane /
GE09ram_02su:2817: bhrātrā saha mayā caiva punaḥ pratyāgamiṣyati // RamS_2,46.69 //
GE09ram_02su:2818: tatas tvāṃ devi subhage kṣemeṇa punar āgatā /
GE09ram_02su:2820: tvaṃ hi tripathagā devi brahmalokaṃ samīkṣase /
GE09ram_02su:2822: sā tvāṃ devi namasyāmi praśaṃsāmi ca śobhane /
GE09ram_02su:2823: prāptarājye naravyāghre śivena punar āgate // RamS_2,46.72 //
GE09ram_02su:2824: gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi vastrāṇy annaṃ ca peśalam /
GE09ram_02su:2826: tathā saṃbhāṣamāṇā sā sītā gaṅgām aninditā /
GE09ram_02su:2827: dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇaṃ tīraṃ kṣipram evābhyupāgamat // RamS_2,46.74 //
GE09ram_02su:2828: tīraṃ tu samanuprāpya nāvaṃ hitvā nararṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2829: prātiṣṭhata saha bhrātrā vaidehyā ca paraṃtapaḥ // RamS_2,46.75 //
GE09ram_02su:2831: agrato gaccha saumitre sītā tvām anugacchatu // RamS_2,46.76 //
GE09ram_02su:2832: pṛṣṭhato 'haṃ gamiṣyāmi tvāṃ ca sītāṃ ca pālayan /
GE09ram_02su:2833: adya duḥkhaṃ tu vaidehī vanavāsasya vetsyati // RamS_2,46.77 //
GE09ram_02su:2834: gataṃ tu gaṅgāparapāram āśu rāmaṃ sumantraḥ pratataṃ nirīkṣya /
GE09ram_02su:2835: adhvaprakarṣād vinivṛttadṛṣṭir mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyathitas tapasvī // RamS_2,46.78 //
GE09ram_02su:2836: tau tatra hatvā caturo mahāmṛgān varāham ṛśyaṃ pṛṣataṃ mahārurum /
GE09ram_02su:2837: ādāya medhyaṃ tvaritaṃ bubhukṣitau vāsāya kāle yayatur vanaspatim // RamS_2,46.79 //
GE09ram_02su:2840: sa taṃ vṛkṣaṃ samāsādya saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām /
GE09ram_02su:2841: rāmo ramayatāṃ śreṣṭha iti hovāca lakṣmaṇam // RamS_2,47.1 //
GE09ram_02su:2842: adyeyaṃ prathamā rātrir yātā janapadād bahiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2843: yā sumantreṇa rahitā tāṃ notkaṇṭhitum arhasi // RamS_2,47.2 //
GE09ram_02su:2845: yogakṣemo hi sītāyā vartate lakṣmaṇāvayoḥ // RamS_2,47.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2847: upāvartāmahe bhūmāv āstīrya svayam ārjitaiḥ // RamS_2,47.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2849: imāḥ saumitraye rāmo vyājahāra kathāḥ śubhāḥ // RamS_2,47.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2850: dhruvam adya mahārājo duḥkhaṃ svapiti lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_02su:2851: kṛtakāmā tu kaikeyī tuṣṭā bhavitum arhati // RamS_2,47.6 //
GE09ram_02su:2852: sā hi devī mahārājaṃ kaikeyī rājyakāraṇāt /
GE09ram_02su:2853: api na cyāvayet prāṇān dṛṣṭvā bharatam āgatam // RamS_2,47.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2854: anāthaś caiva vṛddhaś ca mayā caiva vinākṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2855: kiṃ kariṣyati kāmātmā kaikeyyā vaśam āgataḥ // RamS_2,47.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2856: idaṃ vyasanam ālokya rājñaś ca mativibhramam /
GE09ram_02su:2857: kāma evārdhadharmābhyāṃ garīyān iti me matiḥ // RamS_2,47.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2858: ko hy avidvān api pumān pramadāyāḥ kṛte tyajet /
GE09ram_02su:2859: chandānuvartinaṃ putraṃ tāto mām iva lakṣmaṇa // RamS_2,47.10 //
GE09ram_02su:2860: sukhī bata sabhāryaś ca bharataḥ kekayīsutaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2861: muditān kosalān eko yo bhokṣyaty adhirājavat // RamS_2,47.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2862: sa hi sarvasya rājyasya mukham ekaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:2863: tāte ca vayasātīte mayi cāraṇyam āśrite // RamS_2,47.12 //
GE09ram_02su:2865: evam āpadyate kṣipraṃ rājā daśaratho yathā // RamS_2,47.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2867: kaikeyī saumya samprāptā rājyāya bharatasya ca // RamS_2,47.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2869: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca samprabādheta matkṛte // RamS_2,47.15 //
GE09ram_02su:2870: mā sma matkāraṇād devī sumitrā duḥkham āvaset /
GE09ram_02su:2871: ayodhyām ita eva tvaṃ kāle praviśa lakṣmaṇa // RamS_2,47.16 //
GE09ram_02su:2872: aham eko gamiṣyāmi sītayā saha daṇḍakān /
GE09ram_02su:2873: anāthāyā hi nāthas tvaṃ kausalyāyā bhaviṣyasi // RamS_2,47.17 //
GE09ram_02su:2874: kṣudrakarmā hi kaikeyī dveṣād anyāyyam ācaret /
GE09ram_02su:2875: paridadyā hi dharmajñe bharate mama mātaram // RamS_2,47.18 //
GE09ram_02su:2876: nūnaṃ jātyantare kasmin striyaḥ putrair viyojitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2877: jananyā mama saumitre tad apy etad upasthitam // RamS_2,47.19 //
GE09ram_02su:2879: viprāyujyata kausalyā phalakāle dhig astu mām // RamS_2,47.20 //
GE09ram_02su:2880: mā sma sīmantinī kācij janayet putram īdṛśam /
GE09ram_02su:2881: saumitre yo 'ham ambāyā dadmi śokam anantakam // RamS_2,47.21 //
GE09ram_02su:2882: manye prītiviśiṣṭā sā matto lakṣmaṇa śārikā /
GE09ram_02su:2883: yasyās tac chrūyate vākyaṃ śuka pādam arer daśa // RamS_2,47.22 //
GE09ram_02su:2885: putreṇa kim aputrāyā mayā kāryam ariṃdama // RamS_2,47.23 //
GE09ram_02su:2886: alpabhāgyā hi me mātā kausalyā rahitā mayā /
GE09ram_02su:2888: eko hy aham ayodhyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_02su:2889: tareyam iṣubhiḥ kruddho nanu vīryam akāraṇam // RamS_2,47.25 //
GE09ram_02su:2891: tena lakṣmaṇa nādyāham ātmānam abhiṣecaye // RamS_2,47.26 //
GE09ram_02su:2892: etad anyac ca karuṇaṃ vilapya vijane bahu /
GE09ram_02su:2893: aśrupūrṇamukho rāmo niśi tūṣṇīm upāviśat // RamS_2,47.27 //
GE09ram_02su:2895: samudram iva nirvegam āśvāsayata lakṣmaṇaḥ // RamS_2,47.28 //
GE09ram_02su:2896: dhruvam adya purī rāma ayodhyāyudhināṃ vara /
GE09ram_02su:2897: niṣprabhā tvayi niṣkrānte gatacandreva śarvarī // RamS_2,47.29 //
GE09ram_02su:2898: naitad aupayikaṃ rāma yad idaṃ paritapyase /
GE09ram_02su:2899: viṣādayasi sītāṃ ca māṃ caiva puruṣarṣabha // RamS_2,47.30 //
GE09ram_02su:2900: na ca sītā tvayā hīnā na cāham api rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:2901: muhūrtam api jīvāvo jalān matsyāv ivoddhṛtau // RamS_2,47.31 //
GE09ram_02su:2902: na hi tātaṃ na śatrughnaṃ na sumitrāṃ paraṃtapa /
GE09ram_02su:2903: draṣṭum iccheyam adyāhaṃ svargaṃ vāpi tvayā vinā // RamS_2,47.32 //
GE09ram_02su:2904: sa lakṣmaṇasyottamapuṣkalaṃ vaco niśamya caivaṃ vanavāsam ādarāt /
GE09ram_02su:2905: samāḥ samastā vidadhe paraṃtapaḥ prapadya dharmaṃ sucirāya rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,47.33 //
GE09ram_02su:2908: te tu tasmin mahāvṛkṣa uṣitvā rajanīṃ śivām /
GE09ram_02su:2909: vimale 'bhyudite sūrye tasmād deśāt pratasthire // RamS_2,48.1 //
GE09ram_02su:2911: jagmus taṃ deśam uddiśya vigāhya sumahad vanam // RamS_2,48.2 //
GE09ram_02su:2912: te bhūmim āgān vividhān deśāṃś cāpi manoramān /
GE09ram_02su:2913: adṛṣṭapūrvān paśyantas tatra tatra yaśasvinaḥ // RamS_2,48.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2914: yathākṣemeṇa gacchan sa paśyaṃś ca vividhān drumān /
GE09ram_02su:2915: nivṛttamātre divase rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt // RamS_2,48.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2916: prayāgam abhitaḥ paśya saumitre dhūmam unnatam /
GE09ram_02su:2917: agner bhagavataḥ ketuṃ manye saṃnihito muniḥ // RamS_2,48.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2918: nūnaṃ prāptāḥ sma sambhedaṃ gaṅgāyamunayor vayam /
GE09ram_02su:2919: tathā hi śrūyate śabdo vāriṇo vārighaṭṭitaḥ // RamS_2,48.6 //
GE09ram_02su:2921: bharadvājāśrame caite dṛśyante vividhā drumāḥ // RamS_2,48.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2922: dhanvinau tau sukhaṃ gatvā lambamāne divākare /
GE09ram_02su:2923: gaṅgāyamunayoḥ saṃdhau prāpatur nilayaṃ muneḥ // RamS_2,48.8 //
GE09ram_02su:2924: rāmas tv āśramam āsādya trāsayan mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2925: gatvā muhūrtam adhvānaṃ bharadvājam upāgamat // RamS_2,48.9 //
GE09ram_02su:2926: tatas tv āśramam āsādya muner darśanakāṅkṣiṇau /
GE09ram_02su:2929: rāmaḥ saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sītayā cābhyavādayat // RamS_2,48.11 //
GE09ram_02su:2933: māṃ cānuyātā vijanaṃ tapovanam aninditā // RamS_2,48.13 //
GE09ram_02su:2934: pitrā pravrājyamānaṃ māṃ saumitrir anujaḥ priyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2935: ayam anvagamad bhrātā vanam eva dṛḍhavrataḥ // RamS_2,48.14 //
GE09ram_02su:2939: upānayata dharmātmā gām arghyam udakaṃ tataḥ // RamS_2,48.16 //
GE09ram_02su:2941: rāmam āgatam abhyarcya svāgatenāha taṃ muniḥ // RamS_2,48.17 //
GE09ram_02su:2942: pratigṛhya ca tām arcām upaviṣṭaṃ sarāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:2943: bharadvājo 'bravīd vākyaṃ dharmayuktam idaṃ tadā // RamS_2,48.18 //
GE09ram_02su:2944: cirasya khalu kākutstha paśyāmi tvām ihāgatam /
GE09ram_02su:2945: śrutaṃ tava mayā cedaṃ vivāsanam akāraṇam // RamS_2,48.19 //
GE09ram_02su:2947: puṇyaś ca ramaṇīyaś ca vasatv iha bhavān sukham // RamS_2,48.20 //
GE09ram_02su:2948: evam uktas tu vacanaṃ bharadvājena rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2949: pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāmaḥ sarvahite rataḥ // RamS_2,48.21 //
GE09ram_02su:2951: āgamiṣyati vaidehīṃ māṃ cāpi prekṣako janaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2952: anena kāraṇenāham iha vāsaṃ na rocaye // RamS_2,48.22 //*
GE09ram_02su:2954: ramate yatra vaidehī sukhārhā janakātmajā // RamS_2,48.23 //
GE09ram_02su:2955: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2956: rāghavasya tato vākyam arthagrāhakam abravīt // RamS_2,48.24 //
GE09ram_02su:2957: daśakrośa itas tāta girir yasmin nivatsyasi /
GE09ram_02su:2962: kalyāṇāni samādhatte na pāpe kurute manaḥ // RamS_2,48.27 //
GE09ram_02su:2963: ṛṣayas tatra bahavo vihṛtya śaradāṃ śatam /
