GE09ram_02su:2964: tapasā divam ārūḍhāḥ kapālaśirasā saha // RamS_2,48.28 //
GE09ram_02su:2965: praviviktam ahaṃ manye taṃ vāsaṃ bhavataḥ sukham /
GE09ram_02su:2966: iha vā vanavāsāya vasa rāma mayā saha // RamS_2,48.29 //
GE09ram_02su:2967: sa rāmaṃ sarvakāmais taṃ bharadvājaḥ priyātithim /
GE09ram_02su:2968: sabhāryaṃ saha ca bhrātrā pratijagrāha dharmavit // RamS_2,48.30 //
GE09ram_02su:2969: tasya prayāge rāmasya taṃ maharṣim upeyuṣaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:2970: prapannā rajanī puṇyā citrāḥ kathayataḥ kathāḥ // RamS_2,48.31 //
GE09ram_02su:2974: uṣitāḥ smeha vasatim anujānātu no bhavān // RamS_2,48.33 //
GE09ram_02su:2975: rātryāṃ tu tasyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ bharadvājo 'bravīd idam /
GE09ram_02su:2978: vicaranti vanānteṣu tāni drakṣyasi rāghava // RamS_2,48.35 //
GE09ram_02su:2980: mṛgaiś ca mattair bahubhiś ca kuñjaraiḥ suramyam āsādya samāvasāśramam // RamS_2,48.36 //
GE09ram_02su:2984: maharṣim abhivādyātha jagmatus taṃ giriṃ prati // RamS_2,49.1 //
GE09ram_02su:2985: prasthitāṃś caiva tān prekṣya pitā putrān ivānvagāt /
GE09ram_02su:2986: tataḥ pracakrame vaktuṃ vacanaṃ sa mahāmuniḥ // RamS_2,49.2 //
GE09ram_02su:2988: tatra yūyaṃ plavaṃ kṛtvā taratāṃśumatīṃ nadīm // RamS_2,49.3 //
GE09ram_02su:2990: vivṛddhaṃ bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ śyāmaṃ siddhopasevitam // RamS_2,49.4 //
GE09ram_02su:2991: krośamātraṃ tato gatvā nīlaṃ drakṣyatha kānanam /
GE09ram_02su:2992: palāśabadarīmiśraṃ rāma vaṃśaiś ca yāmunaiḥ // RamS_2,49.5 //
GE09ram_02su:2993: sa panthāś citrakūṭasya gataḥ subahuśo mayā /
GE09ram_02su:2995: iti panthānam āvedya maharṣiḥ sa nyavartata // RamS_2,49.6 //*
GE09ram_02su:2996: upāvṛtte munau tasmin rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:2997: kṛtapuṇyāḥ sma saumitre munir yan no 'nukampate // RamS_2,49.7 //
GE09ram_02su:2999: sītām evāgrataḥ kṛtvā kālindīṃ jagmatur nadīm // RamS_2,49.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3001: cakāra lakṣmaṇaś chittvā sītāyāḥ sukham āsanam // RamS_2,49.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3002: tatra śriyam ivācintyāṃ rāmo dāśarathiḥ priyām /
GE09ram_02su:3003: īṣat saṃlajjamānāṃ tām adhyāropayata plavam // RamS_2,49.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3005: tīrajair bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ saṃterur yamunāṃ nadīm // RamS_2,49.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3006: te tīrṇāḥ plavam utsṛjya prasthāya yamunāvanāt /
GE09ram_02su:3007: śyāmaṃ nyagrodham āseduḥ śītalaṃ haritacchadam // RamS_2,49.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3008: kausalyāṃ caiva paśyeyaṃ sumitrāṃ ca yaśasvinīm /
GE09ram_02su:3009: iti sītāñjaliṃ kṛtvā paryagacchad vanaspatim // RamS_2,49.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3011: bahūn medhyān mṛgān hatvā ceratur yamunāvane // RamS_2,49.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3012: vihṛtya te barhiṇapūganādite śubhe vane vāraṇavānarāyute /
GE09ram_02su:3013: samaṃ nadīvapram upetya saṃmataṃ nivāsam ājagmur adīnadarśanāḥ // RamS_2,49.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3018: saumitre śṛṇu vanyānāṃ valgu vyāharatāṃ svanam /
GE09ram_02su:3020: sa suptaḥ samaye bhrātrā lakṣmaṇaḥ pratibodhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3021: jahau nidrāṃ ca tandrīṃ ca prasaktaṃ ca pathi śramam // RamS_2,50.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3022: tata utthāya te sarve spṛṣṭvā nadyāḥ śivaṃ jalam /
GE09ram_02su:3023: panthānam ṛṣiṇoddiṣṭaṃ citrakūṭasya taṃ yayuḥ // RamS_2,50.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3024: tataḥ samprasthitaḥ kāle rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_02su:3025: sītāṃ kamalapattrākṣīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,50.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3026: ādīptān iva vaidehi sarvataḥ puṣpitān nagān /
GE09ram_02su:3027: svaiḥ puṣpaiḥ kiṃśukān paśya mālinaḥ śiśirātyaye // RamS_2,50.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3029: phalapattrair avanatān nūnaṃ śakṣyāmi jīvitum // RamS_2,50.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3031: madhūni madhukārībhiḥ saṃbhṛtāni nage nage // RamS_2,50.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3032: eṣa krośati natyūhas taṃ śikhī pratikūjati /
GE09ram_02su:3035: citrakūṭam imaṃ paśya pravṛddhaśikharaṃ girim // RamS_2,50.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3036: tatas tau pādacāreṇa gacchantau saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:3037: ramyam āsedatuḥ śailaṃ citrakūṭaṃ manoramam // RamS_2,50.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3039: ayaṃ vāso bhavet tāvad atra saumya ramemahi // RamS_2,50.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3040: lakṣmaṇānaya dārūṇi dṛḍhāni ca varāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:3041: kuruṣvāvasathaṃ saumya vāse me 'bhirataṃ manaḥ // RamS_2,50.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3042: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saumitrir vividhān drumān /
GE09ram_02su:3043: ājahāra tataś cakre parṇaśālām ariṃdamaḥ // RamS_2,50.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3045: aiṇeyaṃ māṃsam āhṛtya śālāṃ yakṣyāmahe vayam // RamS_2,50.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3046: sa lakṣmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgaṃ hatvā medhyaṃ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_02su:3047: atha cikṣepa saumitriḥ samiddhe jātavedasi // RamS_2,50.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3048: taṃ tu pakvaṃ samājñāya niṣṭaptaṃ chinnaśoṇitam /
GE09ram_02su:3049: lakṣmaṇaḥ puruṣavyāghram atha rāghavam abravīt // RamS_2,50.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3050: ayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ samāptāṅgaḥ śṛtaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgo yathā /
GE09ram_02su:3051: devatā devasaṃkāśa yajasva kuśalo hy asi // RamS_2,50.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3052: rāmaḥ snātvā tu niyato guṇavāñ japyakovidaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3053: pāpasaṃśamanaṃ rāmaś cakāra balim uttamam // RamS_2,50.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3054: tāṃ vṛkṣaparṇacchadanāṃ manojñāṃ yathāpradeśaṃ sukṛtāṃ nivātām /
GE09ram_02su:3055: vāsāya sarve viviśuḥ sametāḥ sabhāṃ yathā devagaṇāḥ sudharmām // RamS_2,50.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3057: vanottame vyālamṛgānunādite tathā vijahruḥ susukhaṃ jitendriyāḥ // RamS_2,50.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3058: suramyam āsādya tu citrakūṭaṃ nadīṃ ca tāṃ mālyavatīṃ sutīrthām /
GE09ram_02su:3059: nananda hṛṣṭo mṛgapakṣijuṣṭāṃ jahau ca duḥkhaṃ puravipravāsāt // RamS_2,50.22 //
GE09ram_02su:3063: rāme dakṣiṇakūlasthe jagāma svagṛhaṃ guhaḥ // RamS_2,51.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3065: ayodhyām eva nagarīṃ prayayau gāḍhadurmanāḥ // RamS_2,51.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3066: sa vanāni sugandhīni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_02su:3067: paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ grāmāṇi nagarāṇi ca // RamS_2,51.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3069: ayodhyāṃ samanuprāpya nirānandāṃ dadarśa ha // RamS_2,51.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3070: sa śūnyām iva niḥśabdāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadurmanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3072: kaccin na sagajā sāśvā sajanā sajanādhipā /
GE09ram_02su:3074: iti cintāparaḥ sūtas tvaritaḥ praviveśa ha // RamS_2,51.6 //*
GE09ram_02su:3076: kva rāma iti pṛcchantaḥ sūtam abhyadravan narāḥ // RamS_2,51.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3077: teṣāṃ śaśaṃsa gaṅgāyām aham āpṛcchya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:3079: te tīrṇā iti vijñāya bāṣpapūrṇamukhā janāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3080: aho dhig iti niḥśvasya hā rāmeti ca cukruśuḥ // RamS_2,51.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3081: śuśrāva ca vacas teṣāṃ vṛndaṃ vṛndaṃ ca tiṣṭhatām /
GE09ram_02su:3082: hatāḥ sma khalu ye neha paśyāma iti rāghavam // RamS_2,51.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3084: na drakṣyāmaḥ punar jātu dhārmikaṃ rāmam antarā // RamS_2,51.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3085: kiṃ samarthaṃ janasyāsya kiṃ priyaṃ kiṃ sukhāvaham /
GE09ram_02su:3086: iti rāmeṇa nagaraṃ pitṛvat paripālitam // RamS_2,51.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3090: yatra rājā daśarathas tad evopayayau gṛham // RamS_2,51.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3091: so 'vatīrya rathāc chīghraṃ rājaveśma praviśya ca /
GE09ram_02su:3095: saha rāmeṇa niryāto vinā rāmam ihāgataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3096: sūtaḥ kiṃ nāma kausalyāṃ śocantīṃ prativakṣyati // RamS_2,51.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3097: yathā ca manye durjīvam evaṃ na sukaraṃ dhruvam /
GE09ram_02su:3098: ācchidya putre niryāte kausalyā yatra jīvati // RamS_2,51.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3099: satyarūpaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājñaḥ strīṇāṃ niśāmayan /
GE09ram_02su:3100: pradīptam iva śokena viveśa sahasā gṛham // RamS_2,51.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3101: sa praviśyāṣṭamīṃ kakṣyāṃ rājānaṃ dīnam āturam /
GE09ram_02su:3103: abhigamya tam āsīnaṃ narendram abhivādya ca /
GE09ram_02su:3105: sa tūṣṇīm eva tac chrutvā rājā vibhrāntacetanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3108: uddhṛtya bāhū cukrośa nṛpatau patite kṣitau // RamS_2,51.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3109: sumitrayā tu sahitā kausalyā patitaṃ patim /
GE09ram_02su:3110: utthāpayāmāsa tadā vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // RamS_2,51.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3112: vanavāsād anuprāptaṃ kasmān na pratibhāṣase // RamS_2,51.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3114: uttiṣṭha sukṛtaṃ te 'stu śoke na syāt sahāyatā // RamS_2,51.26 //
GE09ram_02su:3115: deva yasyā bhayād rāmaṃ nānupṛcchasi sārathim /
GE09ram_02su:3116: neha tiṣṭhati kaikeyī viśrabdhaṃ pratibhāṣyatām // RamS_2,51.27 //
GE09ram_02su:3119: evaṃ vilapatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kausalyāṃ patitāṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02su:3120: patiṃ cāvekṣya tāḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ ruruduḥ striyaḥ // RamS_2,51.29 //
GE09ram_02su:3121: tatas tam antaḥpuranādam utthitaṃ samīkṣya vṛddhās taruṇāś ca mānavāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3122: striyaś ca sarvā ruruduḥ samantataḥ puraṃ tadāsīt punar eva saṃkulam // RamS_2,51.30 //
GE09ram_02su:3125: pratyāśvasto yadā rājā mohāt pratyāgataḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3128: viniḥśvasantaṃ dhyāyantam asvastham iva kuñjaram // RamS_2,52.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3129: rājā tu rajasā sūtaṃ dhvastāṅgaṃ samupasthitam /
GE09ram_02su:3131: kva nu vatsyati dharmātmā vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3133: bhūmipālātmajo bhūmau śete katham anāthavat // RamS_2,52.4 //*
GE09ram_02su:3135: sa vatsyati kathaṃ rāmo vijanaṃ vanam āśritaḥ // RamS_2,52.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3137: kathaṃ kumārau vaidehyā sārdhaṃ vanam upasthitau // RamS_2,52.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3139: rājaputrau kathaṃ pādair avaruhya rathād gatau // RamS_2,52.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3140: siddhārthaḥ khalu sūta tvaṃ yena dṛṣṭau mamātmajau /
GE09ram_02su:3141: vanāntaṃ praviśantau tāv aśvināv iva mandaram // RamS_2,52.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3142: kim uvāca vaco rāmaḥ kim uvāca ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3143: sumantra vanam āsādya kim uvāca ca maithilī /
GE09ram_02su:3144: āsitaṃ śayitaṃ bhuktaṃ sūta rāmasya kīrtaya // RamS_2,52.9 //*
GE09ram_02su:3148: añjaliṃ rāghavaḥ kṛtvā śirasābhipraṇamya ca // RamS_2,52.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3150: śirasā vandanīyasya vandyau pādau mahātmanaḥ // RamS_2,52.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3151: sarvam antaḥpuraṃ vācyaṃ sūta madvacanāt tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:3153: mātā ca mama kausalyā kuśalaṃ cābhivādanam /
GE09ram_02su:3154: devi devasya pādau ca devavat paripālaya // RamS_2,52.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3155: bharataḥ kuśalaṃ vācyo vācyo madvacanena ca /
GE09ram_02su:3156: sarvāsv eva yathānyāyaṃ vṛttiṃ vartasva mātṛṣu // RamS_2,52.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3159: ity evaṃ māṃ mahārāja bruvann eva mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3160: rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo bhṛśam aśrūṇy avartayat // RamS_2,52.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3161: lakṣmaṇas tu susaṃkruddho niḥśvasan vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:3165: rāmasya tu parityāge na hetum upalakṣaye // RamS_2,52.19 //*
GE09ram_02su:3169: bhrātā bhartā ca bandhuś ca pitā ca mama rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,52.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3175: tena duḥkhena rudatī naiva māṃ kiṃcid abravīt // RamS_2,52.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3177: mumoca sahasā bāṣpaṃ māṃ prayāntam udīkṣya sā // RamS_2,52.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3179: tathaiva sītā rudatī tapasvinī nirīkṣate rājarathaṃ tathaiva mām // RamS_2,52.26 //
GE09ram_02su:3182: mama tv aśvā nivṛttasya na prāvartanta vartmani /
GE09ram_02su:3183: uṣṇam aśru vimuñcanto rāme samprasthite vanam // RamS_2,53.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3185: prasthito ratham āsthāya tad duḥkham api dhārayan // RamS_2,53.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3186: guhena sārdhaṃ tatraiva sthito 'smi divasān bahūn /
GE09ram_02su:3187: āśayā yadi māṃ rāmaḥ punaḥ śabdāpayed iti // RamS_2,53.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3190: na ca sarpanti sattvāni vyālā na prasaranti ca /
GE09ram_02su:3191: rāmaśokābhibhūtaṃ tan niṣkūjam abhavad vanam // RamS_2,53.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3194: jalajāni ca puṣpāṇi mālyāni sthalajāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:3195: nādya bhānty alpagandhīni phalāni ca yathā puram // RamS_2,53.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3196: praviśantam ayodhyāṃ māṃ na kaścid abhinandati /
GE09ram_02su:3197: narā rāmam apaśyanto niḥśvasanti muhur muhuḥ // RamS_2,53.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3198: harmyair vimānaiḥ prāsādair avekṣya ratham āgatam /
GE09ram_02su:3201: anyonyam abhivīkṣante vyaktam ārtatarāḥ striyaḥ // RamS_2,53.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3203: aham ārtatayā kaṃcid viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye // RamS_2,53.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3207: kausalyā putrahīneva ayodhyā pratibhāti mā // RamS_2,53.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3209: bāṣpopahatayā rājā taṃ sūtam idam abravīt // RamS_2,53.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3211: mayā na mantrakuśalair vṛddhaiḥ saha samarthitam // RamS_2,53.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3212: na suhṛdbhir na cāmātyair mantrayitvā na naigamaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3213: mayāyam arthaḥ sammohāt strīhetoḥ sahasā kṛtaḥ // RamS_2,53.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3214: bhavitavyatayā nūnam idaṃ vā vyasanaṃ mahat /
GE09ram_02su:3215: kulasyāsya vināśāya prāptaṃ sūta yadṛcchayā // RamS_2,53.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3216: sūta yady asti te kiṃcin mayāpi sukṛtaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:3217: tvaṃ prāpayāśu māṃ rāmaṃ prāṇāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām // RamS_2,53.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3218: yad yad yāpi mamaivājñā nivartayatu rāghavam /
GE09ram_02su:3219: na śakṣyāmi vinā rāmaṃ muhūrtam api jīvitum // RamS_2,53.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3220: atha vāpi mahābāhur gato dūraṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:3221: mām eva ratham āropya śīghraṃ rāmāya darśaya // RamS_2,53.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3223: yadi jīvāmi sādhv enaṃ paśyeyaṃ saha sītayā // RamS_2,53.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3225: rāmaṃ yadi na paśyāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam // RamS_2,53.22 //
GE09ram_02su:3226: ato nu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yo 'ham ikṣvākunandanam /
GE09ram_02su:3227: imām avasthām āpanno neha paśyāmi rāghavam // RamS_2,53.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3228: hā rāma rāmānuja hā hā vaidehi tapasvini /
GE09ram_02su:3229: na māṃ jānīta duḥkhena mriyamāṇam anāthavat /
GE09ram_02su:3230: dustaro jīvatā devi mayāyaṃ śokasāgaraḥ // RamS_2,53.24 //*
GE09ram_02su:3231: aśobhanaṃ yo 'ham ihādya rāghavaṃ didṛkṣamāṇo na labhe salakṣmaṇam /
GE09ram_02su:3232: itīva rājā vilapan mahāyaśāḥ papāta tūrṇaṃ śayane sa mūrchitaḥ // RamS_2,53.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3233: iti vilapati pārthive pranaṣṭe karuṇataraṃ dviguṇaṃ ca rāmahetoḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3234: vacanam anuniśamya tasya devī bhayam agamat punar eva rāmamātā // RamS_2,53.26 //
GE09ram_02su:3238: dharaṇyāṃ gatasattveva kausalyā sūtam abravīt // RamS_2,54.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3239: naya māṃ yatra kākutsthaḥ sītā yatra ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3240: tān vinā kṣaṇam apy atra jīvituṃ notsahe hy aham // RamS_2,54.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3241: nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ daṇḍakān naya mām api /
GE09ram_02su:3242: atha tān nānugacchāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam // RamS_2,54.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3244: idam āśvāsayan devīṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // RamS_2,54.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3245: tyaja śokaṃ ca mohaṃ ca sambhramaṃ duḥkhajaṃ tathā /
GE09ram_02su:3246: vyavadhūya ca saṃtāpaṃ vane vatsyati rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,54.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3247: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi rāmasya pādau paricaran vane /
GE09ram_02su:3249: vijane 'pi vane sītā vāsaṃ prāpya gṛheṣv iva /
GE09ram_02su:3251: nāsyā dainyaṃ kṛtaṃ kiṃcit susūkṣmam api lakṣaye /
GE09ram_02su:3252: uciteva pravāsānāṃ vaidehī pratibhāti mā // RamS_2,54.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3253: nagaropavanaṃ gatvā yathā sma ramate purā /
GE09ram_02su:3254: tathaiva ramate sītā nirjaneṣu vaneṣv api // RamS_2,54.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3256: rāmā rāme hy adhīnātmā vijane 'pi vane satī // RamS_2,54.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3257: tadgataṃ hṛdayaṃ hy asyās tadadhīnaṃ ca jīvitam /
GE09ram_02su:3258: ayodhyāpi bhavet tasyā rāmahīnā tathā vanam // RamS_2,54.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3259: pathi pṛcchati vaidehī grāmāṃś ca nagarāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:3260: gatiṃ dṛṣṭvā nadīnāṃ ca pādapān vividhān api // RamS_2,54.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3262: na hi gacchati vaidehyāś candrāṃśusadṛśī prabhā // RamS_2,54.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3264: vadanaṃ tadvadānyāyā vaidehyā na vikampate // RamS_2,54.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3268: idānīm api vaidehī tadrāgā nyastabhūṣaṇā // RamS_2,54.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3269: gajaṃ vā vīkṣya siṃhaṃ vā vyāghraṃ vā vanam āśritā /
GE09ram_02su:3270: nāhārayati saṃtrāsaṃ bāhū rāmasya saṃśritā // RamS_2,54.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3271: na śocyās te na cātmā te śocyo nāpi janādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3272: idaṃ hi caritaṃ loke pratiṣṭhāsyati śāśvatam // RamS_2,54.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3273: vidhūya śokaṃ parihṛṣṭamānasā maharṣiyāte pathi suvyavasthitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3274: vane ratā vanyaphalāśanāḥ pituḥ śubhāṃ pratijñāṃ paripālayanti te // RamS_2,54.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3276: na caiva devī virarāma kūjitāt priyeti putreti ca rāghaveti ca // RamS_2,54.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3279: vanaṃ gate dharmapare rāme ramayatāṃ vare /
GE09ram_02su:3280: kausalyā rudatī svārtā bhartāram idam abravīt // RamS_2,55.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3281: yadyapi triṣu lokeṣu prathitaṃ te mahad yaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3282: sānukrośo vadānyaś ca priyavādī ca rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,55.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3283: kathaṃ naravaraśreṣṭha putrau tau saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02su:3284: duḥkhitau sukhasaṃvṛddhau vane duḥkhaṃ sahiṣyataḥ // RamS_2,55.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3285: sā nūnaṃ taruṇī śyāmā sukumārī sukhocitā /
GE09ram_02su:3286: katham uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca maithilī prasahiṣyate // RamS_2,55.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3288: vanyaṃ naivāram āhāraṃ kathaṃ sītopabhokṣyate // RamS_2,55.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3290: kathaṃ kravyādasiṃhānāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty aśobhanam // RamS_2,55.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3294: kadā drakṣyāmi rāmasya vadanaṃ puṣkarekṣaṇam // RamS_2,55.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3295: vajrasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ me na saṃśayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3296: apaśyantyā na taṃ yad vai phalatīdaṃ sahasradhā // RamS_2,55.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3297: yadi pañcadaśe varṣe rāghavaḥ punar eṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:3298: jahyād rājyaṃ ca kośaṃ ca bharatenopabhokṣyate // RamS_2,55.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3299: evaṃ kanīyasā bhrātrā bhuktaṃ rājyaṃ viśāṃ pate /
GE09ram_02su:3300: bhrātā jyeṣṭho variṣṭhaś ca kimarthaṃ nāvamaṃsyate // RamS_2,55.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3301: na pareṇāhṛtaṃ bhakṣyaṃ vyāghraḥ khāditum icchati /
GE09ram_02su:3302: evam eva naravyāghraḥ paralīḍhaṃ na maṃsyate // RamS_2,55.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3303: havir ājyaṃ puroḍāśāḥ kuśā yūpāś ca khādirāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3304: naitāni yātayāmāni kurvanti punar adhvare // RamS_2,55.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3305: tathā hy āttam idaṃ rājyaṃ hṛtasārāṃ surām iva /
GE09ram_02su:3306: nābhimantum alaṃ rāmo naṣṭasomam ivādhvaram // RamS_2,55.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3308: balavān iva śārdūlo vāladher abhimarśanam // RamS_2,55.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3310: svayam eva hataḥ pitrā jalajenātmajo yathā // RamS_2,55.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3312: yadi te dharmanirate tvayā putre vivāsite // RamS_2,55.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3313: gatir ekā patir nāryā dvitīyā gatir ātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3314: tṛtīyā jñātayo rājaṃś caturthī neha vidyate // RamS_2,55.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3315: tatra tvaṃ caiva me nāsti rāmaś ca vanam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3316: na vanaṃ gantum icchāmi sarvathā hi hatā tvayā // RamS_2,55.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3317: hataṃ tvayā rājyam idaṃ sarāṣṭraṃ hatas tathātmā saha mantribhiś ca /
GE09ram_02su:3318: hatā saputrāsmi hatāś ca paurāḥ sutaś ca bhāryā ca tava prahṛṣṭau // RamS_2,55.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3319: imāṃ giraṃ dāruṇaśabdasaṃśritāṃ niśamya rājāpi mumoha duḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3320: tataḥ sa śokaṃ praviveśa pārthivaḥ svaduṣkṛtaṃ cāpi punas tadāsmarat // RamS_2,55.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3323: evaṃ tu kruddhayā rājā rāmamātrā saśokayā /
GE09ram_02su:3324: śrāvitaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ cintayāmāsa duḥkhitaḥ // RamS_2,56.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3326: yad anena kṛtaṃ pūrvam ajñānāc chabdavedhinā // RamS_2,56.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3327: amanās tena śokena rāmaśokena ca prabhuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3328: dahyamānas tu śokābhyāṃ kausalyām āha bhūpatiḥ // RamS_2,56.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3330: vatsalā cānṛśaṃsā ca tvaṃ hi nityaṃ pareṣv api // RamS_2,56.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3331: bhartā tu khalu nārīṇāṃ guṇavān nirguṇo 'pi vā /
GE09ram_02su:3332: dharmaṃ vimṛśamānānāṃ pratyakṣaṃ devi daivatam // RamS_2,56.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3334: nārhase vipriyaṃ vaktuṃ duḥkhitāpi suduḥkhitam // RamS_2,56.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3335: tad vākyaṃ karuṇaṃ rājñaḥ śrutvā dīnasya bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_02su:3336: kausalyā vyasṛjad bāṣpaṃ praṇālīva navodakam // RamS_2,56.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3337: sa mūrdhni baddhvā rudatī rājñaḥ padmam ivāñjalim /
GE09ram_02su:3338: sambhramād abravīt trastā tvaramāṇākṣaraṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,56.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3339: prasīda śirasā yāce bhūmau nipatitāsmi te /
GE09ram_02su:3340: yācitāsmi hatā deva hantavyāhaṃ na hi tvayā // RamS_2,56.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3341: naiṣā hi sā strī bhavati ślāghanīyena dhīmatā /
GE09ram_02su:3342: ubhayor lokayor vīra patyā yā saṃprasādyate // RamS_2,56.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3343: jānāmi dharmaṃ dharmajña tvāṃ jāne satyavādinam /
GE09ram_02su:3344: putraśokārtayā tat tu mayā kim api bhāṣitam // RamS_2,56.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3345: śoko nāśayate dhairyaṃ śoko nāśayate śrutam /
GE09ram_02su:3346: śoko nāśayate sarvaṃ nāsti śokasamo ripuḥ // RamS_2,56.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3348: soḍhum āpatitaḥ śokaḥ susūkṣmo 'pi na śakyate // RamS_2,56.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3351: taṃ hi cintayamānāyāḥ śoko 'yaṃ hṛdi vardhate /
GE09ram_02su:3352: adīnām iva vegena samudrasalilaṃ mahat // RamS_2,56.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3353: evaṃ hi kathayantyās tu kausalyāyāḥ śubhaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3354: mandaraśmir abhūt suryo rajanī cābhyavartata // RamS_2,56.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3355: atha prahlādito vākyair devyā kausalyayā nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3356: śokena ca samākrānto nidrāyā vaśam eyivān // RamS_2,56.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3360: atha rājā daśarathaḥ sa cintām abhyapadyata // RamS_2,57.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3362: āviveśopasargas taṃ tamaḥ sūryam ivāsuram // RamS_2,57.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3363: sa rājā rajanīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ rāme pravrajite vanam /
GE09ram_02su:3365: kausalyāṃ putraśokārtām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,57.3 //*
GE09ram_02su:3366: yad ācarati kalyāṇi śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
GE09ram_02su:3367: tad eva labhate bhadre kartā karmajam ātmanaḥ // RamS_2,57.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3369: doṣaṃ vā yo na jānāti sa bāla iti hocyate // RamS_2,57.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3370: kaścid āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca niṣiñcati /
GE09ram_02su:3371: puṣpaṃ dṛṣṭvā phale gṛdhnuḥ sa śocati phalāgame // RamS_2,57.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3372: so 'ham āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca nyaṣecayam /
GE09ram_02su:3373: rāmaṃ phalāgame tyaktvā paścāc chocāmi durmatiḥ // RamS_2,57.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3375: kumāraḥ śabdavedhīti mayā pāpam idaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:3376: tad idaṃ me 'nusaṃprāptaṃ devi duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam // RamS_2,57.8 //*
GE09ram_02su:3377: sammohād iha bālena yathā syād bhakṣitaṃ viṣam /
GE09ram_02su:3378: evaṃ mamāpy avijñātaṃ śabdavedhyamayaṃ phalam // RamS_2,57.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3379: devy anūḍhā tvam abhavo yuvarājo bhavāmy aham /
GE09ram_02su:3381: upāsya hi rasān bhaumāṃs taptvā ca jagad aṃśubhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3382: paretācaritāṃ bhīmāṃ ravir āviśate diśam // RamS_2,57.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3383: uṣṇam antardadhe sadyaḥ snigdhā dadṛśire ghanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3387: tasminn atisukhe kāle dhanuṣmān iṣumān rathī /
GE09ram_02su:3389: nipāne mahiṣaṃ rātrau gajaṃ vābhyāgataṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_02su:3390: anyaṃ vā śvāpadaṃ kaṃcij jighāṃsur ajitendriyaḥ // RamS_2,57.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3391: athāndhakāre tv aśrauṣaṃ jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3392: acakṣur viṣaye ghoṣaṃ vāraṇasyeva nardataḥ // RamS_2,57.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3394: amuñcaṃ niśitaṃ bāṇam aham āśīviṣopamam // RamS_2,57.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3395: tatra vāg uṣasi vyaktā prādurāsīd vanaukasaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3396: hā heti patatas toye vāg abhūt tatra mānuṣī /
GE09ram_02su:3397: katham asmadvidhe śastraṃ nipatet tu tapasvini // RamS_2,57.18 //*
GE09ram_02su:3399: iṣuṇābhihataḥ kena kasya vā kiṃ kṛtaṃ mayā // RamS_2,57.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3400: ṛṣer hi nyastadaṇḍasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3401: kathaṃ nu śastreṇa vadho madvidhasya vidhīyate // RamS_2,57.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3403: ko vadhena mamārthī syāt kiṃ vāsyāpakṛtaṃ mayā // RamS_2,57.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3405: na kaścit sādhu manyeta yathaiva gurutalpagam // RamS_2,57.22 //
GE09ram_02su:3407: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ cobhāv anuśocāmi madvidhe // RamS_2,57.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3408: tad etan mithunaṃ vṛddhaṃ cirakālabhṛtaṃ mayā /
GE09ram_02su:3409: mayi pañcatvam āpanne kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayiṣyati // RamS_2,57.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3410: vṛddhau ca mātāpitarāv ahaṃ caikeṣuṇā hataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3411: kena sma nihatāḥ sarve subālenākṛtātmanā // RamS_2,57.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3412: tāṃ giraṃ karuṇāṃ śrutvā mama dharmānukāṅkṣiṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3413: karābhyāṃ saśaraṃ cāpaṃ vyathitasyāpatad bhuvi // RamS_2,57.26 //
GE09ram_02su:3414: taṃ deśam aham āgamya dīnasattvaḥ sudurmanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3415: apaśyam iṣuṇā tīre sarayvās tāpasaṃ hatam // RamS_2,57.27 //
GE09ram_02su:3416: sa mām udvīkṣya netrābhyāṃ trastam asvasthacetasam /
GE09ram_02su:3417: ity uvāca vacaḥ krūraṃ didhakṣann iva tejasā // RamS_2,57.28 //
GE09ram_02su:3418: kiṃ tavāpakṛtaṃ rājan vane nivasatā mayā /
GE09ram_02su:3419: jihīrṣur ambho gurvarthaṃ yad ahaṃ tāḍitas tvayā // RamS_2,57.29 //
GE09ram_02su:3420: ekena khalu bāṇena marmaṇy abhihate mayi /
GE09ram_02su:3421: dvāv andhau nihatau vṛddhau mātā janayitā ca me // RamS_2,57.30 //
GE09ram_02su:3422: tau nūnaṃ durbalāv andhau matpratīkṣau pipāsitau /
GE09ram_02su:3423: ciram āśākṛtāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ kaṣṭāṃ saṃdhārayiṣyataḥ // RamS_2,57.31 //
GE09ram_02su:3424: na nūnaṃ tapaso vāsti phalayogaḥ śrutasya vā /
GE09ram_02su:3425: pitā yan māṃ na jānāti śayānaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi // RamS_2,57.32 //
GE09ram_02su:3426: jānann api ca kiṃ kuryād aśaktir aparikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3427: bhidyamānam ivāśaktas trātum anyo nago nagam // RamS_2,57.33 //
GE09ram_02su:3428: pitus tvam eva me gatvā śīghram ācakṣva rāghava /
GE09ram_02su:3429: na tvām anudahet kruddho vanaṃ vahnir ivaidhitaḥ // RamS_2,57.34 //
GE09ram_02su:3430: iyam ekapadī rājan yato me pitur āśramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3431: taṃ prasādaya gatvā tvaṃ na tvāṃ sa kupitaḥ śapet // RamS_2,57.35 //
GE09ram_02su:3432: viśalyaṃ kuru māṃ rājan marma me niśitaḥ śaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3433: ruṇaddhi mṛdu sotsedhaṃ tīram amburayo yathā // RamS_2,57.36 //
GE09ram_02su:3434: na dvijātir ahaṃ rājan mā bhūt te manaso vyathā /
GE09ram_02su:3435: śūdrāyām asmi vaiśyena jāto janapadādhipa // RamS_2,57.37 //
GE09ram_02su:3437: tasya tv ānamyamānasya taṃ bāṇam aham uddharam // RamS_2,57.38 //
GE09ram_02su:3438: jalārdragātraṃ tu vilapya kṛcchrān marmavraṇaṃ saṃtatam ucchvasantam /
GE09ram_02su:3439: tataḥ sarayvāṃ tam ahaṃ śayānaṃ samīkṣya bhadre subhṛśaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ // RamS_2,57.39 //
GE09ram_02su:3442: tad ajñānān mahat pāpaṃ kṛtvā saṃkulitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3443: ekas tv acintayaṃ buddhyā kathaṃ nu sukṛtaṃ bhavet // RamS_2,58.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3444: tatas taṃ ghaṭam ādāya pūrṇaṃ paramavāriṇā /
GE09ram_02su:3445: āśramaṃ tam ahaṃ prāpya yathākhyātapathaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,58.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3447: apaśyaṃ tasya pitarau lūnapakṣāv iva dvijau // RamS_2,58.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3449: tām āśāṃ matkṛte hīnāv udāsīnāv anāthavat // RamS_2,58.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3450: padaśabdaṃ tu me śrutvā munir vākyam abhāṣata /
GE09ram_02su:3451: kiṃ cirāyasi me putra pānīyaṃ kṣipram ānaya // RamS_2,58.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3452: yannimittam idaṃ tāta salile krīḍitaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:3453: utkaṇṭhitā te māteyaṃ praviśa kṣipram āśramam // RamS_2,58.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3454: yad vyalīkaṃ kṛtaṃ putra mātrā te yadi vā mayā /
GE09ram_02su:3455: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ tvayā tāta tapasvinā // RamS_2,58.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3456: tvaṃ gatis tv agatīnāṃ ca cakṣus tvaṃ hīnacakṣuṣām /
GE09ram_02su:3457: samāsaktās tvayi prāṇāḥ kiṃcin nau nābhibhāṣase // RamS_2,58.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3458: munim avyaktayā vācā tam ahaṃ sajjamānayā /
GE09ram_02su:3459: hīnavyañjanayā prekṣya bhīto bhīta ivābruvam // RamS_2,58.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3461: ācacakṣe tv ahaṃ tasmai putravyasanajaṃ bhayam // RamS_2,58.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3463: sajjanāvamataṃ duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ svakarmajam // RamS_2,58.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3465: jighāṃsuḥ śvāpadaṃ kiṃcin nipāne vāgataṃ gajam // RamS_2,58.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3466: tatra śruto mayā śabdo jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3467: dvipo 'yam iti matvā hi bāṇenābhihato mayā // RamS_2,58.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3468: gatvā nadyās tatas tīram apaśyam iṣuṇā hṛdi /
GE09ram_02su:3469: vinirbhinnaṃ gataprāṇaṃ śayānaṃ bhuvi tāpasam // RamS_2,58.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3471: visṛṣṭo 'mbhasi nārācas tena te nihataḥ sutaḥ // RamS_2,58.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3472: sa coddhṛtena bāṇena tatraiva svargam āsthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3473: bhagavantāv ubhau śocann andhāv iti vilapya ca // RamS_2,58.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3475: śeṣam evaṃgate yat syāt tat prasīdatu me muniḥ // RamS_2,58.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3476: sa tac chrutvā vacaḥ krūraṃ niḥśvasañ śokakarśitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3477: mām uvāca mahātejāḥ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam // RamS_2,58.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3478: yady etad aśubhaṃ karma na sma me kathayeḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02su:3479: phalen mūrdhā sma te rājan sadyaḥ śatasahasradhā // RamS_2,58.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3481: jñānapūrvaṃ kṛtaḥ sthānāc cyāvayed api vajriṇam // RamS_2,58.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3482: ajñānāddhi kṛtaṃ yasmād idaṃ tenaiva jīvasi /
GE09ram_02su:3483: api hy adya kulaṃ na syād rāghavāṇāṃ kuto bhavān // RamS_2,58.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3484: naya nau nṛpa taṃ deśam iti māṃ cābhyabhāṣata /
GE09ram_02su:3485: adya taṃ draṣṭum icchāvaḥ putraṃ paścimadarśanam // RamS_2,58.22 //
GE09ram_02su:3487: śayānaṃ bhuvi niḥsaṃjñaṃ dharmarājavaśaṃ gatam // RamS_2,58.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3488: athāham ekas taṃ deśaṃ nītvā tau bhṛśaduḥkhitau /
GE09ram_02su:3489: asparśayam ahaṃ putraṃ taṃ muniṃ saha bhāryayā // RamS_2,58.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3490: tau putram ātmanaḥ spṛṣṭvā tam āsādya tapasvinau /
GE09ram_02su:3491: nipetatuḥ śarīre 'sya pitā cāsyedam abravīt // RamS_2,58.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3492: na nv ahaṃ te priyaḥ putra mātaraṃ paśya dhārmika /
GE09ram_02su:3493: kiṃ nu nāliṅgase putra sukumāra vaco vada // RamS_2,58.26 //
GE09ram_02su:3495: adhīyānasya madhuraṃ śāstraṃ vānyad viśeṣataḥ // RamS_2,58.27 //
GE09ram_02su:3496: ko māṃ saṃdhyām upāsyaiva snātvā hutahutāśanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3498: kandamūlaphalaṃ hṛtvā ko māṃ priyam ivātithim /
GE09ram_02su:3500: imām andhāṃ ca vṛddhāṃ ca mātaraṃ te tapasvinīm /
GE09ram_02su:3501: kathaṃ putra bhariṣyāmi kṛpaṇāṃ putragardhinīm // RamS_2,58.30 //
GE09ram_02su:3502: tiṣṭha mā mā gamaḥ putra yamasya sadanaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:3503: śvo mayā saha gantāsi jananyā ca samedhitaḥ // RamS_2,58.31 //
GE09ram_02su:3504: ubhāv api ca śokārtāv anāthau kṛpaṇau vane /
GE09ram_02su:3505: kṣipram eva gamiṣyāvas tvayā hīnau yamakṣayam // RamS_2,58.32 //
GE09ram_02su:3506: tato vaivasvataṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ pravakṣyāmi bhāratīm /
GE09ram_02su:3507: kṣamatāṃ dharmarājo me bibhṛyāt pitarāv ayam // RamS_2,58.33 //
GE09ram_02su:3509: tena satyena gacchāśu ye lokāḥ śastrayodhinām // RamS_2,58.34 //
GE09ram_02su:3510: yānti śūrā gatiṃ yāṃ ca saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3511: hatās tv abhimukhāḥ putra gatiṃ tāṃ paramāṃ vraja // RamS_2,58.35 //
GE09ram_02su:3512: yāṃ gatiṃ sagaraḥ śaibyo dilīpo janamejayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3513: nahuṣo dhundhumāraś ca prāptās tāṃ gaccha putraka // RamS_2,58.36 //
GE09ram_02su:3514: yā gatiḥ sarvasādhūnāṃ svādhyāyāt tapasā ca yā /
GE09ram_02su:3517: dehanyāsakṛtāṃ yā ca tāṃ gatiṃ gaccha putraka /
GE09ram_02su:3518: na hi tv asmin kule jāto gacchaty akuśalāṃ gatim // RamS_2,58.38 //*
GE09ram_02su:3520: tato 'smai kartum udakaṃ pravṛttaḥ saha bhāryayā // RamS_2,58.39 //
GE09ram_02su:3521: sa tu divyena rūpeṇa muniputraḥ svakarmabhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3522: āśvāsya ca muhūrtaṃ tu pitarau vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,58.40 //
GE09ram_02su:3523: sthānam asmi mahat prāpto bhavatoḥ paricāraṇāt /
GE09ram_02su:3524: bhavantāv api ca kṣipraṃ mama mūlam upaiṣyataḥ // RamS_2,58.41 //
GE09ram_02su:3525: evam uktvā tu divyena vimānena vapuṣmatā /
GE09ram_02su:3526: āruroha divaṃ kṣipraṃ muniputro jitendriyaḥ // RamS_2,58.42 //
GE09ram_02su:3527: sa kṛtvā tūdakaṃ tūrṇaṃ tāpasaḥ saha bhāryayā /
GE09ram_02su:3528: mām uvāca mahātejāḥ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam // RamS_2,58.43 //
GE09ram_02su:3529: adyaiva jahi māṃ rājan maraṇe nāsti me vyathā /
GE09ram_02su:3530: yac chareṇaikaputraṃ māṃ tvam akārṣīr aputrakam // RamS_2,58.44 //
GE09ram_02su:3531: tvayā tu yad avijñānān nihato me sutaḥ śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3532: tena tvām abhiśapsyāmi suduḥkham atidāruṇam // RamS_2,58.45 //
GE09ram_02su:3533: putravyasanajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yad etan mama sāmpratam /
GE09ram_02su:3534: evaṃ tvaṃ putraśokena rājan kālaṃ kariṣyasi // RamS_2,58.46 //
GE09ram_02su:3535: tasmān mām āgataṃ bhadre tasyodārasya tadvacaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3536: yad ahaṃ putraśokena saṃtyakṣyāmy adya jīvitam // RamS_2,58.47 //
GE09ram_02su:3537: yadi māṃ saṃspṛśed rāmaḥ sakṛd adyālabheta vā /
GE09ram_02su:3538: na tan me sadṛśaṃ devi yan mayā rāghave kṛtam // RamS_2,58.48 //
GE09ram_02su:3539: cakṣuṣā tvāṃ na paśyāmi smṛtir mama vilupyate /
GE09ram_02su:3540: dūtā vaivasvatasyaite kausalye tvarayanti mām // RamS_2,58.49 //
GE09ram_02su:3541: atas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad ahaṃ jīvitakṣaye /
GE09ram_02su:3542: na hi paśyāmi dharmajñaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam // RamS_2,58.50 //
GE09ram_02su:3543: na te manuṣyā devās te ye cāruśubhakuṇḍalam /
GE09ram_02su:3544: mukhaṃ drakṣyanti rāmasya varṣe pañcadaśe punaḥ // RamS_2,58.51 //
GE09ram_02su:3546: dhanyā drakṣyanti rāmasya tārādhipanibhaṃ mukham // RamS_2,58.52 //
GE09ram_02su:3548: sugandhi mama nāthasya dhanyā drakṣyanti tanmukham // RamS_2,58.53 //
GE09ram_02su:3550: drakṣyanti sukhino rāmaṃ śukraṃ mārgagataṃ yathā // RamS_2,58.54 //
GE09ram_02su:3551: ayam ātmabhavaḥ śoko mām anātham acetanam /
GE09ram_02su:3552: saṃsādayati vegena yathā kūlaṃ nadīrayaḥ // RamS_2,58.55 //
GE09ram_02su:3554: rājā daśarathaḥ śocañ jīvitāntam upāgamat // RamS_2,58.56 //
GE09ram_02su:3555: tathā tu dīnaṃ kathayan narādhipaḥ priyasya putrasya vivāsanāturaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3556: gate 'rdharātre bhṛśaduḥkhapīḍitas tadā jahau prāṇam udāradarśanaḥ // RamS_2,58.57 //
GE09ram_02su:3566: upaninyus tathāpy anyāḥ kumārībahulāḥ striyaḥ // RamS_2,59.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3568: tāḥ striyas tu samāgamya bhartāraṃ pratyabodhayan // RamS_2,59.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3569: tā vepathuparītāś ca rājñaḥ prāṇeṣu śaṅkitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3571: atha saṃvepamānānāṃ strīṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam /
GE09ram_02su:3572: yat tad āśaṅkitaṃ pāpaṃ tasya jajñe viniścayaḥ // RamS_2,59.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3573: tataḥ pracukruśur dīnāḥ sasvaraṃ tā varāṅganāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3576: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca tyaktanidre babhūvatuḥ // RamS_2,59.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3577: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam /
GE09ram_02su:3578: hā nātheti parikruśya petatur dharaṇītale // RamS_2,59.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3580: na babhrāja rajodhvastā tāreva gaganacyutā // RamS_2,59.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3584: babhūva naradevasya sadma diṣṭāntam īyuṣaḥ // RamS_2,59.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3585: atītam ājñāya tu pārthivarṣabhaṃ yaśasvinaṃ saṃparivārya patnayaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3586: bhṛśaṃ rudantyaḥ karuṇaṃ suduḥkhitāḥ pragṛhya bāhū vyalapann anāthavat // RamS_2,59.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3589: tam agnim iva saṃśāntam ambuhīnam ivārṇavam /
GE09ram_02su:3590: hataprabham ivādityaṃ svargasthaṃ prekṣya bhūmipam // RamS_2,60.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3592: upagṛhya śiro rājñaḥ kaikeyīṃ pratyabhāṣata // RamS_2,60.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3593: sakāmā bhava kaikeyi bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:3594: tyaktvā rājānam ekāgrā nṛśaṃse duṣṭacāriṇi // RamS_2,60.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3595: vihāya māṃ gato rāmo bhartā ca svargato mama /
GE09ram_02su:3596: vipathe sārthahīneva nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe // RamS_2,60.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3597: bhartāraṃ taṃ parityajya kā strī daivatam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3598: icchej jīvitum anyatra kaikeyyās tyaktadharmaṇaḥ // RamS_2,60.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3599: na lubdho budhyate doṣān kiṃ pākam iva bhakṣayan /
GE09ram_02su:3600: kubjānimittaṃ kaikeyyā rāghavāṇāṃ kulaṃ hatam // RamS_2,60.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3602: sabhāryaṃ janakaḥ śrutvā paritapsyaty ahaṃ yathā // RamS_2,60.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3607: niśamya nūnaṃ saṃtrastā rāghavaṃ saṃśrayiṣyati // RamS_2,60.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3609: so 'pi śokasamāviṣṭo nanu tyakṣyati jīvitam // RamS_2,60.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3613: rājñaḥ sarvāṇy athādiṣṭāś cakruḥ karmāṇy anantaram // RamS_2,60.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3614: na tu saṃkālanaṃ rājño vinā putreṇa mantriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3615: sarvajñāḥ kartum īṣus te tato rakṣanti bhūmipam // RamS_2,60.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3616: tailadroṇyāṃ tu sacivaiḥ śāyitaṃ taṃ narādhipam /
GE09ram_02su:3617: hā mṛto 'yam iti jñātvā striyas tāḥ paryadevayan // RamS_2,60.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3621: purī nārājatāyodhyā hīnā rājñā mahātmanā // RamS_2,60.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3624: gataprabhā dyaur iva bhāskaraṃ vinā vyapetanakṣatragaṇeva śarvarī /
GE09ram_02su:3625: purī babhāse rahitā mahātmanā na cāsrakaṇṭhākulamārgacatvarā // RamS_2,60.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3626: narāś ca nāryaś ca sametya saṃghaśo vigarhamāṇā bharatasya mātaram /
GE09ram_02su:3627: tadā nagaryāṃ naradevasaṃkṣaye babhūvur ārtā na ca śarma lebhire // RamS_2,60.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3631: sametya rājakartāraḥ sabhām īyur dvijātayaḥ // RamS_2,61.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3633: kātyāyano gautamaś ca jābāliś ca mahāyaśāḥ // RamS_2,61.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3634: ete dvijāḥ sahāmātyaiḥ pṛthag vācam udīrayan /
GE09ram_02su:3636: atītā śarvarī duḥkhaṃ yā no varṣaśatopamā /
GE09ram_02su:3637: asmin pañcatvam āpanne putraśokena pārthive // RamS_2,61.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3638: svargataś ca mahārājo rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3639: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tejasvī rāmeṇaiva gataḥ saha // RamS_2,61.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3643: arājakaṃ hi no rāṣṭraṃ na vināśam avāpnuyāt // RamS_2,61.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3645: abhivarṣati parjanyo mahīṃ divyena vāriṇā // RamS_2,61.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3647: nārājake pituḥ putro bhāryā vā vartate vaśe // RamS_2,61.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3648: arājake dhanaṃ nāsti nāsti bhāryāpy arājake /
GE09ram_02su:3649: idam atyāhitaṃ cānyat kutaḥ satyam arājake // RamS_2,61.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3651: udyānāni ca ramyāṇi hṛṣṭāḥ puṇyagṛhāṇi ca // RamS_2,61.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3653: sattrāṇy anvāsate dāntā brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ // RamS_2,61.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3655: utsavāś ca samājāś ca vardhante rāṣṭravardhanāḥ // RamS_2,61.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3659: narā niryānty araṇyāni nārībhiḥ saha kāminaḥ // RamS_2,61.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3665: bhāvayann ātmanātmānaṃ yatra sāyaṃgṛho muniḥ // RamS_2,61.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3667: na cāpy arājake senā śatrūn viṣahate yudhi // RamS_2,61.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3668: yathā hy anudakā nadyo yathā vāpy atṛṇaṃ vanam /
GE09ram_02su:3669: agopālā yathā gāvas tathā rāṣṭram arājakam // RamS_2,61.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3671: matsyā iva narā nityaṃ bhakṣayanti parasparam // RamS_2,61.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3674: aho tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃcana /
GE09ram_02su:3675: rājā cen na bhavel loke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī // RamS_2,61.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3676: jīvaty api mahārāje tavaiva vacanaṃ vayam /
GE09ram_02su:3677: nātikramāmahe sarve velāṃ prāpyeva sāgaraḥ // RamS_2,61.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3678: sa naḥ samīkṣya dvijavaryavṛttaṃ nṛpaṃ vinā rājyam araṇyabhūtam /
GE09ram_02su:3679: kumāram ikṣvākusutaṃ vadānyaṃ tvam eva rājānam ihābhiṣiñca // RamS_2,61.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3682: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:3683: mitrāmātyagaṇān sarvān brāhmaṇāṃs tān idaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,62.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3684: yad asau mātulakule pure rājagṛhe sukhī /
GE09ram_02su:3685: bharato vasati bhrātrā śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // RamS_2,62.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3686: tac chīghraṃ javanā dūtā gacchantu tvaritair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3687: ānetuṃ bhrātarau vīrau kiṃ samīkṣāmahe vayam // RamS_2,62.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3688: gacchantv iti tataḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abruvan /
GE09ram_02su:3689: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,62.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3691: śrūyatām itikartavyaṃ sarvān eva bravīmi vaḥ // RamS_2,62.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3692: puraṃ rājagṛhaṃ gatvā śīghraṃ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3693: tyaktaśokair idaṃ vācyaḥ śāsanād bharato mama // RamS_2,62.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3694: purohitas tvāṃ kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3695: tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā // RamS_2,62.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3696: mā cāsmai proṣitaṃ rāmaṃ mā cāsmai pitaraṃ mṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:3697: bhavantaḥ śaṃsiṣur gatvā rāghavāṇām imaṃ kṣayam // RamS_2,62.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3698: kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:3699: kṣipram ādāya rājñaś ca bharatasya ca gacchata /
GE09ram_02su:3701: te hastinapure gaṅgāṃ tīrtvā pratyaṅmukhā yayuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3706: abhigamyābhivādyaṃ taṃ kuliṅgāṃ prāviśan purīm // RamS_2,62.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3708: yayur madhyena vāhlīkān sudāmānaṃ ca parvatam /
GE09ram_02su:3709: viṣṇoḥ padaṃ prekṣamāṇā vipāśāṃ cāpi śālmalīm // RamS_2,62.13 //*
GE09ram_02su:3710: te śrāntavāhanā dūtā vikṛṣṭena satā pathā /
GE09ram_02su:3711: girivrajaṃ puravaraṃ śīghram āsedur añjasā // RamS_2,62.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3712: bhartuḥ priyārthaṃ kularakṣaṇārthaṃ bhartuś ca vaṃśasya parigrahārtham /
GE09ram_02su:3713: aheḍamānās tvarayā sma dūtā rātryāṃ tu te tat puram eva yātāḥ // RamS_2,62.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3716: yām eva rātriṃ te dūtāḥ praviśanti sma tāṃ purīm /
GE09ram_02su:3717: bharatenāpi tāṃ rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭo 'yam apriyaḥ // RamS_2,63.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3718: vyuṣṭām eva tu tāṃ rātriṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ svapnam apriyam /
GE09ram_02su:3721: āyāsaṃ hi vineṣyantaḥ sabhāyāṃ cakrire kathāḥ // RamS_2,63.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3722: vādayanti tathā śāntiṃ lāsayanty api cāpare /
GE09ram_02su:3723: nāṭakāny apare prāhur hāsyāni vividhāni ca // RamS_2,63.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3724: sa tair mahātmā bharataḥ sakhibhiḥ priyavādibhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3725: goṣṭhīhāsyāni kurvadbhir na prāhṛṣyata rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,63.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3726: tam abravīt priyasakho bharataṃ sakhibhir vṛtam /
GE09ram_02su:3727: suhṛdbhiḥ paryupāsīnaḥ kiṃ sakhe nānumodase // RamS_2,63.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3728: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ suhṛdaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02su:3729: śṛṇu tvaṃ yannimittaṃ me dainyam etad upāgatam // RamS_2,63.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3732: plavamānaś ca me dṛṣṭaḥ sa tasmin gomayahrade /
GE09ram_02su:3733: pibann añjalinā tailaṃ hasann iva muhur muhuḥ // RamS_2,63.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3734: tatas tilodanaṃ bhuktvā punaḥ punar adhaḥśirāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3736: svapne 'pi sāgaraṃ śuṣkaṃ candraṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02su:3737: sahasā cāpi saṃśāntaṃ jvalitaṃ jātavedasam // RamS_2,63.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3738: avadīrṇāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ śuṣkāṃś ca vividhān drumān /
GE09ram_02su:3739: ahaṃ paśyāmi vidhvastān sadhūmāṃś caiva parvatān // RamS_2,63.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3741: prahasanti sma rājānaṃ pramadāḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalāḥ // RamS_2,63.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3744: evam etan mayā dṛṣṭam imāṃ rātriṃ bhayāvahām /
GE09ram_02su:3745: ahaṃ rāmo 'tha vā rājā lakṣmaṇo vā mariṣyati // RamS_2,63.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3746: naro yānena yaḥ svapne kharayuktena yāti hi /
GE09ram_02su:3748: etannimittaṃ dīno 'haṃ tan na vaḥ pratipūjaye // RamS_2,63.16 //*
GE09ram_02su:3749: śuṣyatīva ca me kaṇṭho na svastham iva me manaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3750: jugupsann iva cātmānaṃ na ca paśyāmi kāraṇam // RamS_2,63.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3751: imāṃ hi duḥsvapnagatiṃ niśāmya tām anekarūpām avitarkitāṃ purā /
GE09ram_02su:3752: bhayaṃ mahat taddhṛdayān na yāti me vicintya rājānam acintyadarśanam // RamS_2,63.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3755: bharate bruvati svapnaṃ dūtās te klāntavāhanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3757: samāgamya tu rājñā ca rājaputreṇa cārcitāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3758: rājñaḥ pādau gṛhītvā tu tam ūcur bharataṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,64.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3759: purohitas tvā kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3760: tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā // RamS_2,64.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3761: atra viṃśatikoṭyas tu nṛpater mātulasya te /
GE09ram_02su:3762: daśakoṭyas tu sampūrṇās tathaiva ca nṛpātmaja // RamS_2,64.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3763: pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ svanuraktaḥ suhṛjjane /
GE09ram_02su:3764: dūtān uvāca bharataḥ kāmaiḥ sampratipūjya tān // RamS_2,64.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3765: kaccit sukuśalī rājā pitā daśaratho mama /
GE09ram_02su:3766: kaccic cārogatā rāme lakṣmaṇe vā mahātmani // RamS_2,64.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3768: arogā cāpi kausalyā mātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ // RamS_2,64.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3769: kaccit sumitrā dharmajñā jananī lakṣmaṇasya yā /
GE09ram_02su:3770: śatrughnasya ca vīrasya sārogā cāpi madhyamā // RamS_2,64.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3772: arogā cāpi kaikeyī mātā me kim uvāca ha // RamS_2,64.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3773: evam uktās tu te dūtā bharatena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02su:3774: ūcuḥ sampraśritaṃ vākyam idaṃ taṃ bharataṃ tadā /
GE09ram_02su:3775: kuśalās te naravyāghra yeṣāṃ kuśalam icchasi // RamS_2,64.10 //*
GE09ram_02su:3776: bharataś cāpi tān dūtān evam ukto 'bhyabhāṣata /
GE09ram_02su:3777: āpṛcche 'haṃ mahārājaṃ dūtāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām // RamS_2,64.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3778: evam uktvā tu tān dūtān bharataḥ pārthivātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3779: dūtaiḥ saṃcodito vākyaṃ mātāmaham uvāca ha // RamS_2,64.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3781: punar apy aham eṣyāmi yadā me tvaṃ smariṣyasi // RamS_2,64.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3782: bharatenaivam uktas tu nṛpo mātāmahas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:3783: tam uvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ śirasy āghrāya rāghavam // RamS_2,64.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3784: gaccha tātānujāne tvāṃ kaikeyī suprajās tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:3785: mātaraṃ kuśalaṃ brūyāḥ pitaraṃ ca paraṃtapa // RamS_2,64.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3786: purohitaṃ ca kuśalaṃ ye cānye dvijasattamāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3787: tau ca tāta maheṣvāsau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau // RamS_2,64.16 //
GE09ram_02su:3788: tasmai hastyuttamāṃś citrān kambalān ajināni ca /
GE09ram_02su:3789: abhisatkṛtya kaikeyo bharatāya dhanaṃ dadau // RamS_2,64.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3791: satkṛtya kaikeyī putraṃ kekayo dhanam ādiśat // RamS_2,64.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3795: kharāñ śīghrān susaṃyuktān mātulo 'smai dhanaṃ dadau // RamS_2,64.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3797: daṃṣṭrāyudhān mahākāyāñ śunaś copāyanaṃ dadau // RamS_2,64.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3798: sa mātāmaham āpṛcchya mātulaṃ ca yudhājitam /
GE09ram_02su:3799: ratham āruhya bharataḥ śatrughnasahito yayau // RamS_2,64.22 //
GE09ram_02su:3801: uṣṭrago'śvakharair bhṛtyā bharataṃ yāntam anvayuḥ // RamS_2,64.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3802: balena gupto bharato mahātmā sahāryakasyātmasamair amātyaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3803: ādāya śatrughnam apetaśatrur gṛhād yayau siddha ivendralokāt // RamS_2,64.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3808: śatadrūm atarac chrīmān nadīm ikṣvākunandanaḥ // RamS_2,65.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3810: śilām ākurvatīṃ tīrtvā āgneyaṃ śalyakartanam // RamS_2,65.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3812: atyayāt sa mahāśailān vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ prati // RamS_2,65.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3814: yamunāṃ prāpya saṃtīrṇo balam āśvāsayat tadā // RamS_2,65.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3815: śītīkṛtya tu gātrāṇi klāntān āśvāsya vājinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3816: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca prāyād ādāya codakam // RamS_2,65.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3818: bhadro bhadreṇa yānena mārutaḥ kham ivātyayāt // RamS_2,65.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3820: varūthaṃ ca yayau ramyaṃ grāmaṃ daśarathātmajaḥ // RamS_2,65.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3821: tatra ramye vane vāsaṃ kṛtvāsau prāṅmukho yayau /
GE09ram_02su:3822: udyānam ujjihānāyāḥ priyakā yatra pādapāḥ // RamS_2,65.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3823: sālāṃs tu priyakān prāpya śīghrān āsthāya vājinaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3824: anujñāpyātha bharato vāhinīṃ tvarito yayau // RamS_2,65.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3825: vāsaṃ kṛtvā sarvatīrthe tīrtvā cottānikāṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_02su:3826: anyā nadīś ca vividhāḥ pārvatīyais turaṃgamaiḥ // RamS_2,65.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3828: tatāra ca naravyāghro lauhitye sa kapīvatīm /
GE09ram_02su:3829: ekasāle sthāṇumatīṃ vinate gomatīṃ nadīm // RamS_2,65.11 //*
GE09ram_02su:3833: ayodhyāṃ manunā rājñā nirmitāṃ sa dadarśa ha // RamS_2,65.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3835: ayodhyām agrato dṛṣṭvā rathe sārathim abravīt // RamS_2,65.14 //
GE09ram_02su:3837: ayodhyā dṛśyate dūrāt sārathe pāṇḍumṛttikā // RamS_2,65.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3840: ayodhyāyāṃ purā śabdaḥ śrūyate tumulo mahān /
GE09ram_02su:3841: samantān naranārīṇāṃ tam adya na śṛṇomy aham // RamS_2,65.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3845: araṇyabhūteva purī sārathe pratibhāti me // RamS_2,65.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3846: na hy atra yānair dṛśyante na gajair na ca vājibhiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3847: niryānto vābhiyānto vā naramukhyā yathāpuram // RamS_2,65.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3848: aniṣṭāni ca pāpāni paśyāmi vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:3849: nimittāny amanojñāni tena sīdati me manaḥ // RamS_2,65.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3851: dvāḥsthair utthāya vijayaṃ pṛṣṭas taiḥ sahito yayau // RamS_2,65.22 //
GE09ram_02su:3852: sa tv anekāgrahṛdayo dvāḥsthaṃ pratyarcya taṃ janam /
GE09ram_02su:3853: sūtam aśvapateḥ klāntam abravīt tatra rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,65.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3854: śrutā no yādṛśāḥ pūrvaṃ nṛpatīnāṃ vināśane /
GE09ram_02su:3855: ākārās tān ahaṃ sarvān iha paśyāmi sārathe // RamS_2,65.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3857: sastrīpuṃsaṃ ca paśyāmi janam utkaṇṭhitaṃ pure // RamS_2,65.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3858: ity evam uktvā bharataḥ sūtaṃ taṃ dīnamānasaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3859: tāny aniṣṭāny ayodhyāyāṃ prekṣya rājagṛhaṃ yayau /
GE09ram_02su:3861: dṛṣṭvā purīm indrapurīprakāśāṃ duḥkhena sampūrṇataro babhūva /
GE09ram_02su:3862: bahūni paśyan manaso 'priyāṇi yāny anyadā nāsya pure babhūvuḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3863: avākśirā dīnamanā na hṛṣṭaḥ pitur mahātmā praviveśa veśma // RamS_2,65.27 //
GE09ram_02su:3866: apaśyaṃs tu tatas tatra pitaraṃ pitur ālaye /
GE09ram_02su:3867: jagāma bharato draṣṭuṃ mātaraṃ mātur ālaye // RamS_2,66.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3868: anuprāptaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikeyī proṣitaṃ sutam /
GE09ram_02su:3869: utpapāta tadā hṛṣṭā tyaktvā sauvarṇamānasam // RamS_2,66.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3871: bharataḥ prekṣya jagrāha jananyāś caraṇau śubhau // RamS_2,66.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3873: aṅke bharatam āropya praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // RamS_2,66.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3875: api nādhvaśramaḥ śīghraṃ rathenāpatatas tava // RamS_2,66.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3876: āryakas te sukuśalī yudhājin mātulas tava /
GE09ram_02su:3877: pravāsāc ca sukhaṃ putra sarvaṃ me vaktum arhasi // RamS_2,66.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3878: evaṃ pṛṣṭas tu kaikeyyā priyaṃ pārthivanandanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3879: ācaṣṭa bharataḥ sarvaṃ mātre rājīvalocanaḥ // RamS_2,66.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3881: ambāyāḥ kuśalī tāto yudhājin mātulaś ca me // RamS_2,66.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3882: yan me dhanaṃ ca ratnaṃ ca dadau rājā paraṃtapaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3883: pariśrāntaṃ pathy abhavat tato 'haṃ pūrvam āgataḥ // RamS_2,66.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3885: yad ahaṃ praṣṭum icchāmi tad ambā vaktum arhati // RamS_2,66.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3887: na cāyam ikṣvākujanaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ pratibhāti me // RamS_2,66.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3889: tam ahaṃ nādya paśyāmi draṣṭum icchann ihāgataḥ // RamS_2,66.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3890: pitur grahīṣye caraṇau taṃ mamākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3891: āhosvid amba jyeṣṭhāyāḥ kausalyāyā niveśane // RamS_2,66.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3892: taṃ pratyuvāca kaikeyī priyavad ghoram apriyam /
GE09ram_02su:3894: yā gatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ te pitā gataḥ // RamS_2,66.14 //*
GE09ram_02su:3895: tac chrutvā bharato vākyaṃ dharmābhijanavāñ śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3899: etat suruciraṃ bhāti pitur me śayanaṃ purā /
GE09ram_02su:3900: tad idaṃ na vibhāty adya vihīnaṃ tena dhīmatā // RamS_2,66.17 //
GE09ram_02su:3901: tam ārtaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ samīkṣya patitaṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02su:3902: utthāpayitvā śokārtaṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // RamS_2,66.18 //
GE09ram_02su:3904: tvadvidhā na hi śocanti santaḥ sadasi saṃmatāḥ // RamS_2,66.19 //
GE09ram_02su:3905: sa ruditvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhūmau viparivṛtya ca /
GE09ram_02su:3906: jananīṃ pratyuvācedaṃ śokair bahubhir āvṛtaḥ // RamS_2,66.20 //
GE09ram_02su:3907: abhiṣekṣyati rāmaṃ tu rājā yajñaṃ nu yakṣyati /
GE09ram_02su:3908: ity ahaṃ kṛtasaṃkalpo hṛṣṭo yātrām ayāsiṣam // RamS_2,66.21 //
GE09ram_02su:3909: tad idaṃ hy anyathā bhūtaṃ vyavadīrṇaṃ mano mama /
GE09ram_02su:3910: pitaraṃ yo na paśyāmi nityaṃ priyahite ratam // RamS_2,66.22 //
GE09ram_02su:3911: amba kenātyagād rājā vyādhinā mayy anāgate /
GE09ram_02su:3912: dhanyā rāmādayaḥ sarve yaiḥ pitā saṃskṛtaḥ svayam // RamS_2,66.23 //
GE09ram_02su:3913: na nūnaṃ māṃ mahārājaḥ prāptaṃ jānāti kīrtimān /
GE09ram_02su:3914: upajighreddhi māṃ mūrdhni tātaḥ saṃnamya satvaram // RamS_2,66.24 //
GE09ram_02su:3916: yena māṃ rajasā dhvastam abhīkṣṇaṃ parimārjati // RamS_2,66.25 //
GE09ram_02su:3917: yo me bhrātā pitā bandhur yasya dāso 'smi dhīmataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3918: tasya māṃ śīghram ākhyāhi rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ // RamS_2,66.26 //
GE09ram_02su:3919: pitā hi bhavati jyeṣṭho dharmam āryasya jānataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3920: tasya pādau grahīṣyāmi sa hīdānīṃ gatir mama // RamS_2,66.27 //
GE09ram_02su:3921: ārye kim abravīd rājā pitā me satyavikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3922: paścimaṃ sādhusaṃdeśam icchāmi śrotum ātmanaḥ // RamS_2,66.28 //
GE09ram_02su:3923: iti pṛṣṭā yathātattvaṃ kaikeyī vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:3924: rāmeti rājā vilapan hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca /
GE09ram_02su:3925: sa mahātmā paraṃ lokaṃ gato gatimatāṃ varaḥ // RamS_2,66.29 //*
GE09ram_02su:3926: imāṃ tu paścimāṃ vācaṃ vyājahāra pitā tava /
GE09ram_02su:3928: siddhārthās tu narā rāmam āgataṃ sītayā saha /
GE09ram_02su:3929: lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam // RamS_2,66.31 //
GE09ram_02su:3931: viṣaṇṇavadano bhūtvā bhūyaḥ papraccha mātaram // RamS_2,66.32 //
GE09ram_02su:3933: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca samaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,66.33 //
GE09ram_02su:3935: mātāsya yugapad vākyaṃ vipriyaṃ priyaśaṅkayā // RamS_2,66.34 //
GE09ram_02su:3936: sa hi rājasutaḥ putra cīravāsā mahāvanam /
GE09ram_02su:3937: daṇḍakān saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇānucaro gataḥ // RamS_2,66.35 //
GE09ram_02su:3938: tac chrutvā bharatas trasto bhrātuś cāritraśaṅkayā /
GE09ram_02su:3939: svasya vaṃśasya māhātmyāt praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // RamS_2,66.36 //
GE09ram_02su:3940: kaccin na brāhmaṇadhanaṃ hṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasyacit /
GE09ram_02su:3941: kaccin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ // RamS_2,66.37 //
GE09ram_02su:3943: kasmāt sa daṇḍakāraṇye bhrūṇaheva vivāsitaḥ // RamS_2,66.38 //
GE09ram_02su:3944: athāsya capalā mātā tat svakarma yathātatham /
GE09ram_02su:3947: kaścin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3948: na rāmaḥ paradārāṃś ca cakṣurbhyām api paśyati // RamS_2,66.40 //*
GE09ram_02su:3950: yācitas te pitā rājyaṃ rāmasya ca vivāsanam // RamS_2,66.41 //
GE09ram_02su:3951: sa svavṛttiṃ samāsthāya pitā te tat tathākarot /
GE09ram_02su:3952: rāmaś ca sahasaumitriḥ preṣitaḥ saha sītayā // RamS_2,66.42 //
GE09ram_02su:3953: tam apaśyan priyaṃ putraṃ mahīpālo mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3955: tvayā tv idānīṃ dharmajña rājatvam avalambyatām /
GE09ram_02su:3956: tvatkṛte hi mayā sarvam idam evaṃvidhaṃ kṛtam // RamS_2,66.44 //
GE09ram_02su:3957: tat putra śīghraṃ vidhinā vidhijñair vasiṣṭhamukhyaiḥ sahito dvijendraiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3958: saṃkālya rājānam adīnasattvam ātmānam urvyām abhiṣecayasva // RamS_2,66.45 //
GE09ram_02su:3961: śrutvā tu pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ bhrātarau ca vivāsitau /
GE09ram_02su:3962: bharato duḥkhasaṃtapta idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,67.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3963: kiṃ nu kāryaṃ hatasyeha mama rājyena śocataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3964: vihīnasyātha pitrā ca bhrātrā pitṛsamena ca // RamS_2,67.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3965: duḥkhe me duḥkham akaror vraṇe kṣāram ivādadhāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3966: rājānaṃ pretabhāvasthaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ ca tāpasam // RamS_2,67.3 //
GE09ram_02su:3968: aṅgāram upagūhya sma pitā me nāvabuddhavān // RamS_2,67.4 //
GE09ram_02su:3970: duṣkaraṃ yadi jīvetāṃ prāpya tvāṃ jananīṃ mama // RamS_2,67.5 //
GE09ram_02su:3971: nanu tv āryo 'pi dharmātmā tvayi vṛttim anuttamām /
GE09ram_02su:3972: vartate guruvṛttijño yathā mātari vartate // RamS_2,67.6 //
GE09ram_02su:3973: tathā jyeṣṭhā hi me mātā kausalyā dīrghadarśinī /
GE09ram_02su:3974: tvayi dharmaṃ samāsthāya bhaginyām iva vartate // RamS_2,67.7 //
GE09ram_02su:3976: prasthāpya vanavāsāya kathaṃ pāpe na śocasi // RamS_2,67.8 //
GE09ram_02su:3978: pravrājya cīravasanaṃ kiṃ nu paśyasi kāraṇam // RamS_2,67.9 //
GE09ram_02su:3979: lubdhāyā vidito manye na te 'haṃ rāghavaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02su:3980: tathā hy anartho rājyārthaṃ tvayā nīto mahān ayam // RamS_2,67.10 //
GE09ram_02su:3982: kena śaktiprabhāvena rājyaṃ rakṣitum utsahe // RamS_2,67.11 //
GE09ram_02su:3983: taṃ hi nityaṃ mahārājo balavantaṃ mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3984: apāśrito 'bhūd dharmātmā merur meruvanaṃ yathā // RamS_2,67.12 //
GE09ram_02su:3986: damyo dhuram ivāsādya saheyaṃ kena caujasā // RamS_2,67.13 //
GE09ram_02su:3987: atha vā me bhavec chaktir yogair buddhibalena vā /
GE09ram_02su:3988: sakāmāṃ na kariṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ putragardhinīm /
GE09ram_02su:3990: ity evam uktvā bharato mahātmā priyetarair vākyagaṇais tudaṃs tām /
GE09ram_02su:3991: śokāturaś cāpi nanāda bhūyaḥ siṃho yathā parvatagahvarasthaḥ // RamS_2,67.15 //
GE09ram_02su:3994: tāṃ tathā garhayitvā tu mātaraṃ bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:3995: roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭaḥ punar evābravīd vacaḥ // RamS_2,68.1 //
GE09ram_02su:3997: parityaktā ca dharmeṇa mā mṛtaṃ rudatī bhava // RamS_2,68.2 //
GE09ram_02su:3998: kiṃ nu te 'dūṣayad rājā rāmo vā bhṛśadhārmikaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:3999: yayor mṛtyur vivāsaś ca tvatkṛte tulyam āgatau // RamS_2,68.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4001: kaikeyi narakaṃ gaccha mā ca bhartuḥ salokatām // RamS_2,68.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4002: yat tvayā hīdṛśaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ ghoreṇa karmaṇā /
GE09ram_02su:4003: sarvalokapriyaṃ hitvā mamāpy āpāditaṃ bhayam // RamS_2,68.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4004: tvatkṛte me pitā vṛtto rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4005: ayaśo jīvaloke ca tvayāhaṃ pratipāditaḥ // RamS_2,68.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4007: na te 'ham abhibhāṣyo 'smi durvṛtte patighātini // RamS_2,68.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4008: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā mama mātaraḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4009: duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭās tvāṃ prāpya kuladūṣiṇīm // RamS_2,68.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4010: na tvam aśvapateḥ kanyā dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4011: rākṣasī tatra jātāsi kulapradhvaṃsinī pituḥ // RamS_2,68.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4012: yat tvayā dhārmiko rāmo nityaṃ satyaparāyaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4013: vanaṃ prasthāpito duḥkhāt pitā ca tridivaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,68.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4014: yatpradhānāsi tat pāpaṃ mayi pitrā vinākṛte /
GE09ram_02su:4015: bhrātṛbhyāṃ ca parityakte sarvalokasya cāpriye // RamS_2,68.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4017: kṛtvā kaṃ prāpsyase tv adya lokaṃ nirayagāminī // RamS_2,68.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4019: jyeṣṭhaṃ pitṛsamaṃ rāmaṃ kausalyāyā ātmasambhavam // RamS_2,68.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4021: tasmāt priyataro mātuḥ priyatvān na tu bāndhavaḥ // RamS_2,68.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4024: tāv ardhadivase śrāntau dṛṣṭvā putrau mahītale /
GE09ram_02su:4027: bindavaḥ patitā gātre sūkṣmāḥ surabhigandhinaḥ // RamS_2,68.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4029: indraḥ prāñjalir udvignaḥ surarājo 'bravīd vacaḥ // RamS_2,68.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4030: bhayaṃ kaccin na cāsmāsu kutaścid vidyate mahat /
GE09ram_02su:4031: kutonimittaḥ śokas te brūhi sarvahitaiṣiṇi // RamS_2,68.19 //
GE09ram_02su:4032: evam uktā tu surabhiḥ surarājena dhīmatā /
GE09ram_02su:4033: pratyuvāca tato dhīrā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradā // RamS_2,68.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4034: śāntaṃ pāpaṃ na vaḥ kiṃcit kutaścid amarādhipa /
GE09ram_02su:4035: ahaṃ tu magnau śocāmi svaputrau viṣame sthitau // RamS_2,68.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4038: mama kāyāt prasūtau hi duḥkhitau bhārapīḍitau /
GE09ram_02su:4039: yau dṛṣṭvā paritapye 'haṃ nāsti putrasamaḥ priyaḥ // RamS_2,68.23 //
GE09ram_02su:4041: kiṃ punar yā vinā rāmaṃ kausalyā vartayiṣyati // RamS_2,68.24 //
GE09ram_02su:4042: ekaputrā ca sādhvī ca vivatseyaṃ tvayā kṛtā /
GE09ram_02su:4043: tasmāt tvaṃ satataṃ duḥkhaṃ pretya ceha ca lapsyase // RamS_2,68.25 //
GE09ram_02su:4044: ahaṃ hy apacitiṃ bhrātuḥ pituś ca sakalām imām /
GE09ram_02su:4045: vardhanaṃ yaśasaś cāpi kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // RamS_2,68.26 //
GE09ram_02su:4047: svayam eva pravekṣyāmi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam // RamS_2,68.27 //
GE09ram_02su:4049: papāta bhuvi saṃkruddho niḥśvasann iva pannagaḥ // RamS_2,68.28 //
GE09ram_02su:4051: babhūva bhūmau patito nṛpātmajaḥ śacīpateḥ ketur ivotsavakṣaye // RamS_2,68.29 //
GE09ram_02su:4055: kausalyā śabdam ājñāya sumitrām idam abravīt // RamS_2,69.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4057: tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi bharataṃ dīrghadarśinam // RamS_2,69.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4058: evam uktvā sumitrāṃ sā vivarṇā malināmbarā /
GE09ram_02su:4059: pratasthe bharato yatra vepamānā vicetanā // RamS_2,69.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4060: sa tu rāmānujaś cāpi śatrughnasahitas tadā /
GE09ram_02su:4061: pratasthe bharato yatra kausalyāyā niveśanam // RamS_2,69.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4065: idaṃ te rājyakāmasya rājyaṃ prāptam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:4066: samprāptaṃ bata kaikeyyā śīghraṃ krūreṇa karmaṇā // RamS_2,69.6 //*
GE09ram_02su:4068: kaikeyī kaṃ guṇaṃ tatra paśyati krūradarśinī // RamS_2,69.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4069: kṣipraṃ mām api kaikeyī prasthāpayitum arhati /
GE09ram_02su:4070: hiraṇyanābho yatrāste suto me sumahāyaśāḥ // RamS_2,69.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4071: atha vā svayam evāhaṃ sumitrānucarā sukham /
GE09ram_02su:4072: agnihotraṃ puraskṛtya prasthāsye yatra rāghavaḥ // RamS_2,69.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4073: kāmaṃ vā svayam evādya tatra māṃ netum arhasi /
GE09ram_02su:4074: yatrāsau puruṣavyāghras tapyate me tapaḥ sutaḥ // RamS_2,69.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4077: evaṃ vilapamānāṃ tāṃ bharataḥ prāñjalis tadā /
GE09ram_02su:4078: kausalyāṃ pratyuvācedaṃ śokair bahubhir āvṛtām // RamS_2,69.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4079: ārye kasmād ajānantaṃ garhase mām akilbiṣam /
GE09ram_02su:4080: vipulāṃ ca mama prītiṃ sthirāṃ jānāsi rāghave // RamS_2,69.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4081: kṛtā śāstrānugā buddhir mā bhūt tasya kadācana /
GE09ram_02su:4082: satyasaṃdhaḥ satāṃ śreṣṭho yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4083: praiṣyaṃ pāpīyasāṃ yātu sūryaṃ ca prati mehatu /
GE09ram_02su:4084: hantu pādena gāṃ suptāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4085: kārayitvā mahat karma bhartā bhṛtyam anarthakam /
GE09ram_02su:4086: adharmo yo 'sya so 'syās tu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4088: tatas tu druhyatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4090: adharmo yo 'sya so 'syāstu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4091: saṃśrutya ca tapasvibhyaḥ sattre vai yajñadakṣiṇām /
GE09ram_02su:4092: tāṃ vipralapatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.19 //
GE09ram_02su:4094: mā sma kārṣīt satāṃ dharmaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4096: sa nāśayatu duṣṭātmā yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4097: pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ chāgaṃ vṛthā so 'śnātu nirghṛṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4098: gurūṃś cāpy avajānātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.22 //
GE09ram_02su:4099: putrair dāraiś ca bhṛtyaiś ca svagṛhe parivāritaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4100: sa eko mṛṣṭam aśnātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.23 //
GE09ram_02su:4102: bhṛtyatyāge ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām // RamS_2,69.24 //
GE09ram_02su:4103: ubhe saṃdhye śayānasya yat pāpaṃ parikalpyate /
GE09ram_02su:4104: tac ca pāpaṃ bhavet tasya yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.25 //
GE09ram_02su:4105: yad agnidāyake pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ gurutalpage /
GE09ram_02su:4106: mitradrohe ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām // RamS_2,69.26 //
GE09ram_02su:4107: devatānāṃ pitḥṇāṃ ca mātāpitros tathaiva ca /
GE09ram_02su:4108: mā sma kārṣīt sa śuśrūṣāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.27 //
GE09ram_02su:4109: satāṃ lokāt satāṃ kīrtyāḥ sajjuṣṭāt karmaṇas tathā /
GE09ram_02su:4110: bhraśyatu kṣipram adyaiva yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // RamS_2,69.28 //
GE09ram_02su:4112: evam āśvāsayann eva duḥkhārto nipapāta ha // RamS_2,69.29 //
GE09ram_02su:4113: tathā tu śapathaiḥ kaṣṭaiḥ śapamānam acetanam /
GE09ram_02su:4114: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ kausalyā vākyam abravīt // RamS_2,69.30 //
GE09ram_02su:4115: mama duḥkham idaṃ putra bhūyaḥ samupajāyate /
GE09ram_02su:4116: śapathaiḥ śapamāno hi prāṇān uparuṇatsi me // RamS_2,69.31 //
GE09ram_02su:4117: diṣṭyā na calito dharmād ātmā te sahalakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4118: vatsa satyapratijño me satāṃ lokān avāpsyasi // RamS_2,69.32 //
GE09ram_02su:4120: mohāc ca śokasaṃrodhād babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ // RamS_2,69.33 //
GE09ram_02su:4122: muhur muhur niḥśvasataś ca dīrghaṃ sā tasya śokena jagāma rātriḥ // RamS_2,69.34 //
GE09ram_02su:4126: uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭho vasiṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhavāg ṛṣiḥ // RamS_2,70.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4127: alaṃ śokena bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4128: prāptakālaṃ narapateḥ kuru saṃyānam uttaram // RamS_2,70.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4129: vasiṣṭhasya vacaḥ śrutvā bharato dhāraṇāṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4131: uddhṛtaṃ tailasaṃkledāt sa tu bhūmau niveśitam /
GE09ram_02su:4134: tato daśarathaṃ putro vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ // RamS_2,70.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4135: kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ rājan proṣite mayy anāgate /
GE09ram_02su:4136: vivāsya rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // RamS_2,70.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4137: kva yāsyasi mahārāja hitvemaṃ duḥkhitaṃ janam /
GE09ram_02su:4139: yogakṣemaṃ tu te rājan ko 'smin kalpayitā pure /
GE09ram_02su:4140: tvayi prayāte svas tāta rāme ca vanam āśrite // RamS_2,70.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4141: vidhavā pṛthivī rājaṃs tvayā hīnā na rājate /
GE09ram_02su:4142: hīnacandreva rajanī nagarī pratibhāti mām // RamS_2,70.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4144: abravīd vacanaṃ bhūyo vasiṣṭhas tu mahān ṛṣiḥ // RamS_2,70.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4146: tāny avyagraṃ mahābāho kriyantām avicāritam // RamS_2,70.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4149: ye tv agrato narendrasya agnyagārād bahiṣkṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4150: ṛtvigbhir yājakaiś caiva te hriyante yathāvidhi // RamS_2,70.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4152: bāṣpakaṇṭhā vimanasas tam ūhuḥ paricārakāḥ // RamS_2,70.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4153: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02su:4154: prakiranto janā mārgaṃ nṛpater agrato yayuḥ // RamS_2,70.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4156: devadārūṇi cāhṛtya citāṃ cakrus tathāpare // RamS_2,70.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4157: gandhān uccāvacāṃś cānyāṃs tatra dattvātha bhūmipam /
GE09ram_02su:4158: tataḥ saṃveśayāmāsuś citāmadhye tam ṛtvijaḥ // RamS_2,70.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4159: tathā hutāśanaṃ hutvā jepus tasya tadartvijaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4160: jaguś ca te yathāśāstraṃ tatra sāmāni sāmagāḥ // RamS_2,70.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4161: śibikābhiś ca yānaiś ca yathārhaṃ tasya yoṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4162: nagarān niryayus tatra vṛddhaiḥ parivṛtās tadā // RamS_2,70.19 //
GE09ram_02su:4163: prasavyaṃ cāpi taṃ cakrur ṛtvijo 'gnicitaṃ nṛpam /
GE09ram_02su:4164: striyaś ca śokasaṃtaptāḥ kausalyāpramukhās tadā // RamS_2,70.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4165: krauñcīnām iva nārīṇāṃ ninādas tatra śuśruve /
GE09ram_02su:4166: ārtānāṃ karuṇaṃ kāle krośantīnāṃ sahasraśaḥ // RamS_2,70.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4167: tato rudantyo vivaśā vilapya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4169: kṛtodakaṃ te bharatena sārdhaṃ nṛpāṅganā mantripurohitāś ca /
GE09ram_02su:4170: puraṃ praviśyāśruparītanetrā bhūmau daśāhaṃ vyanayanta duḥkham // RamS_2,70.23 //
GE09ram_02su:4175: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau ratnaṃ dhanam annaṃ ca puṣkalam /
GE09ram_02su:4176: bāstikaṃ bahuśuklaṃ ca gāś cāpi śataśas tathā // RamS_2,71.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4177: dāsīdāsaṃ ca yānaṃ ca veśmāni sumahānti ca /
GE09ram_02su:4178: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau putro rājñas tasyaurdhvadaihikam // RamS_2,71.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4182: citāmūle pitur vākyam idam āha suduḥkhitaḥ // RamS_2,71.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4183: tāta yasmin nisṛṣṭo 'haṃ tvayā bhrātari rāghave /
GE09ram_02su:4184: tasmin vanaṃ pravrajite śūnye tyakto 'smy ahaṃ tvayā // RamS_2,71.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4186: tām ambāṃ tāta kausalyāṃ tyaktvā tvaṃ kva gato nṛpa // RamS_2,71.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4188: pituḥ śarīranirvāṇaṃ niṣṭanan viṣasāda ha // RamS_2,71.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4189: sa tu dṛṣṭvā rudan dīnaḥ papāta dharaṇītale /
GE09ram_02su:4190: utthāpyamānaḥ śakrasya yantradhvaja iva cyutaḥ // RamS_2,71.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4192: antakāle nipatitaṃ yayātim ṛṣayo yathā // RamS_2,71.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4194: visaṃjño nyapatad bhūmau bhūmipālam anusmaran // RamS_2,71.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4196: smṛtvā pitur guṇāṅgāni tāni tāni tadā tadā // RamS_2,71.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4199: sukumāraṃ ca bālaṃ ca satataṃ lālitaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02su:4200: kva tāta bharataṃ hitvā vilapantaṃ gato bhavān // RamS_2,71.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4201: nanu bhojyeṣu pāneṣu vastreṣv ābharaṇeṣu ca /
GE09ram_02su:4202: pravārayasi naḥ sarvāṃs tan naḥ ko 'dya kariṣyati // RamS_2,71.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4204: vihīnā yā tvayā rājñā dharmajñena mahātmanā // RamS_2,71.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4205: pitari svargam āpanne rāme cāraṇyam āśrite /
GE09ram_02su:4206: kiṃ me jīvitasāmarthyaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam // RamS_2,71.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4207: hīno bhrātrā ca pitrā ca śūnyām ikṣvākupālitām /
GE09ram_02su:4208: ayodhyāṃ na pravekṣyāmi pravekṣyāmi tapovanam // RamS_2,71.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4209: tayor vilapitaṃ śrutvā vyasanaṃ cānvavekṣya tat /
GE09ram_02su:4210: bhṛśam ārtatarā bhūyaḥ sarva evānugāminaḥ // RamS_2,71.19 //
GE09ram_02su:4211: tato viṣaṇṇau śrāntau ca śatrughnabharatāv ubhau /
GE09ram_02su:4213: tataḥ prakṛtimān vaidyaḥ pitur eṣāṃ purohitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4214: vasiṣṭho bharataṃ vākyam utthāpya tam uvāca ha // RamS_2,71.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4216: teṣu cāparihāryeṣu naivaṃ bhavitum arhati // RamS_2,71.22 //
GE09ram_02su:4222: amātyās tvarayanti sma tanayau cāparāḥ kriyāḥ // RamS_2,71.25 //
GE09ram_02su:4226: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RamS_2,72.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4227: gatir yaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ duḥkhe kiṃ punar ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4228: sa rāmaḥ sattvasampannaḥ striyā pravrājito vanam // RamS_2,72.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4229: balavān vīryasampanno lakṣmaṇo nāma yo 'py asau /
GE09ram_02su:4230: kiṃ na mocayate rāmaṃ kṛtvāpi pitṛnigraham // RamS_2,72.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4231: pūrvam eva tu nigrāhyaḥ samavekṣya nayānayau /
GE09ram_02su:4232: utpathaṃ yaḥ samārūḍho nāryā rājā vaśaṃ gataḥ // RamS_2,72.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4237: tāṃ samīkṣya tadā dvāḥstho bhṛśaṃ pāpasya kāriṇīm /
GE09ram_02su:4239: yasyāḥ kṛte vane rāmo nyastadehaś ca vaḥ pitā /
GE09ram_02su:4240: seyaṃ pāpā nṛśaṃsā ca tasyāḥ kuru yathāmati // RamS_2,72.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4241: śatrughnaś ca tad ājñāya vacanaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4242: antaḥpuracarān sarvān ity uvāca dhṛtavrataḥ // RamS_2,72.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4243: tīvram utpāditaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhrātḥṇāṃ me tathā pituḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4244: yayā seyaṃ nṛśaṃsasya karmaṇaḥ phalam aśnutām // RamS_2,72.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4246: gṛhītā balavat kubjā sā tadgṛham anādayat // RamS_2,72.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4248: kruddham ājñāya śatrughnaṃ vyapalāyata sarvaśaḥ // RamS_2,72.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4250: yathāyaṃ samupakrānto niḥśeṣaṃ naḥ kariṣyati // RamS_2,72.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4251: sānukrośāṃ vadānyāṃ ca dharmajñāṃ ca yaśasvinīm /
GE09ram_02su:4252: kausalyāṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmaḥ sā hi no 'stu dhruvā gatiḥ // RamS_2,72.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4253: sa ca roṣeṇa tāmrākṣaḥ śatrughnaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4254: vicakarṣa tadā kubjāṃ krośantīṃ pṛthivītale // RamS_2,72.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4255: tasyā hy ākṛṣyamāṇāyā mantharāyās tatas tataḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4256: citraṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tad vyaśīryata // RamS_2,72.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4258: aśobhata tadā bhūyaḥ śāradaṃ gaganaṃ yathā // RamS_2,72.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4259: sa balī balavat krodhād gṛhītvā puruṣarṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4260: kaikeyīm abhinirbhartsya babhāṣe paruṣaṃ vacaḥ // RamS_2,72.18 //
GE09ram_02su:4261: tair vākyaiḥ paruṣair duḥkhaiḥ kaikeyī bhṛśaduḥkhitā /
GE09ram_02su:4263: tāṃ prekṣya bharataḥ kruddhaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02su:4264: avadhyāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pramadāḥ kṣamyatām iti // RamS_2,72.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4265: hanyām aham imāṃ pāpāṃ kaikeyīṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm /
GE09ram_02su:4266: yadi māṃ dhārmiko rāmo nāsūyen mātṛghātakam // RamS_2,72.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4267: imām api hatāṃ kubjāṃ yadi jānāti rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4268: tvāṃ ca māṃ caiva dharmātmā nābhibhāṣiṣyate dhruvam // RamS_2,72.22 //
GE09ram_02su:4270: nyavartata tato roṣāt tāṃ mumoca ca mantharām // RamS_2,72.23 //
GE09ram_02su:4271: sā pādamūle kaikeyyā mantharā nipapāta ha /
GE09ram_02su:4272: niḥśvasantī suduḥkhārtā kṛpaṇaṃ vilalāpa ca // RamS_2,72.24 //
GE09ram_02su:4274: śanaiḥ samāśvāsayad ārtarūpāṃ krauñcīṃ vilagnām iva vīkṣamāṇām // RamS_2,72.25 //
GE09ram_02su:4278: sametya rājakartāro bharataṃ vākyam abruvan // RamS_2,73.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4279: gato daśarathaḥ svargaṃ yo no gurutaro guruḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4280: rāmaṃ pravrājya vai jyeṣṭhaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // RamS_2,73.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4281: tvam adya bhava no rājā rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4282: saṃgatyā nāparādhnoti rājyam etad anāyakam // RamS_2,73.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4284: pratīkṣate tvāṃ svajanaḥ śreṇayaś ca nṛpātmaja // RamS_2,73.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4286: abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ pāhi cāsmān nararṣabha // RamS_2,73.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4288: bharatas taṃ janaṃ sarvaṃ pratyuvāca dhṛtavrataḥ // RamS_2,73.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4289: jyeṣṭhasya rājatā nityam ucitā hi kulasya naḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4290: naivaṃ bhavanto māṃ vaktum arhanti kuśalā janāḥ // RamS_2,73.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4291: rāmaḥ pūrvo hi no bhrātā bhaviṣyati mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4292: ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi varṣāṇi nava pañca ca // RamS_2,73.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4294: ānayiṣyāmy ahaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaraṃ rāghavaṃ vanāt // RamS_2,73.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4296: puraskṛtya gamiṣyāmi rāmahetor vanaṃ prati // RamS_2,73.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4298: āneṣyāmi tu vai rāmaṃ havyavāham ivādhvarāt // RamS_2,73.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4299: na sakāmāṃ kariṣyāmi svām imāṃ mātṛgandhinīm /
GE09ram_02su:4300: vane vatsyāmy ahaṃ durge rāmo rājā bhaviṣyati // RamS_2,73.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4301: kriyatāṃ śilpibhiḥ panthāḥ samāni viṣamāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02su:4304: pratyuvāca janaḥ sarvaḥ śrīmadvākyam anuttamam // RamS_2,73.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4305: evaṃ te bhāṣamāṇasya padmā śrīr upatiṣṭhatām /
GE09ram_02su:4306: yas tvaṃ jyeṣṭhe nṛpasute pṛthivīṃ dātum icchasi // RamS_2,73.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4307: anuttamaṃ tad vacanaṃ nṛpātmaja prabhāṣitaṃ saṃśravaṇe niśamya ca /
GE09ram_02su:4308: praharṣajās taṃ prati bāṣpabindavo nipetur āryānananetrasambhavāḥ // RamS_2,73.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4309: ūcus te vacanam idaṃ niśamya hṛṣṭāḥ sāmātyāḥ sapariṣado viyātaśokāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4310: panthānaṃ naravarabhaktimāñ janaś ca vyādiṣṭas tava vacanāc ca śilpivargaḥ // RamS_2,73.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4314: svakarmābhiratāḥ śūrāḥ khanakā yantrakās tathā // RamS_2,74.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4316: tathā vardhakayaś caiva mārgiṇo vṛkṣatakṣakāḥ // RamS_2,74.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4318: samarthā ye ca draṣṭāraḥ puratas te pratasthire // RamS_2,74.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4319: sa tu harṣāt tam uddeśaṃ janaugho vipulaḥ prayān /
GE09ram_02su:4323: latāvallīś ca gulmāṃś ca sthāṇūn aśmana eva ca /
GE09ram_02su:4324: janās te cakrire mārgaṃ chindanto vividhān drumān // RamS_2,74.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4325: avṛkṣeṣu ca deśeṣu kecid vṛkṣān aropayan /
GE09ram_02su:4326: kecit kuṭhāraiṣ ṭaṅkaiś ca dātraiś chindan kvacit kvacit // RamS_2,74.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4328: vidhamanti sma durgāṇi sthalāni ca tatas tataḥ // RamS_2,74.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4330: nimnabhāgāṃs tathā kecit samāṃś cakruḥ samantataḥ // RamS_2,74.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4331: babandhur bandhanīyāṃś ca kṣodyān saṃcukṣudus tadā /
GE09ram_02su:4332: bibhidur bhedanīyāṃś ca tāṃs tān deśān narās tadā // RamS_2,74.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4339: bahv aśobhata senāyāḥ panthāḥ svargapathopamaḥ // RamS_2,74.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4342: yo niveśas tv abhipreto bharatasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4343: bhūyas taṃ śobhayāmāsur bhūṣābhir bhūṣaṇopamam // RamS_2,74.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4351: samucchritair niveśās te babhuḥ śakrapuropamāḥ // RamS_2,74.19 //
GE09ram_02su:4354: sacandratārāgaṇamaṇḍitaṃ yathā nabhaḥ kṣapāyām amalaṃ virājate /
GE09ram_02su:4355: narendramārgaḥ sa tathā vyarājata krameṇa ramyaḥ śubhaśilpinirmitaḥ // RamS_2,74.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4361: dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca śataśo vādyāṃś coccāvacasvarān // RamS_2,75.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4362: sa tūryaghoṣaḥ sumahān divam āpūrayann iva /
GE09ram_02su:4363: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ bhūyaḥ śokair arandhrayat // RamS_2,75.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4364: tataḥ prabuddho bharatas taṃ ghoṣaṃ saṃnivartya ca /
GE09ram_02su:4365: nāhaṃ rājeti cāpy uktvā śatrughnam idam abravīt // RamS_2,75.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4367: visṛjya mayi duḥkhāni rājā daśaratho gataḥ // RamS_2,75.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4369: paribhramati rājaśrīr naur ivākarṇikā jale // RamS_2,75.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4370: ity evaṃ bharataṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ vicetanam /
GE09ram_02su:4371: kṛpaṇaṃ ruruduḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ yoṣitas tadā // RamS_2,75.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4375: sudharmām iva dharmātmā sagaṇaḥ pratyapadyata // RamS_2,75.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4377: adhyāsta sarvavedajño dūtān anuśaśāsa ca // RamS_2,75.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4379: kṣipram ānayatāvyagrāḥ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ hi naḥ // RamS_2,75.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4381: rathair aśvair gajaiś cāpi janānām upagacchatām // RamS_2,75.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4383: pratyanandan prakṛtayo yathā daśarathaṃ tathā // RamS_2,75.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4385: daśarathasutaśobhitā sabhā sadaśaratheva babhau yathā purā // RamS_2,75.14 //
GE09ram_02su:4389: dadarśa buddhisampannaḥ pūrṇacandrāṃ niśām iva // RamS_2,76.1 //
GE09ram_02su:4392: rājñas tu prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ samagrāḥ prekṣya dharmavit /
GE09ram_02su:4393: idaṃ purohito vākyaṃ bharataṃ mṛdu cābravīt // RamS_2,76.3 //
GE09ram_02su:4394: tāta rājā daśarathaḥ svargato dharmam ācaran /
GE09ram_02su:4395: dhanadhānyavatīṃ sphītāṃ pradāya pṛthivīṃ tava // RamS_2,76.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4396: rāmas tathā satyadhṛtiḥ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran /
GE09ram_02su:4397: nājahāt pitur ādeśaṃ śaśī jyotsnām ivoditaḥ // RamS_2,76.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4398: pitrā bhrātrā ca te dattaṃ rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02su:4399: tad bhuṅkṣva muditāmātyaḥ kṣipram evābhiṣecaya // RamS_2,76.6 //
GE09ram_02su:4400: udīcyāś ca pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca kevalāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4401: koṭyāparāntāḥ sāmudrā ratnāny abhiharantu te // RamS_2,76.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4403: jagāma manasā rāmaṃ dharmajño dharmakāṅkṣayā // RamS_2,76.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4405: vilalāpa sabhāmadhye jagarhe ca purohitam // RamS_2,76.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4407: dharme prayatamānasya ko rājyaṃ madvidho haret // RamS_2,76.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4409: rājyaṃ cāhaṃ ca rāmasya dharmaṃ vaktum ihārhasi // RamS_2,76.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4411: labdhum arhati kākutstho rājyaṃ daśaratho yathā // RamS_2,76.12 //
GE09ram_02su:4412: anāryajuṣṭam asvargyaṃ kuryāṃ pāpam ahaṃ yadi /
GE09ram_02su:4413: ikṣvākūṇām ahaṃ loke bhaveyaṃ kulapāṃsanaḥ // RamS_2,76.13 //
GE09ram_02su:4414: yaddhi mātrā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ nāhaṃ tad abhirocaye /
GE09ram_02su:4416: rāmam evānugacchāmi sa rājā dvipadāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4417: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ rāghavo rājyam arhati // RamS_2,76.15 //
GE09ram_02su:4418: tad vākyaṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ śrutvā sarve sabhāsadaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4419: harṣān mumucur aśrūṇi rāme nihitacetasaḥ // RamS_2,76.16 //
GE09ram_02su:4420: yadi tv āryaṃ na śakṣyāmi vinivartayituṃ vanāt /
GE09ram_02su:4421: vane tatraiva vatsyāmi yathāryo lakṣmaṇas tathā // RamS_2,76.17 //
GE09ram_02su:4424: evam uktvā tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4426: tūrṇam utthāya gaccha tvaṃ sumantra mama śāsanāt /
GE09ram_02su:4427: yātrām ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ balaṃ caiva samānaya // RamS_2,76.20 //
GE09ram_02su:4428: evam uktaḥ sumantras tu bharatena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02su:4429: prahṛṣṭaḥ so 'diśat sarvaṃ yathā saṃdiṣṭam iṣṭavat // RamS_2,76.21 //
GE09ram_02su:4430: tāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ prakṛtayo balādhyakṣā balasya ca /
GE09ram_02su:4431: śrutvā yātrāṃ samājñaptāṃ rāghavasya nivartane // RamS_2,76.22 //
GE09ram_02su:4432: tato yodhāṅganāḥ sarvā bhartḥn sarvān gṛhe gṛhe /
GE09ram_02su:4433: yātrāgamanam ājñāya tvarayanti sma harṣitāḥ // RamS_2,76.23 //
GE09ram_02su:4434: te hayair gorathaiḥ śīghraiḥ syandanaiś ca manojavaiḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4435: saha yodhair balādhyakṣā balaṃ sarvam acodayan // RamS_2,76.24 //
GE09ram_02su:4436: sajjaṃ tu tad balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bharato gurusaṃnidhau /
GE09ram_02su:4437: rathaṃ me tvarayasveti sumantraṃ pārśvato 'bravīt // RamS_2,76.25 //
GE09ram_02su:4439: rathaṃ gṛhītvā prayayau yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ // RamS_2,76.26 //
GE09ram_02su:4440: sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiḥ pratāpavān bruvan suyuktaṃ dṛḍhasatyavikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4441: guruṃ mahāraṇyagataṃ yaśasvinaṃ prasādayiṣyan bharato 'bravīt tadā // RamS_2,76.27 //
GE09ram_02su:4442: tūrṇaṃ samutthāya sumantra gaccha balasya yogāya balapradhānān /
GE09ram_02su:4443: ānetum icchāmi hi taṃ vanasthaṃ prasādya rāmaṃ jagato hitāya // RamS_2,76.28 //
GE09ram_02su:4444: sa sūtaputro bharatena samyag ājñāpitaḥ saṃparipūrṇakāmaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4445: śaśāsa sarvān prakṛtipradhānān balasya mukhyāṃś ca suhṛjjanaṃ ca // RamS_2,76.29 //
GE09ram_02su:4446: tataḥ samutthāya kule kule te rājanyavaiśyā vṛṣalāś ca viprāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4447: ayūyujann uṣṭrarathān kharāṃś ca nāgān hayāṃś caiva kulaprasūtān // RamS_2,76.30 //
GE09ram_02su:4453: adhiruhya hayair yuktān rathān sūryarathopamān // RamS_2,77.2 //
GE09ram_02su:4457: anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam // RamS_2,77.4 //
GE09ram_02su:4459: anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam // RamS_2,77.5 //
GE09ram_02su:4460: kaikeyī ca sumitrā ca kausalyā ca yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02su:4463: tasyaiva ca kathāś citrāḥ kurvāṇā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ // RamS_2,77.7 //
GE09ram_02su:4465: kadā drakṣyāmahe rāmaṃ jagataḥ śokanāśanam // RamS_2,77.8 //
GE09ram_02su:4466: dṛṣṭa eva hi naḥ śokam apaneṣyati rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4467: tamaḥ sarvasya lokasya samudyann iva bhāskaraḥ // RamS_2,77.9 //
GE09ram_02su:4468: ity evaṃ kathayantas te samprahṛṣṭāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4469: pariṣvajānāś cānyonyaṃ yayur nāgarikās tadā // RamS_2,77.10 //
GE09ram_02su:4470: ye ca tatrāpare sarve saṃmatā ye ca naigamāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4471: rāmaṃ prati yayur hṛṣṭāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tadā // RamS_2,77.11 //
GE09ram_02su:4472: maṇikārāś ca ye kecit kumbhakārāś ca śobhanāḥ /
GE09ram_02su:4473: sūtrakarmakṛtaś caiva ye ca śastropajīvinaḥ // RamS_2,77.12 //
